analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_09.01.001/1 manvantarāṇi sarvāṇi tvayoktāni śrutāni me
analyzed: manvantarāṇi sarvāṇi tvayā uktāni śrutāni me
vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya hareḥ tatra kṛtāni ca
sau satyavrataḥ nāma rājarṣiḥ draviḍa īśvaraḥ
jñānam lebhe puruṣa sevayā

original: BhP_09.01.003/1 sa vai vivasvataḥ putro manurāsīditi śrutam
analyzed: sa vai vivasvataḥ putraḥ manuḥ āsīt iti śrutam

original: BhP_09.01.003/2 tvattastasya sutāḥ proktā ikṣvākupramukhā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: tvattaḥ tasya sutāḥ proktāḥ ikṣvāku pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_09.01.004/1 teṣāṃ vaṃśaṃ pṛthag brahman vaṃśānucaritāni ca
analyzed: teṣām vaṃśam pṛthak brahman vaṃśānucaritāni ca

original: BhP_09.01.004/2 kīrtayasva mahābhāga nityaṃ śuśrūṣatāṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: kīrtayasva mahābhāga nityam śuśrūṣatām hi naḥ

original: BhP_09.01.005/1 ye bhūtā ye bhaviṣyāśca bhavantyadyatanāśca ye
analyzed: ye bhūtāḥ ye bhaviṣyāḥ ca bhavanti adyatanāḥ ca ye

original: BhP_09.01.005/2 teṣāṃ naḥ puṇyakīrtīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ vada vikramān
analyzed: teṣām naḥ puṇya kīrtīnām sarveṣām vada vikramān
śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.01.006/1 evaṃ parīkṣitā rājñā sadasi brahmavādinām
analyzed: evam parīkṣitāḥ rājñā sadasi brahma vādinām

original: BhP_09.01.006/2 pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavāñ chukaḥ paramadharmavit
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān śukaḥ parama dharma vid
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.01.007/1 śrūyatāṃ mānavo vaṃśaḥ prācuryeṇa parantapa
analyzed: śrūyatām mānavaḥ vaṃśaḥ prācuryeṇa parantapa

original: BhP_09.01.007/2 na śakyate vistarato vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi
analyzed: na śakyate vistarataḥ vaktum varṣa śataiḥ api

original: BhP_09.01.008/1 parāvareṣāṃ bhūtānāmātmā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: parāvareṣām bhūtānām ātmā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_09.01.008/2 sa evāsīdidaṃ viśvaṃ kalpānte 'nyan na kiñcana
analyzed: saḥ eva āsīt idam viśvam kalpa ante nyat na kiñcana

original: BhP_09.01.009/1 tasya nābheḥ samabhavat padmakoṣo hiraṇmayaḥ
analyzed: tasya nābheḥ samabhavat padma koṣaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ
tasmin jajñe mahā rāja svayambhūḥ caturānanaḥ
marīciḥ manasaḥ tasya jajñe tasya api kaśyapaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.010/2 dākṣāyaṇyāṃ tato 'dityāṃ vivasvān abhavat sutaḥ
analyzed: dākṣāyaṇyām tatas dityām vivasvān abhavat sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.011/1 tato manuḥ śrāddhadevaḥ saṃjñāyāmāsa bhārata
analyzed: tatas manuḥ śrāddhadevaḥ saṃjñāyāmāsa bhārata

original: BhP_09.01.011/2 śraddhāyāṃ janayāmāsa daśa putrān sa ātmavān
analyzed: śraddhāyām janayāmāsa daśa putrān saḥ ātmavān
ikṣvāku nṛga śaryāti diṣṭa dhṛṣṭa karūṣakān

original: BhP_09.01.012/2 nariṣyantaṃ pṛṣadhraṃ ca nabhagaṃ ca kaviṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: nariṣyantam pṛṣadhram ca nabhagam ca kavim vibhuḥ

original: BhP_09.01.013/1 aprajasya manoḥ pūrvaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān kila
analyzed: aprajasya manoḥ pūrvam vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān kila
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ iṣṭim prajā artham akarot vibhuḥ

original: BhP_09.01.014/1 tatra śraddhā manoḥ patnī hotāraṃ samayācata
analyzed: tatra śraddhā manoḥ patnī hotāram samayācata
duhitṛ artham upāgamya praṇipatya payovratā

original: BhP_09.01.015/1 preṣito 'dhvaryuṇā hotā vyacarat tat samāhitaḥ
analyzed: preṣitaḥ dhvaryuṇā hotā vyacarat tat samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.015/2 gṛhīte haviṣi vācā vaṣaṭkāraṃ gṛṇan dvijaḥ
analyzed: gṛhīte haviṣi vācā vaṣaṭkāram gṛṇan dvijaḥ
hotuḥ tad vyabhicāreṇa kanyā ilā nāma sā abhavat

original: BhP_09.01.016/2 tāṃ vilokya manuḥ prāha nātituṣṭamanā gurum
analyzed: tām vilokya manuḥ prāha na ati tuṣṭa manāḥ gurum

original: BhP_09.01.017/1 bhagavan kimidaṃ jātaṃ karma vo brahmavādinām
analyzed: bhagavan kim idam jātam karma vaḥ brahma vādinām
viparyayam aho kaṣṭam mā evam syāt brahma vikriyā
yūyam brahma vidaḥ yuktāḥ tapasā dagdha kilbiṣāḥ
kutas saṅkalpa vaiṣamyam anṛtam vibudheṣu iva
niśamya tat vacaḥ tasya bhagavān prapitāmahaḥ
hotuḥ vyatikramam jñātvā babhāṣe ravinandanam
etat saṅkalpa vaiṣamyam hotuḥ te vyabhicārataḥ

original: BhP_09.01.020/2 tathāpi sādhayiṣye te suprajāstvaṃ svatejasā
analyzed: tathā api sādhayiṣye te suprajāstvam sva tejasā

original: BhP_09.01.021/1 evaṃ vyavasito rājan bhagavān sa mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: evam vyavasitaḥ rājan bhagavān sa mahā yaśāḥ
astauṣīt ādipuruṣam ilāyāḥ puṃstva kāmyayā

original: BhP_09.01.022/1 tasmai kāmavaraṃ tuṣṭo bhagavān harirīśvaraḥ
analyzed: tasmai kāma varam tuṣṭaḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_09.01.022/2 dadāv ilābhavat tena sudyumnaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: dadau ilā abhavat tena sudyumnaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.023/1 sa ekadā mahārāja vicaran mṛgayāṃ vane
analyzed: saḥ ekadā mahā rāja vicaran mṛgayām vane
vṛtaḥ katipaya amātyaiḥ aśvam āruhya saindhavam

original: BhP_09.01.024/1 pragṛhya ruciraṃ cāpaṃ śarāṃśca paramādbhutān
analyzed: pragṛhya ruciram cāpam śarān ca parama adbhutān
daṃśitaḥ nu mṛgam vīraḥ jagāma diśam uttarām
sukumāra vanam meroḥ adhastāt praviveśa ha

original: BhP_09.01.025/2 yatrāste bhagavān charvo ramamāṇaḥ sahomayā
analyzed: yatra āste bhagavān śarvaḥ ramamāṇaḥ saha umayā

original: BhP_09.01.026/1 tasmin praviṣṭa evāsau sudyumnaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭaḥ eva asau sudyumnaḥ para vīra hā

original: BhP_09.01.026/2 apaśyat striyamātmānamaśvaṃ ca vaḍavāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: apaśyat striyam ātmānam aśvam ca vaḍavām nṛpa
tathā tad anugāḥ sarve ātma liṅga viparyayam
dṛṣṭvā vimanasaḥ bhūvan vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_09.01.028/1 kathamevaṃ guṇo deśaḥ kena vā bhagavan kṛtaḥ
analyzed: katham evam guṇaḥ deśaḥ kena vā bhagavan kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.028/2 praśnamenaṃ samācakṣva paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: praśnam enam samācakṣva param kautūhalam hi naḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
ekadā giriśam draṣṭum ṛṣayaḥ tatra suvratāḥ
diśaḥ vitimira ābhāsāḥ kurvantaḥ samupāgaman

original: BhP_09.01.030/1 tān vilokyāmbikā devī vivāsā vrīḍitā bhṛśam
analyzed: tān vilokya ambikā devī vivāsā vrīḍitā bhṛśam

original: BhP_09.01.030/2 bharturaṅkāt samutthāya nīvīmāśv atha paryadhāt
analyzed: bhartuḥ aṅkāt samutthāya nīvīm āśu atha paryadhāt
ṛṣayaḥ pi tayoḥ vīkṣya prasaṅgam ramamāṇayoḥ
nivṛttāḥ prayayuḥ tasmāt nara nārāyaṇa āśramam

original: BhP_09.01.032/1 tadidaṃ bhagavān āha priyāyāḥ priyakāmyayā
analyzed: tat idam bhagavān āha priyāyāḥ priya kāmyayā

original: BhP_09.01.032/2 sthānaṃ yaḥ praviśedetat sa vai yoṣidbhavediti
analyzed: sthānam yaḥ praviśet etat sa vai yoṣit bhavet iti

original: BhP_09.01.033/1 tata ūrdhvaṃ vanaṃ tadvai puruṣā varjayanti hi
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam vanam tat vai puruṣāḥ varjayanti hi
sā ca anucara saṃyuktā vicacāra vanāt vanam
atha tām āśrama abhyāśe carantīm pramadā uttamām

original: BhP_09.01.034/2 strībhiḥ parivṛtāṃ vīkṣya cakame bhagavān budhaḥ
analyzed: strībhiḥ parivṛtām vīkṣya cakame bhagavān budhaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.035/1 sāpi taṃ cakame subhrūḥ somarājasutaṃ patim
analyzed: sā api tam cakame subhrūḥ somarāja sutam patim
sa tasyām janayāmāsa purūravasam ātmajam

original: BhP_09.01.036/1 evaṃ strītvamanuprāptaḥ sudyumno mānavo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: evam strī tvam anuprāptaḥ sudyumnaḥ mānavaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.036/2 sasmāra sa kulācāryaṃ vasiṣṭhamiti śuśruma
analyzed: sasmāra sa kula ācāryam vasiṣṭham iti śuśruma

original: BhP_09.01.037/1 sa tasya tāṃ daśāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: sa tasya tām daśām dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā bhṛśa pīḍitaḥ
sudyumnasya aśayan puṃs tvam upādhāvata śaṅkaram

original: BhP_09.01.038/1 tuṣṭastasmai sa bhagavān ṛṣaye priyamāvahan
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ tasmai sa bhagavān ṛṣaye priyam āvahan

original: BhP_09.01.038/2 svāṃ ca vācamṛtāṃ kurvannidamāha viśāmpate
analyzed: svām ca vācam ṛtām kurvan idam āha viśām pate

original: BhP_09.01.039/1 māsaṃ pumān sa bhavitā māsaṃ strī tava gotrajaḥ
analyzed: māsam pumān sa bhavitā māsam strī tava gotra jaḥ

original: BhP_09.01.039/2 itthaṃ vyavasthayā kāmaṃ sudyumno 'vatu medinīm
analyzed: ittham vyavasthayā kāmam sudyumnaḥ vatu medinīm

original: BhP_09.01.040/1 ācāryānugrahāt kāmaṃ labdhvā puṃstvaṃ vyavasthayā
analyzed: ācārya anugrahāt kāmam labdhvā puṃs tvam vyavasthayā

original: BhP_09.01.040/2 pālayāmāsa jagatīṃ nābhyanandan sma taṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: pālayāmāsa jagatīm na abhyanandan sma tam prajāḥ

original: BhP_09.01.041/1 tasyotkalo gayo rājan vimalaśca trayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: tasya utkalaḥ gayaḥ rājan vimalaḥ ca trayaḥ sutāḥ
dakṣiṇāpatha rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ dharma vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_09.01.042/1 tataḥ pariṇate kāle pratiṣṭhānapatiḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas pariṇate kāle pratiṣṭhāna patiḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_09.01.042/2 purūravasa utsṛjya gāṃ putrāya gato vanam
analyzed: purūravase utsṛjya gām putrāya gataḥ vanam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.02.001/1 evaṃ gate 'tha sudyumne manurvaivasvataḥ sute
analyzed: evam gate tha sudyumne manuḥ vaivasvataḥ sute
putra kāmaḥ tapaḥ tepe yamunāyām śatam samāḥ
tatas yajat manuḥ devam apatya artham harim prabhum

original: BhP_09.02.002/2 ikṣvākupūrvajān putrān lebhe svasadṛśān daśa
analyzed: ikṣvāku pūrvajān putrān lebhe sva sadṛśān daśa

original: BhP_09.02.003/1 pṛṣadhrastu manoḥ putro gopālo guruṇā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣadhraḥ tu manoḥ putraḥ gopālaḥ guruṇā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.02.003/2 pālayāmāsa gā yatto rātryāṃ vīrāsanavrataḥ
analyzed: pālayāmāsa gāḥ yattaḥ rātryām vīrāsana vrataḥ

original: BhP_09.02.004/1 ekadā prāviśadgoṣṭhaṃ śārdūlo niśi varṣati
analyzed: ekadā prāviśat goṣṭham śārdūlaḥ niśi varṣati

original: BhP_09.02.004/2 śayānā gāva utthāya bhītāstā babhramurvraje
analyzed: śayānāḥ gāvaḥ utthāya bhītāḥ tāḥ babhramuḥ vraje

original: BhP_09.02.005/1 ekāṃ jagrāha balavān sā cukrośa bhayāturā
analyzed: ekām jagrāha balavān sā cukrośa bhaya āturā

original: BhP_09.02.005/2 tasyāstu kranditaṃ śrutvā pṛṣadhro 'nusasāra ha
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu kranditam śrutvā pṛṣadhraḥ nusasāra ha
khaḍgam ādāya tarasā pralīna uḍu gaṇe niśi
a jānan acchinot babhroḥ śiraḥ śārdūla śaṅkayā
vyāghraḥ vṛkṇa śravaṇaḥ nistriṃśa agra āhataḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.02.007/2 niścakrāma bhṛśaṃ bhīto raktaṃ pathi samutsṛjan
analyzed: niścakrāma bhṛśam bhītaḥ raktam pathi samutsṛjan

original: BhP_09.02.008/1 manyamāno hataṃ vyāghraṃ pṛṣadhraḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: manyamānaḥ hatam vyāghram pṛṣadhraḥ para vīra hā

original: BhP_09.02.008/2 adrākṣīt svahatāṃ babhruṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ niśi duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: adrākṣīt sva hatām babhrum vyuṣṭāyām niśi duḥkhitaḥ
tam śaśāpa kula ācāryaḥ kṛta āgasam akāmataḥ

original: BhP_09.02.009/2 na kṣatrabandhuḥ śūdrastvaṃ karmaṇā bhavitāmunā
analyzed: na kṣatrabandhuḥ śūdraḥ tvam karmaṇā bhavitā amunā

original: BhP_09.02.010/1 evaṃ śaptastu guruṇā pratyagṛhṇāt kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam śaptaḥ tu guruṇā pratyagṛhṇāt kṛtāñjaliḥ
adhārayat vratam vīraḥ ūrdhvaretāḥ muni priyam
vāsudeve bhagavati sarvātmani pare male

original: BhP_09.02.011/2 ekāntitvaṃ gato bhaktyā sarvabhūtasuhṛt samaḥ
analyzed: ekānti tvam gataḥ bhaktyā sarva bhūta suhṛd samaḥ
vimukta saṅgaḥ śānta ātmā saṃyata akṣaḥ parigrahaḥ
yadṛcchayā upapannena kalpayan vṛttim ātmanaḥ
ātmani ātmānam ādhāya jñāna tṛptaḥ samāhitaḥ
vicacāra mahīm etām jaḍa andha badhira ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_09.02.014/1 evaṃ vṛtto vanaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā dāvāgnimutthitam
analyzed: evam vṛttaḥ vanam gatvā dṛṣṭvā dāva agnim utthitam

original: BhP_09.02.014/2 tenopayuktakaraṇo brahma prāpa paraṃ muniḥ
analyzed: tena upayukta karaṇaḥ brahma prāpa param muniḥ

original: BhP_09.02.015/1 kaviḥ kanīyān viṣayeṣu niḥspṛho visṛjya rājyaṃ saha bandhubhirvanam
analyzed: kaviḥ kanīyān viṣayeṣu niḥspṛhaḥ visṛjya rājyam saha bandhubhiḥ vanam

original: BhP_09.02.015/2 niveśya citte puruṣaṃ svarociṣaṃ viveśa kaiśoravayāḥ paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: niveśya citte puruṣam sva rociṣam viveśa kaiśora vayāḥ param gataḥ
karūṣāt mānavāt āsan kārūṣāḥ kṣatra jātayaḥ
uttarāpatha goptāraḥ brahmaṇyāḥ dharma vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_09.02.017/1 dhṛṣṭāddhārṣṭamabhūt kṣatraṃ brahmabhūyaṃ gataṃ kṣitau
analyzed: dhṛṣṭāt dhārṣṭam abhūt kṣatram brahma bhūyam gatam kṣitau
nṛgasya vaṃśaḥ sumatiḥ bhūtajyotiḥ tatas vasuḥ
vasoḥ pratīkaḥ tad putraḥ oghavān oghavat pitā

original: BhP_09.02.018/2 kanyā caughavatī nāma sudarśana uvāha tām
analyzed: kanyā ca oghavatī nāma sudarśanaḥ uvāha tām
citrasenaḥ nariṣyantāt ṛkṣaḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_09.02.019/2 tasya mīḍhvāṃstataḥ pūrṇa indrasenastu tatsutaḥ
analyzed: tasya mīḍhvān tatas pūrṇaḥ indrasenaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.02.020/1 vītihotrastv indrasenāt tasya satyaśravā abhūt
analyzed: vītihotraḥ tu indrasenāt tasya satyaśravāḥ abhūt
uruśravāḥ sutaḥ tasya devadattaḥ tatas bhavat

original: BhP_09.02.021/1 tato 'gniveśyo bhagavān agniḥ svayamabhūt sutaḥ
analyzed: tatas gniveśyaḥ bhagavān agniḥ svayam abhūt sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.02.021/2 kānīna iti vikhyāto jātūkarṇyo mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: kānīnaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ jātūkarṇyaḥ mahān ṛṣiḥ
tatas brahma kulam jātam āgniveśyāyanam nṛpa
nariṣyanta anvayaḥ proktaḥ diṣṭa vaṃśam atas śṛṇu

original: BhP_09.02.023/1 nābhāgo diṣṭaputro 'nyaḥ karmaṇā vaiśyatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: nābhāgaḥ diṣṭa putraḥ nyaḥ karmaṇā vaiśya tām gataḥ
bhalandanaḥ sutaḥ tasya vatsaprītiḥ bhalandanāt

original: BhP_09.02.024/1 vatsaprīteḥ sutaḥ prāṃśustatsutaṃ pramatiṃ viduḥ
analyzed: vatsaprīteḥ sutaḥ prāṃśuḥ tad sutam pramatim viduḥ
khanitraḥ pramateḥ tasmāt cākṣuṣaḥ tha viviṃśatiḥ

original: BhP_09.02.025/1 viviṃśateḥ suto rambhaḥ khanīnetro 'sya dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: viviṃśateḥ sutaḥ rambhaḥ khanīnetraḥ sya dhārmikaḥ
karandhamaḥ mahā rāja tasya āsīt ātmajaḥ nṛpa
tasya avīkṣit sutaḥ yasya maruttaḥ cakravartī abhūt
saṃvartaḥ yājayat yam vai mahā yogī aṅgiraḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.02.027/1 maruttasya yathā yajño na tathānyo 'sti kaścana
analyzed: maruttasya yathā yajñaḥ na tathā anyaḥ sti kaścana

original: BhP_09.02.027/2 sarvaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ tv āsīdyat kiñcic cāsya śobhanam
analyzed: sarvam hiraṇmayam tu āsīt yat kiñcid ca asya śobhanam
amādyat indraḥ somena dakṣiṇābhiḥ dvijātayaḥ
marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ viśvedevāḥ sabhāsadaḥ
maruttasya damaḥ putraḥ tasya āsīt rājya vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_09.02.029/2 sudhṛtistatsuto jajñe saudhṛteyo naraḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: sudhṛtiḥ tad sutaḥ jajñe saudhṛteyaḥ naraḥ sutaḥ
tad sutaḥ kevalaḥ tasmāt dhundhumān vegavān tatas
budhaḥ tasya abhavat yasya tṛṇabinduḥ mahīpatiḥ
tam bheje lambuṣā devī bhajanīya guṇa ālayam

original: BhP_09.02.031/2 varāpsarā yataḥ putrāḥ kanyā celavilābhavat
analyzed: vara apsarāḥ yatas putrāḥ kanyā
yasyām utpādayāmāsa viśravāḥ dhanadam sutam
prādāya vidyām paramām ṛṣiḥ yoga īśvaraḥ pituḥ
viśālaḥ śūnyabandhuḥ ca dhūmraketuḥ ca tad sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.02.033/2 viśālo vaṃśakṛdrājā vaiśālīṃ nirmame purīm
analyzed: viśālaḥ vaṃśa kṛt rājā vaiśālīm nirmame purīm
hemacandraḥ sutaḥ tasya dhūmrākṣaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
tad putrāt saṃyamāt āsīt kṛśāśvaḥ sahadeva jaḥ
kṛśāśvāt somadattaḥ śvamedhaiḥ iḍaspatim
iṣṭvā puruṣam āpa agryām gatim yogeśvara āśritām
saumadattiḥ tu sumatiḥ tad putraḥ janamejayaḥ
ete vaiśāla bhūpālāḥ tṛṇabindoḥ yaśodharāḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.03.001/1 śaryātirmānavo rājā brahmiṣṭhaḥ sambabhūva ha
analyzed: śaryātiḥ mānavaḥ rājā brahmiṣṭhaḥ sambabhūva ha

original: BhP_09.03.001/2 yo vā aṅgirasāṃ satre dvitīyamaharūcivān
analyzed: yaḥ vai aṅgirasām satre dvitīyam ahar ūcivān

original: BhP_09.03.002/1 sukanyā nāma tasyāsīt kanyā kamalalocanā
analyzed: sukanyā nāma tasya āsīt kanyā kamala locanā

original: BhP_09.03.002/2 tayā sārdhaṃ vanagato hyagamac cyavanāśramam
analyzed: tayā sārdham vana gataḥ hi agamat cyavana āśramam

original: BhP_09.03.003/1 sā sakhībhiḥ parivṛtā vicinvantyaṅghripān vane
analyzed: sā sakhībhiḥ parivṛtā vicinvanti aṅghripān vane

original: BhP_09.03.003/2 valmīkarandhre dadṛśe khadyote iva jyotiṣī
analyzed: valmīka randhre dadṛśe khadyote iva jyotiṣī

original: BhP_09.03.004/1 te daivacoditā bālā jyotiṣī kaṇṭakena vai
analyzed: te daiva coditāḥ bālāḥ jyotiṣī kaṇṭakena vai

original: BhP_09.03.004/2 avidhyan mugdhabhāvena susrāvāsṛk tato bahiḥ
analyzed: avidhyat mugdha bhāvena susrāva asṛk tatas bahis
śakṛt mūtra nirodhaḥ sainikānām ca tad kṣaṇāt
rājarṣiḥ tam upālakṣya puruṣān vismitaḥ bravīt
api abhadram na yuṣmābhiḥ bhārgavasya viceṣṭitam
vyaktam kena api naḥ tasya kṛtam āśrama dūṣaṇam

original: BhP_09.03.007/1 sukanyā prāha pitaraṃ bhītā kiñcit kṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: sukanyā prāha pitaram bhītā kiñcid kṛtam mayā

original: BhP_09.03.007/2 dve jyotiṣī ajānantyā nirbhinne kaṇṭakena vai
analyzed: dve jyotiṣī a jānantyāḥ nirbhinne kaṇṭakena vai
duhituḥ tat vacaḥ śrutvā śaryātiḥ jāta sādhvasaḥ
munim prasādayāmāsa valmīka antarhitam śanais
tad abhiprāyam ājñāya prādāt duhitaram muneḥ

original: BhP_09.03.009/2 kṛcchrān muktastamāmantrya puraṃ prāyāt samāhitaḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt muktaḥ tam āmantrya puram prāyāt samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.010/1 sukanyā cyavanaṃ prāpya patiṃ paramakopanam
analyzed: sukanyā cyavanam prāpya patim parama kopanam
prīṇayāmāsa citta jñā apramatta anuvṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_09.03.011/1 kasyacit tv atha kālasya nāsatyāv āśramāgatau
analyzed: kasyacid tu atha kālasya nāsatyau āśrama āgatau

original: BhP_09.03.011/2 tau pūjayitvā provāca vayo me dattamīśvarau
analyzed: tau pūjayitvā provāca vayaḥ me dattam īśvarau

original: BhP_09.03.012/1 grahaṃ grahīṣye somasya yajñe vāmapyasomapoḥ
analyzed: graham grahīṣye somasya yajñe vām apya somapoḥ

original: BhP_09.03.012/2 kriyatāṃ me vayorūpaṃ pramadānāṃ yadīpsitam
analyzed: kriyatām me vayaḥ rūpam pramadānām yat īpsitam
bāḍham iti ūcatuḥ vipram abhinandya bhiṣaktamau

original: BhP_09.03.013/2 nimajjatāṃ bhavān asmin hrade siddhavinirmite
analyzed: nimajjatām bhavān asmin hrade siddha vinirmite

original: BhP_09.03.014/1 ityukto jarayā grasta deho dhamanisantataḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ jarayā dehaḥ dhamani santataḥ
hradam śvibhyām valī palita vigrahaḥ
puruṣāḥ trayaḥ uttasthuḥ api ivyāḥ vanitā priyāḥ
padma srajaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ tulya rūpāḥ su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.016/1 tān nirīkṣya varārohā sarūpān sūryavarcasaḥ
analyzed: tān nirīkṣya varārohā sarūpān sūrya varcasaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.016/2 ajānatī patiṃ sādhvī aśvinau śaraṇaṃ yayau
analyzed: a jānatī patim sādhvī aśvinau śaraṇam yayau

original: BhP_09.03.017/1 darśayitvā patiṃ tasyai pātivratyena toṣitau
analyzed: darśayitvā patim tasyai pātivratyena toṣitau
ṛṣim āmantrya yayatuḥ vimānena triviṣṭapam
yakṣyamāṇaḥ tha śaryātiḥ cyavanasya āśramam gataḥ

original: BhP_09.03.018/2 dadarśa duhituḥ pārśve puruṣaṃ sūryavarcasam
analyzed: dadarśa duhituḥ pārśve puruṣam sūrya varcasam
rājā duhitaram prāha kṛta pāda abhivandanām
āśiṣaḥ ca a prayuñjānaḥ na ati prīti manāḥ iva

original: BhP_09.03.020/1 cikīrṣitaṃ te kimidaṃ patistvayā pralambhito lokanamaskṛto muniḥ
analyzed: cikīrṣitam te kim idam patiḥ tvayā pralambhitaḥ loka namaskṛtaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_09.03.020/2 yat tvaṃ jarāgrastamasatyasammataṃ vihāya jāraṃ bhajase 'mumadhvagam
analyzed: yat tvam jarā grastam asatya sammatam vihāya jāram bhajase mumadhva gam

original: BhP_09.03.021/1 kathaṃ matiste 'vagatānyathā satāṃ kulaprasūte kuladūṣaṇaṃ tv idam
analyzed: katham matiḥ te vagatā anyathā satām kula prasūte kula dūṣaṇam tu idam

original: BhP_09.03.021/2 bibharṣi jāraṃ yadapatrapā kulaṃ pituśca bhartuśca nayasyadhastamaḥ
analyzed: bibharṣi jāram yat apatrapā kulam pituḥ ca bhartuḥ ca nayasi adhastamaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.022/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ smayamānā śucismitā
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam pitaram smayamānā śuci smitā

original: BhP_09.03.022/2 uvāca tāta jāmātā tavaiṣa bhṛgunandanaḥ
analyzed: uvāca tāta jāmātā tava eṣa bhṛgunandanaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.023/1 śaśaṃsa pitre tat sarvaṃ vayorūpābhilambhanam
analyzed: śaśaṃsa pitre tat sarvam vayaḥ rūpa abhilambhanam
vismitaḥ parama prītaḥ tanayām pariṣasvaje

original: BhP_09.03.024/1 somena yājayan vīraṃ grahaṃ somasya cāgrahīt
analyzed: somena yājayan vīram graham somasya ca agrahīt
a somapoḥ api aśvinoḥ cyavanaḥ svena tejasā

original: BhP_09.03.025/1 hantuṃ tamādade vajraṃ sadyo manyuramarṣitaḥ
analyzed: hantum tam ādade vajram sadyas manyuḥ amarṣitaḥ
sa vajram stambhayāmāsa bhujam indrasya bhārgavaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.026/1 anvajānaṃstataḥ sarve grahaṃ somasya cāśvinoḥ
analyzed: anvajānan tatas sarve graham somasya ca aśvinoḥ

original: BhP_09.03.026/2 bhiṣajāv iti yat pūrvaṃ somāhutyā bahiṣkṛtau
analyzed: bhiṣajau iti yat pūrvam soma āhutyā bahiṣkṛtau
uttāna barhiḥ ānartaḥ bhūriṣeṇaḥ iti trayaḥ
śaryāteḥ abhavan putrāḥ ānartāt revataḥ bhavat
saḥ ntar samudre nagarīm vinirmāya kuśasthalīm
āsthitaḥ bhuṅkta viṣayān ānarta ādīn arindama
tasya putra śatam jajñe kakudmi jyeṣṭham uttamam

original: BhP_09.03.029/2 kakudmī revatīṃ kanyāṃ svāmādāya vibhuṃ gataḥ
analyzed: kakudmī revatīm kanyām svām ādāya vibhum gataḥ
putryāḥ varam paripraṣṭum brahma lokam apāvṛtam
āvartamāne gāndharve sthitaḥ labdha kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇam
tad ante ādyam ānamya sva abhiprāyam nyavedayat

original: BhP_09.03.031/2 tac chrutvā bhagavān brahmā prahasya tamuvāca ha
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhagavān brahmā prahasya tam uvāca ha

original: BhP_09.03.032/1 aho rājan niruddhāste kālena hṛdi ye kṛtāḥ
analyzed: aho rājan niruddhāḥ te kālena hṛdi ye kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_09.03.032/2 tat putrapautranapt-ṇāṃ gotrāṇi ca na śṛṇmahe
analyzed: tat gotrāṇi ca na śṛṇmahe
kālaḥ catur yuga vikalpitaḥ
tat gaccha devadeva aṃśaḥ baladevaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: BhP_09.03.034/1 kanyāratnamidaṃ rājan nararatnāya dehi bhoḥ
analyzed: kanyā ratnam idam rājan nara ratnāya dehi bhoḥ
bhuvaḥ bhāra avatārāya bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
avatīrṇaḥ nija aṃśena puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanaḥ
iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhivandya ājam nṛpaḥ sva puram āgataḥ
tyaktam puṇyajana trāsāt bhrātṛbhiḥ dikṣu avasthitaiḥ
sutām dattvā anavadya aṅgīm balāya bala śāline

original: BhP_09.03.036/2 badaryākhyaṃ gato rājā taptuṃ nārāyaṇāśramam
analyzed: badarī ākhyam gataḥ rājā taptum nārāyaṇa āśramam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.04.001/1 nābhāgo nabhagāpatyaṃ yaṃ tataṃ bhrātaraḥ kavim
analyzed: nābhāgaḥ nabhaga apatyam yam tatam bhrātaraḥ kavim
yaviṣṭham vyabhajan dāyam brahmacāriṇam āgatam

original: BhP_09.04.002/1 bhrātaro 'bhāṅkta kiṃ mahyaṃ bhajāma pitaraṃ tava
analyzed: bhrātaraḥ bhāṅkta kim mahyam bhajāma pitaram tava
tvām mama āryāḥ tata abhāṅkṣuḥ mā putraka tadā adṛthāḥ
ime aṅgirasaḥ satram āsate dya sumedhasaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.003/2 ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaṣṭhamupetyāhaḥ kave muhyanti karmaṇi
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham ṣaṣṭham upetya ahar kave muhyanti karmaṇi

original: BhP_09.04.004/1 tāṃstvaṃ śaṃsaya sūkte dve vaiśvadeve mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tān tvam śaṃsaya sūkte dve vaiśvadeve mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.004/2 te svaryanto dhanaṃ satra pariśeṣitamātmanaḥ
analyzed: te svar yantaḥ dhanam satra pariśeṣitam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.005/1 dāsyanti te 'tha tān arccha tathā sa kṛtavān yathā
analyzed: dāsyanti te tha tān tathā sa kṛtavān yathā

original: BhP_09.04.005/2 tasmai dattvā yayuḥ svargaṃ te satrapariśeṣaṇam
analyzed: tasmai dattvā yayuḥ svargam te satra pariśeṣaṇam

original: BhP_09.04.006/1 taṃ kaścit svīkariṣyantaṃ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇadarśanaḥ
analyzed: tam kaścid svīkariṣyantam puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa darśanaḥ
uvāca uttaratas bhyetya mama idam vāstukam vasu
mama idam ṛṣibhiḥ dattam iti tarhi sma mānavaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.007/2 syān nau te pitari praśnaḥ pṛṣṭavān pitaraṃ yathā
analyzed: syāt nau te pitari praśnaḥ pṛṣṭavān pitaram yathā
yajña vāstu gatam sarvam ucchiṣṭam ṛṣayaḥ kvacid

original: BhP_09.04.008/2 cakrurhi bhāgaṃ rudrāya sa devaḥ sarvamarhati
analyzed: cakruḥ hi bhāgam rudrāya sa devaḥ sarvam arhati

original: BhP_09.04.009/1 nābhāgastaṃ praṇamyāha taveśa kila vāstukam
analyzed: nābhāgaḥ tam praṇamya āha tava īśa kila vāstukam

original: BhP_09.04.009/2 ityāha me pitā brahmañ chirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
analyzed: iti āha me pitā brahmam śirasā tvām prasādaye

original: BhP_09.04.010/1 yat te pitāvadaddharmaṃ tvaṃ ca satyaṃ prabhāṣase
analyzed: yat te pitā avadat dharmam tvam ca satyam prabhāṣase

original: BhP_09.04.010/2 dadāmi te mantradṛśo jñānaṃ brahma sanātanam
analyzed: dadāmi te mantra dṛśaḥ jñānam brahma sanātanam
gṛhāṇa draviṇam dattam mad satra pariśeṣitam
iti uktvā antarhitaḥ rudraḥ bhagavān dharma vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.012/1 ya etat saṃsmaret prātaḥ sāyaṃ ca susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ etat saṃsmaret prātar sāyam ca su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.012/2 kavirbhavati mantrajño gatiṃ caiva tathātmanaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ bhavati mantra jñaḥ gatim ca eva tathā ātmanaḥ
nābhāgāt ambarīṣaḥ bhūt mahā bhāgavataḥ kṛtī

original: BhP_09.04.013/2 nāspṛśadbrahmaśāpo 'pi yaṃ na pratihataḥ kvacit
analyzed: na aspṛśat brahma śāpaḥ u pi yam na pratihataḥ kvacid
śrī rājā uvāca
bhagavan śrotum icchāmi rājarṣeḥ tasya dhīmataḥ

original: BhP_09.04.014/2 na prābhūdyatra nirmukto brahmadaṇḍo duratyayaḥ
analyzed: na prābhūt yatra nirmuktaḥ brahmadaṇḍaḥ duratyayaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
ambarīṣaḥ mahābhāgaḥ sapta dvīpavatīm mahīm

original: BhP_09.04.015/2 avyayāṃ ca śriyaṃ labdhvā vibhavaṃ cātulaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: avyayām ca śriyam labdhvā vibhavam ca atulam bhuvi

original: BhP_09.04.016/1 mene 'tidurlabhaṃ puṃsāṃ sarvaṃ tat svapnasaṃstutam
analyzed: mene ti durlabham puṃsām sarvam tat svapna saṃstutam

original: BhP_09.04.016/2 vidvān vibhavanirvāṇaṃ tamo viśati yat pumān
analyzed: vidvān vibhava nirvāṇam tamaḥ viśati yat pumān

original: BhP_09.04.017/1 vāsudeve bhagavati tadbhakteṣu ca sādhuṣu
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati tad bhakteṣu ca sādhuṣu

original: BhP_09.04.017/2 prāpto bhāvaṃ paraṃ viśvaṃ yenedaṃ loṣṭravat smṛtam
analyzed: prāptaḥ bhāvam param viśvam yena idam loṣṭra vat smṛtam

original: BhP_09.04.018/1 sa vai manaḥ kṛṣṇapadāravindayor vacāṃsi vaikuṇṭhaguṇānuvarṇane
analyzed: sa vai manaḥ kṛṣṇa pada aravindayoḥ vacāṃsi vaikuṇṭha guṇa anuvarṇane
karau hareḥ mandira mārjana ādiṣu śrutim cakāra acyuta sat kathā udaye
mukunda liṅga ālaya darśane dṛśau tad bhṛtya gātra sparśe ṅga saṅgamam

original: BhP_09.04.019/2 ghrāṇaṃ ca tatpādasarojasaurabhe śrīmattulasyā rasanāṃ tadarpite
analyzed: ghrāṇam ca tad pāda saroja saurabhe śrīmat tulasyāḥ rasanām tad arpite

original: BhP_09.04.020/1 pādau hareḥ kṣetrapadānusarpaṇe śiro hṛṣīkeśapadābhivandane
analyzed: pādau hareḥ kṣetra pada anusarpaṇe śiraḥ hṛṣīkeśa pada abhivandane

original: BhP_09.04.020/2 kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāmakāmyayā yathottamaślokajanāśrayā ratiḥ
analyzed: kāmam ca dāsye na tu kāma kāmyayā yathā uttamaśloka jana āśrayā ratiḥ

original: BhP_09.04.021/1 evaṃ sadā karmakalāpamātmanaḥ pare 'dhiyajñe bhagavatyadhokṣaje
analyzed: evam sadā karma kalāpam ātmanaḥ pare dhi yajñe bhagavati adhokṣaje

original: BhP_09.04.021/2 sarvātmabhāvaṃ vidadhan mahīmimāṃ tanniṣṭhaviprābhihitaḥ śaśāsa ha
analyzed: sarva ātma bhāvam vidadhan mahīm imām tad niṣṭha vipra abhihitaḥ śaśāsa ha
īje śvamedhaiḥ adhiyajñam īśvaram mahā vibhūtyā upacita aṅga dakṣiṇaiḥ
tataiḥ vasiṣṭha asita gautama ādibhiḥ dhanvani abhisrotam asau sarasvatīm

original: BhP_09.04.023/1 yasya kratuṣu gīrvāṇaiḥ sadasyā ṛtvijo janāḥ
analyzed: yasya kratuṣu gīrvāṇaiḥ sadasyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ janāḥ
tulya rūpāḥ ca animiṣāḥ vyadṛśyanta su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.024/1 svargo na prārthito yasya manujairamarapriyaḥ
analyzed: svargaḥ na prārthitaḥ yasya manujaiḥ amara priyaḥ
śṛṇvadbhiḥ upagāyadbhiḥ uttamaśloka ceṣṭitam
saṃvardhayanti yat kāmāḥ svārājya paribhāvitāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.025/2 durlabhā nāpi siddhānāṃ mukundaṃ hṛdi paśyataḥ
analyzed: durlabhā nā api siddhānām mukundam hṛdi paśyataḥ

original: BhP_09.04.026/1 sa itthaṃ bhaktiyogena tapoyuktena pārthivaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham bhakti yogena tapaḥ yuktena pārthivaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.026/2 svadharmeṇa hariṃ prīṇan sarvān kāmān śanairjahau
analyzed: svadharmeṇa harim prīṇan sarvān kāmān śanais jahau

original: BhP_09.04.027/1 gṛheṣu dāreṣu suteṣu bandhuṣu dvipottamasyandanavājivastuṣu
analyzed: gṛheṣu dāreṣu suteṣu bandhuṣu dvipa uttama syandana vāji vastuṣu
akṣayya ratna ābharaṇa ambara ādiṣu ananta kośeṣu akarot asat matim
tasmai adāt hariḥ cakram pratyanīka bhaya āvaham
ekānta bhakti bhāvena prītaḥ bhakta abhirakṣaṇam
ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam mahiṣyā tulya śīlayā

original: BhP_09.04.029/2 yuktaḥ sāṃvatsaraṃ vīro dadhāra dvādaśīvratam
analyzed: yuktaḥ sāṃvatsaram vīraḥ dadhāra dvādaśīvratam

original: BhP_09.04.030/1 vratānte kārtike māsi trirātraṃ samupoṣitaḥ
analyzed: vrata ante kārtike māsi tri rātram samupoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.030/2 snātaḥ kadācit kālindyāṃ hariṃ madhuvane 'rcayat
analyzed: snātaḥ kadācid kālindyām harim madhuvane rcayat
mahā abhiṣeka vidhinā sarva upaskara sampadā
abhiṣicya ambara ākalpaiḥ gandha mālya arhaṇa ādibhiḥ
tad gata antara bhāvena pūjayāmāsa keśavam

original: BhP_09.04.032/2 brāhmaṇāṃśca mahābhāgān siddhārthān api bhaktitaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇān ca mahābhāgān siddhārthān api bhaktitaḥ
gavām rukma viṣāṇīnām rūpya aṅghrīṇām su vāsasām
vatsa upaskara sampadām

original: BhP_09.04.034/1 prāhiṇot sādhuviprebhyo gṛheṣu nyarbudāni ṣaṭ
analyzed: prāhiṇot sādhu viprebhyaḥ gṛheṣu nyarbudāni ṣaḍ

original: BhP_09.04.034/2 bhojayitvā dvijān agre svādv annaṃ guṇavattamam
analyzed: bhojayitvā dvijān agre svādu annam guṇavattamam
labdha kāmaiḥ anujñātaḥ pāraṇāya upacakrame

original: BhP_09.04.035/2 tasya tarhyatithiḥ sākṣāddurvāsā bhagavān abhūt
analyzed: tasya tarhi atithiḥ sākṣāt durvāsāḥ bhagavān abhūt
tam ānarca atithim bhūpaḥ pratyutthāna āsana arhaṇaiḥ
yayāce bhyavahārāya pāda mūlam upāgataḥ

original: BhP_09.04.037/1 pratinandya sa tāṃ yācñāṃ kartumāvaśyakaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: pratinandya sa tām yācñām kartum āvaśyakam gataḥ
nimamajja bṛhat dhyāyan kālindī salile śubhe
muhūrta ardha avaśiṣṭāyām dvādaśyām pāraṇam prati
cintayāmāsa dharma jñaḥ dvijaiḥ tad dharma saṅkaṭe
brāhmaṇa atikrame doṣaḥ dvādaśyām yat apāraṇe

original: BhP_09.04.039/2 yat kṛtvā sādhu me bhūyādadharmo vā na māṃ spṛśet
analyzed: yat kṛtvā sādhu me bhūyāt adharmaḥ vā na mām spṛśet
ambhasā kevalena atha kariṣye vrata pāraṇam

original: BhP_09.04.040/2 āhurabbhakṣaṇaṃ viprā hyaśitaṃ nāśitaṃ ca tat
analyzed: āhuḥ ap bhakṣaṇam viprāḥ hi aśitam na aśitam ca tat
iti apaḥ prāśya rājarṣiḥ cintayan manasā acyutam
pratyacaṣṭa kuru śreṣṭha dvija āgamanam eva saḥ
durvāsāḥ yamunā kūlāt kṛta āvaśyakaḥ āgataḥ
rājñā abhinanditaḥ tasya bubudhe ceṣṭitam dhiyā
manyunā pracalat gātraḥ bhrukuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ
bubhukṣitaḥ ca sutarām kṛtāñjalim abhāṣata

original: BhP_09.04.044/1 aho asya nṛśaṃsasya śriyonmattasya paśyata
analyzed: aho asya nṛśaṃsasya śriyā unmattasya paśyata
dharma vyatikramam viṣṇoḥ abhaktasya īśa māninaḥ
yaḥ mām atithim āyātam ātithyena nimantrya ca

original: BhP_09.04.045/2 adattvā bhuktavāṃstasya sadyaste darśaye phalam
analyzed: a dattvā bhuktavān tasya sadyas te darśaye phalam

original: BhP_09.04.046/1 evaṃ bruvāṇa utkṛtya jaṭāṃ roṣapradīpitaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇaḥ utkṛtya jaṭām roṣa pradīpitaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.046/2 tayā sa nirmame tasmai kṛtyāṃ kālānalopamām
analyzed: tayā sa nirmame tasmai kṛtyām kāla anala upamām
tām āpatantīm jvalatīm asi hastām padā bhuvam

original: BhP_09.04.047/2 vepayantīṃ samudvīkṣya na cacāla padān nṛpaḥ
analyzed: vepayantīm samudvīkṣya na cacāla padāt nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.048/1 prāg diṣṭaṃ bhṛtyarakṣāyāṃ puruṣeṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: prāk diṣṭam bhṛtya rakṣāyām puruṣeṇa mahātmanā

original: BhP_09.04.048/2 dadāha kṛtyāṃ tāṃ cakraṃ kruddhāhimiva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: dadāha kṛtyām tām cakram kruddha ahim iva pāvakaḥ
tat abhidravat udvīkṣya sva prayāsam ca niṣphalam

original: BhP_09.04.049/2 durvāsā dudruve bhīto dikṣu prāṇaparīpsayā
analyzed: durvāsāḥ dudruve bhītaḥ dikṣu prāṇa parīpsayā
tam anvadhāvat bhagavat rathāṅgam dāva agniḥ uddhūta śikhaḥ yathā ahim

original: BhP_09.04.050/2 tathānuṣaktaṃ munirīkṣamāṇo guhāṃ vivikṣuḥ prasasāra meroḥ
analyzed: tathā anuṣaktam muniḥ īkṣamāṇaḥ guhām vivikṣuḥ prasasāra meroḥ

original: BhP_09.04.051/1 diśo nabhaḥ kṣmāṃ vivarān samudrān lokān sapālāṃstridivaṃ gataḥ saḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ nabhaḥ kṣmām vivarān samudrān lokān sa pālān tridivam gataḥ saḥ

original: BhP_09.04.051/2 yato yato dhāvati tatra tatra sudarśanaṃ duṣprasahaṃ dadarśa
analyzed: yatas yatas dhāvati tatra tatra sudarśanam duṣprasaham dadarśa

original: BhP_09.04.052/1 alabdhanāthaḥ sa sadā kutaścit santrastacitto 'raṇameṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: alabdha nāthaḥ sa sadā kutaścid santrasta cittaḥ raṇam eṣamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.052/2 devaṃ viriñcaṃ samagādvidhātas trāhyātmayone 'jitatejaso mām
analyzed: devam viriñcam samagāt vidhātar trāhi ātmayone jita tejasaḥ mām
śrī brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_09.04.053/1 sthānaṃ madīyaṃ sahaviśvametat krīḍāvasāne dviparārdhasaṃjñe
analyzed: sthānam madīyam saha viśvam etat krīḍā avasāne dvi parārdha saṃjñe

original: BhP_09.04.053/2 bhrūbhaṅgamātreṇa hi sandidhakṣoḥ kālātmano yasya tirobhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅga mātreṇa hi sandidhakṣoḥ kāla ātmanaḥ yasya tirobhaviṣyati
aham bhavaḥ dakṣa bhṛgu pradhānāḥ prajā īśa bhūteśa sureśa mukhyāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.054/2 sarve vayaṃ yanniyamaṃ prapannā mūrdhnyārpitaṃ lokahitaṃ vahāmaḥ
analyzed: sarve vayam yat niyamam prapannāḥ mūrdhni ārpitam loka hitam vahāmaḥ
pratyākhyātaḥ viriñcena viṣṇu cakra upatāpitaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.055/2 durvāsāḥ śaraṇaṃ yātaḥ śarvaṃ kailāsavāsinam
analyzed: durvāsāḥ śaraṇam yātaḥ śarvam kailāsa vāsinam
uvāca

original: BhP_09.04.056/1 vayaṃ na tāta prabhavāma bhūmni yasmin pare 'nye 'pyajajīvakośāḥ
analyzed: vayam na tāta prabhavāma bhūmni yasmin pare nye pyaja jīva kośāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.056/2 bhavanti kāle na bhavanti hīdṛśāḥ sahasraśo yatra vayaṃ bhramāmaḥ
analyzed: bhavanti kāle na bhavanti hi īdṛśāḥ sahasraśas yatra vayam bhramāmaḥ

original: BhP_09.04.057/1 ahaṃ sanatkumāraśca nārado bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: aham sanatkumāraḥ ca nāradaḥ bhagavān ajaḥ
kapilaḥ pāntaratamaḥ devalaḥ dharmaḥ āsuriḥ
marīci pramukhāḥ ca anye siddha īśāḥ pāra darśanāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.058/2 vidāma na vayaṃ sarve yanmāyāṃ māyayāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: vidāma na vayam sarve yat māyām māyayā āvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.059/1 tasya viśveśvarasyedaṃ śastraṃ durviṣahaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: tasya viśveśvarasya idam śastram durviṣaham hi naḥ

original: BhP_09.04.059/2 tamevaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāhi hariste śaṃ vidhāsyati
analyzed: tam evam śaraṇam yāhi hariḥ te śam vidhāsyati

original: BhP_09.04.060/1 tato nirāśo durvāsāḥ padaṃ bhagavato yayau
analyzed: tatas nirāśaḥ durvāsāḥ padam bhagavataḥ yayau

original: BhP_09.04.060/2 vaikuṇṭhākhyaṃ yadadhyāste śrīnivāsaḥ śriyā saha
analyzed: vaikuṇṭha ākhyam yat adhyāste śrīnivāsaḥ śriyā saha
sandahyamānaḥ jita śastra vahninā tad pāda mūle patitaḥ sa vepathuḥ

original: BhP_09.04.061/2 āhācyutānanta sadīpsita prabho kṛtāgasaṃ māvahi viśvabhāvana
analyzed: āha acyuta ananta sat īpsita prabho kṛta āgasam mā avahi viśvabhāvana

original: BhP_09.04.062/1 ajānatā te paramānubhāvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayāghaṃ bhavataḥ priyāṇām
analyzed: a jānatā te parama anubhāvam kṛtam mayā agham bhavataḥ priyāṇām

original: BhP_09.04.062/2 vidhehi tasyāpacitiṃ vidhātar mucyeta yannāmnyudite nārako 'pi
analyzed: vidhehi tasya apacitim vidhātar mucyeta yad nāmni udite
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_09.04.063/1 ahaṃ bhaktaparādhīno hyasvatantra iva dvija
analyzed: aham bhakta para adhīnaḥ hi asvatantraḥ iva dvija
sādhubhiḥ grasta hṛdayaḥ bhaktaiḥ bhakta jana priyaḥ
na aham ātmānam āśāse mad bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ vinā

original: BhP_09.04.064/2 śriyaṃ cātyantikīṃ brahman yeṣāṃ gatirahaṃ parā
analyzed: śriyam ca ātyantikīm brahman yeṣām gatiḥ aham parā

original: BhP_09.04.065/1 ye dārāgāraputrāpta prāṇān vittamimaṃ param
analyzed: ye dāra āgāra putra āpta prāṇān vittam imam param

original: BhP_09.04.065/2 hitvā māṃ śaraṇaṃ yātāḥ kathaṃ tāṃstyaktumutsahe
analyzed: hitvā mām śaraṇam yātāḥ katham tān tyaktum utsahe
mayi nirbaddha hṛdayāḥ sādhavaḥ sama darśanāḥ

original: BhP_09.04.066/2 vaśe kurvanti māṃ bhaktyā satstriyaḥ satpatiṃ yathā
analyzed: vaśe kurvanti mām bhaktyā sat striyaḥ sat patim yathā
mad sevayā pratītam te sālokya ādi catuṣṭayam

original: BhP_09.04.067/2 necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kālaviplutam
analyzed: na icchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kutas kāla viplutam

original: BhP_09.04.068/1 sādhavo hṛdayaṃ mahyaṃ sādhūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ tv aham
analyzed: sādhavaḥ hṛdayam mahyam sādhūnām hṛdayam tu aham

original: BhP_09.04.068/2 madanyat te na jānanti nāhaṃ tebhyo manāg api
analyzed: mat anyat te na jānanti na aham tebhyaḥ manāk api

original: BhP_09.04.069/1 upāyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tava vipra śṛṇuṣva tat
analyzed: upāyam kathayiṣyāmi tava vipra śṛṇuṣva tat

original: BhP_09.04.069/2 ayaṃ hyātmābhicāraste yatastaṃ yāhi mā ciram
analyzed: ayam hi ātmābhicāraḥ te yatas tam yāhi mā ciram

original: BhP_09.04.069/3 sādhuṣu prahitaṃ tejaḥ prahartuḥ kurute 'śivam
analyzed: sādhuṣu prahitam tejaḥ prahartuḥ kurute śivam

original: BhP_09.04.070/1 tapo vidyā ca viprāṇāṃ niḥśreyasakare ubhe
analyzed: tapaḥ vidyā ca viprāṇām niḥśreyasa kare ubhe

original: BhP_09.04.070/2 te eva durvinītasya kalpete karturanyathā
analyzed: te eva durvinītasya kalpete kartuḥ anyathā

original: BhP_09.04.071/1 brahmaṃstadgaccha bhadraṃ te nābhāgatanayaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: brahman tat gaccha bhadram te nābhāga tanayam nṛpam
kṣamāpaya mahābhāgam tatas śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ durvāsāḥ cakra tāpitaḥ
ambarīṣam upāvṛtya tad pādau duḥkhitaḥ grahīt
tasya sa udyamam ā vīkṣya pāda sparśa vilajjitaḥ

original: BhP_09.05.002/2 astāvīt taddharerastraṃ kṛpayā pīḍito bhṛśam
analyzed: astāvīt tat hareḥ astram kṛpayā pīḍitaḥ bhṛśam
ambarīṣaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.05.003/1 tvamagnirbhagavān sūryastvaṃ somo jyotiṣāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tvam agniḥ bhagavān sūryaḥ tvam somaḥ jyotiṣām patiḥ
tvam āpaḥ tvam kṣitiḥ vyoma vāyuḥ mātrā indriyāṇi ca
sudarśana namaḥ tubhyam sahasra ara acyuta priya

original: BhP_09.05.004/2 sarvāstraghātin viprāya svasti bhūyā iḍaspate
analyzed: sarva astra ghātin viprāya svasti bhūyāḥ iḍaspate

original: BhP_09.05.005/1 tvaṃ dharmastvamṛtaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ yajño 'khilayajñabhuk
analyzed: tvam dharmaḥ tu amṛtam satyam tvam khila yajña bhuj

original: BhP_09.05.005/2 tvaṃ lokapālaḥ sarvātmā tvaṃ tejaḥ pauruṣaṃ param
analyzed: tvam lokapālaḥ sarva ātmā tvam tejaḥ pauruṣam param
namaḥ sunābha akhila dharma setave hi adharma śīla asura dhūma ketave
trailokya gopāya viśuddha varcase manaḥ javāya adbhuta karmaṇe gṛṇe

original: BhP_09.05.007/1 tvattejasā dharmamayena saṃhṛtaṃ tamaḥ prakāśaśca dṛśo mahātmanām
analyzed: tvad tejasā dharma mayena saṃhṛtam tamaḥ prakāśaḥ ca dṛśaḥ mahātmanām

original: BhP_09.05.007/2 duratyayaste mahimā girāṃ pate tvadrūpametat sadasat parāvaram
analyzed: duratyayaḥ te mahimā girām pate tvad rūpam etat sat asat parāvaram

original: BhP_09.05.008/1 yadā visṛṣṭastvamanañjanena vai balaṃ praviṣṭo 'jita daityadānavam
analyzed: yadā visṛṣṭaḥ tvam anañjanena vai balam praviṣṭaḥ jita daitya dānavam
bāhu udara ūru aṅghri śirodharāṇi vṛścan ajasram pradhane virājase

original: BhP_09.05.009/1 sa tvaṃ jagattrāṇa khalaprahāṇaye nirūpitaḥ sarvasaho gadābhṛtā
analyzed: sa tvam jagattrāṇa khala prahāṇaye nirūpitaḥ sarva sahaḥ gadābhṛtā

original: BhP_09.05.009/2 viprasya cāsmatkuladaivahetave vidhehi bhadraṃ tadanugraho hi naḥ
analyzed: viprasya ca asmad kula daiva hetave vidhehi bhadram tad anugrahaḥ hi naḥ

original: BhP_09.05.010/1 yadyasti dattamiṣṭaṃ vā svadharmo vā svanuṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: yadi asti dattam iṣṭam vā svadharmaḥ vā su anuṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_09.05.010/2 kulaṃ no vipradaivaṃ ceddvijo bhavatu vijvaraḥ
analyzed: kulam naḥ vipra daivam ced dvijaḥ bhavatu vijvaraḥ

original: BhP_09.05.011/1 yadi no bhagavān prīta ekaḥ sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yadi naḥ bhagavān prītaḥ ekaḥ sarva guṇa āśrayaḥ
sarva bhūta ātma bhāvena dvijaḥ bhavatu vijvaraḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.05.012/1 iti saṃstuvato rājño viṣṇucakraṃ sudarśanam
analyzed: iti saṃstuvataḥ rājñaḥ viṣṇu cakram sudarśanam
aśāmyat sarvatas vipram pradahat rāja yācñayā
sa muktaḥ strā agni tāpena durvāsāḥ svastimān tatas
praśaśaṃsa tam urvī īśam yuñjānaḥ parama āśiṣaḥ
durvāsāḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.05.014/1 aho anantadāsānāṃ mahattvaṃ dṛṣṭamadya me
analyzed: aho ananta dāsānām mahat tvam dṛṣṭam adya me
kṛta āgasaḥ yat rājan maṅgalāni samīhase

original: BhP_09.05.015/1 duṣkaraḥ ko nu sādhūnāṃ dustyajo vā mahātmanām
analyzed: duṣkaraḥ kaḥ nu sādhūnām dustyajaḥ vā mahātmanām

original: BhP_09.05.015/2 yaiḥ saṅgṛhīto bhagavān sātvatāmṛṣabho hariḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhagavān sātvatām ṛṣabhaḥ hariḥ
yad nāma śruti mātreṇa pumān bhavati nirmalaḥ

original: BhP_09.05.016/2 tasya tīrthapadaḥ kiṃ vā dāsānāmavaśiṣyate
analyzed: tasya tīrtha padaḥ kim vā dāsānām avaśiṣyate
rājan anugṛhītaḥ ham tvayā ati karuṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_09.05.017/2 madaghaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā prāṇā yan me 'bhirakṣitāḥ
analyzed: mad agham pṛṣṭhatas kṛtvā prāṇāḥ yat me bhirakṣitāḥ
rājā tam akṛta āhāraḥ pratyāgamana kāṅkṣayā
caraṇau upasaṅgṛhya prasādya samabhojayat
saḥ śitvā ādṛtam ānītam ātithyam sārvakāmikam

original: BhP_09.05.019/2 tṛptātmā nṛpatiṃ prāha bhujyatāmiti sādaram
analyzed: tṛpta ātmā nṛpatim prāha bhujyatām iti sādaram
prītaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi tava bhāgavatasya vai
darśana sparśana ālāpaiḥ ātithyena ātma medhasā

original: BhP_09.05.021/1 karmāvadātametat te gāyanti svaḥstriyo muhuḥ
analyzed: karma avadātam etat te gāyanti svaḥstriyaḥ muhur

original: BhP_09.05.021/2 kīrtiṃ paramapuṇyāṃ ca kīrtayiṣyati bhūriyam
analyzed: kīrtim parama puṇyām ca kīrtayiṣyati bhūḥ iyam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.05.022/1 evaṃ saṅkīrtya rājānaṃ durvāsāḥ paritoṣitaḥ
analyzed: evam saṅkīrtya rājānam durvāsāḥ paritoṣitaḥ
yayau vihāyasā āmantrya brahma lokam ahaitukam
tyagāt tāvat yāvatā na agataḥ gataḥ
muniḥ tad darśana ākāṅkṣaḥ rāja abbhakṣaḥ babhūva ha
gate tha durvāsasi saḥ mbarīṣaḥ dvija upayoga ati pavitram āharat

original: BhP_09.05.024/2 ṛṣervimokṣaṃ vyasanaṃ ca vīkṣya mene svavīryaṃ ca parānubhāvam
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ vimokṣam vyasanam ca vīkṣya mene sva vīryam ca para anubhāvam

original: BhP_09.05.025/1 evaṃ vidhānekaguṇaḥ sa rājā parātmani brahmaṇi vāsudeve
analyzed: evam vidha aneka guṇaḥ sa rājā parātmani brahmaṇi vāsudeve

original: BhP_09.05.025/2 kriyākalāpaiḥ samuvāha bhaktiṃ yayāviriñcyān nirayāṃścakāra
analyzed: kriyā kalāpaiḥ samuvāha bhaktim yayā a viriñcyāt nirayān cakāra
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.05.026/1 athāmbarīṣastanayeṣu rājyaṃ samānaśīleṣu visṛjya dhīraḥ
analyzed: atha ambarīṣaḥ tanayeṣu rājyam samāna śīleṣu visṛjya dhīraḥ

original: BhP_09.05.026/2 vanaṃ viveśātmani vāsudeve mano dadhaddhvastaguṇapravāhaḥ
analyzed: vanam viveśa ātmani vāsudeve manaḥ dadhat dhvasta guṇa pravāhaḥ
iti etat puṇyam ākhyānam ambarīṣasya bhūpate
saṅkīrtayan anudhyāyan bhaktaḥ bhagavataḥ bhavet

original: BhP_09.05.028/1 ambarīṣasya caritaṃ ye śṛṇvanti mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: ambarīṣasya caritam ye śṛṇvanti mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.05.028/2 muktiṃ prayānti te sarve bhaktyā viṣṇoḥ prasādataḥ
analyzed: muktim prayānti te sarve bhaktyā viṣṇoḥ prasādataḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
virūpaḥ ketumān śambhuḥ ambarīṣa sutāḥ trayaḥ
virūpāt pṛṣadaśvaḥ bhūt tad putraḥ tu rathītaraḥ
rathītarasya aprajasya bhāryāyām tantave rthitaḥ
aṅgirāḥ janayāmāsa brahma varcasvinaḥ sutān

original: BhP_09.06.003/1 ete kṣetraprasūtā vai punastv āṅgirasāḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: ete kṣetra prasūtāḥ vai punar tu āṅgirasāḥ smṛtāḥ
rathītarāṇām pravarāḥ kṣetra upetāḥ dvijātayaḥ
kṣuvataḥ tu manoḥ jajñe ikṣvākuḥ ghrāṇataḥ sutaḥ
tasya putra śata jyeṣṭhāḥ vikukṣi nimi daṇḍakāḥ
teṣām purastāt abhavan nāryāvarte nṛpāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_09.06.005/2 pañcaviṃśatiḥ paścāc ca trayo madhye 'pare 'nyataḥ
analyzed: pañcaviṃśatiḥ paścāt ca trayaḥ madhye pare nyatas
saḥ ekadā aṣṭakā śrāddhe ikṣvākuḥ sutam ādiśat

original: BhP_09.06.006/2 māṃsamānīyatāṃ medhyaṃ vikukṣe gaccha mā ciram
analyzed: māṃsam ānīyatām medhyam vikukṣe gaccha mā ciram

original: BhP_09.06.007/1 tatheti sa vanaṃ gatvā mṛgān hatvā kriyārhaṇān
analyzed: tathā iti sa vanam gatvā mṛgān hatvā kriyā arhaṇān

original: BhP_09.06.007/2 śrānto bubhukṣito vīraḥ śaśaṃ cādadapasmṛtiḥ
analyzed: śrāntaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ vīraḥ śaśam ca adat apasmṛtiḥ

original: BhP_09.06.008/1 śeṣaṃ nivedayāmāsa pitre tena ca tadguruḥ
analyzed: śeṣam nivedayāmāsa pitre tena ca tad guruḥ
coditaḥ prokṣaṇāya āha duṣṭam etat akarmakam

original: BhP_09.06.009/1 jñātvā putrasya tat karma guruṇābhihitaṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā putrasya tat karma guruṇā abhihitam nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.009/2 deśān niḥsārayāmāsa sutaṃ tyaktavidhiṃ ruṣā
analyzed: deśāt niḥsārayāmāsa sutam tyakta vidhim ruṣā

original: BhP_09.06.010/1 sa tu vipreṇa saṃvādaṃ jñāpakena samācaran
analyzed: sa tu vipreṇa saṃvādam jñāpakena samācaran

original: BhP_09.06.010/2 tyaktvā kalevaraṃ yogī sa tenāvāpa yat param
analyzed: tyaktvā kalevaram yogī sa tena avāpa yat param
pitari uparate bhyetya vikukṣiḥ pṛthivīm imām

original: BhP_09.06.011/2 śāsadīje hariṃ yajñaiḥ śaśāda iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: śāsat īje harim yajñaiḥ śaśādaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
purañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ indravāhaḥ iti īritaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.012/2 kakutstha iti cāpyuktaḥ śṛṇu nāmāni karmabhiḥ
analyzed: kakutsthaḥ iti ca api uktaḥ śṛṇu nāmāni karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_09.06.013/1 kṛtānta āsīt samaro devānāṃ saha dānavaiḥ
analyzed: kṛtāntaḥ āsīt samaraḥ devānām saha dānavaiḥ
pārṣṇigrāhaḥ vṛtaḥ vīraḥ devaiḥ daitya parājitaiḥ
vacanāt devadevasya viṣṇoḥ viśvātmanaḥ prabhoḥ
vāhana tve vṛtaḥ tasya babhūva indraḥ mahā vṛṣaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.015/1 sa sannaddho dhanurdivyamādāya viśikhān chitān
analyzed: sa sannaddhaḥ dhanuḥ divyam ādāya viśikhān chitān
stūyamānaḥ tam āruhya yuyutsuḥ kakudi sthitaḥ
tejasā āpyāyitaḥ viṣṇoḥ puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.016/2 pratīcyāṃ diśi daityānāṃ nyaruṇat tridaśaiḥ puram
analyzed: pratīcyām diśi daityānām nyaruṇat tridaśaiḥ puram

original: BhP_09.06.017/1 taistasya cābhūt pradhanaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: taiḥ tasya ca abhūt pradhanam tumulam loma harṣaṇam
yamāya bhallaiḥ anayat daityān abhiyayuḥ mṛdhe
tasya iṣu pāta abhimukham yugānta agnim iva ulbaṇam
visṛjya dudruvuḥ daityāḥ hanyamānāḥ svam ālayam

original: BhP_09.06.019/1 jitvā paraṃ dhanaṃ sarvaṃ sastrīkaṃ vajrapāṇaye
analyzed: jitvā param dhanam sarvam sa strīkam vajrapāṇaye
pratyayacchat sa rājarṣiḥ iti nāmabhiḥ āhṛtaḥ
purañjayasya putraḥ bhūdanenāḥ tad sutaḥ pṛthuḥ
viśvagandhiḥ tatas candraḥ yuvanāśvaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.021/1 śrāvastastatsuto yena śrāvastī nirmame purī
analyzed: śrāvastaḥ tad sutaḥ yena śrāvastī nirmame purī
bṛhadaśvaḥ tu śrāvastiḥ tatas kuvalayāśvakaḥ
yaḥ priya artham utaṅkasya dhundhu nāma asuram balī
sutānām ekaviṃśatyā sahasraiḥ ahanat vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.023/1 dhundhumāra iti khyātastatsutāste ca jajvaluḥ
analyzed: dhundhumāraḥ iti khyātaḥ tad sutāḥ te ca jajvaluḥ
dhundhoḥ mukha agninā sarve trayaḥ eva avaśeṣitāḥ

original: BhP_09.06.024/1 dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaśca bhadrāśva iti bhārata
analyzed: dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaḥ ca bhadrāśvaḥ iti bhārata
dṛḍhāśva putraḥ haryaśvaḥ nikumbhaḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
bahulāśvaḥ nikumbhasya kṛśāśvaḥ thā asya senajit

original: BhP_09.06.025/2 yuvanāśvo 'bhavat tasya so 'napatyo vanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yuvanāśvaḥ bhavat tasya saḥ napatyaḥ vanam gataḥ
bhāryā śatena nirviṇṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ sya kṛpālavaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.026/2 iṣṭiṃ sma vartayāṃ cakruraindrīṃ te susamāhitāḥ
analyzed: iṣṭim sma cakruḥ aindrīm te su samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_09.06.027/1 rājā tadyajñasadanaṃ praviṣṭo niśi tarṣitaḥ
analyzed: rājā tad yajña sadanam praviṣṭaḥ niśi tarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.027/2 dṛṣṭvā śayānān viprāṃstān papau mantrajalaṃ svayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śayānān viprān tān papau mantra jalam svayam

original: BhP_09.06.028/1 utthitāste niśamyātha vyudakaṃ kalaśaṃ prabho
analyzed: utthitāḥ te niśamya atha vyudakam kalaśam prabho

original: BhP_09.06.028/2 papracchuḥ kasya karmedaṃ pītaṃ puṃsavanaṃ jalam
analyzed: papracchuḥ kasya karma idam pītam puṃsavanam jalam

original: BhP_09.06.029/1 rājñā pītaṃ viditvā vai īśvaraprahitena te
analyzed: rājñā pītam viditvā vai īśvara prahitena te
īśvarāya namaḥ cakruḥ aho daiva balam balam

original: BhP_09.06.030/1 tataḥ kāla upāvṛtte kukṣiṃ nirbhidya dakṣiṇam
analyzed: tatas kāle upāvṛtte kukṣim nirbhidya dakṣiṇam
yuvanāśvasya tanayaḥ cakravartī jajāna ha

original: BhP_09.06.031/1 kaṃ dhāsyati kumāro 'yaṃ stanye rorūyate bhṛśam
analyzed: kam dhāsyati kumāraḥ yam stanye rorūyate bhṛśam

original: BhP_09.06.031/2 māṃ dhātā vatsa mā rodīritīndro deśinīmadāt
analyzed: mām dhātā vatsa mā rodīḥ iti indraḥ deśinīm adāt

original: BhP_09.06.032/1 na mamāra pitā tasya vipradevaprasādataḥ
analyzed: na mamāra pitā tasya vipra deva prasādataḥ
yuvanāśvaḥ tha tatra eva tapasā siddhim anvagāt

original: BhP_09.06.033/1 trasaddasyuritīndro 'ṅga vidadhe nāma yasya vai
analyzed: trasaddasyuḥ iti indraḥ ṅga vidadhe nāma yasya vai

original: BhP_09.06.033/2 yasmāt trasanti hyudvignā dasyavo rāvaṇādayaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt trasanti hi udvignāḥ dasyavaḥ rāvaṇa ādayaḥ
yauvanāśvaḥ tha māndhātā cakravartī avanīm prabhuḥ
sapta dvīpavatīm ekaḥ śaśāsa acyuta tejasā
īje ca yajñam kratubhiḥ ātma vid bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ
sarva deva mayam devam sarva ātmakam atīndriyam
dravyam mantraḥ vidhiḥ yajñaḥ yajamānaḥ tathā ṛtvijaḥ
dharmaḥ deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca sarvam etat yad ātmakam

original: BhP_09.06.037/1 yāvat sūrya udeti sma yāvac ca pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yāvat sūryaḥ udeti sma yāvat ca pratitiṣṭhati

original: BhP_09.06.037/2 tat sarvaṃ yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetramucyate
analyzed: tat sarvam yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate
śaśabindoḥ duhitari bindumatyām adhāt nṛpaḥ
purukutsam ambarīṣam mucukundam ca yoginam

original: BhP_09.06.038/3 teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāśat saubhariṃ vavrire patim
analyzed: teṣām svasāraḥ pañcāśat saubharim vavrire patim
yamunā antar jale magnaḥ tapyamānaḥ param tapaḥ
nirvṛtim mīna rājasya dṛṣṭvā maithuna dharmiṇaḥ
jāta spṛhaḥ nṛpam vipraḥ kanyām ekām ayācata

original: BhP_09.06.040/2 so 'pyāha gṛhyatāṃ brahman kāmaṃ kanyā svayaṃvare
analyzed: sā u pi āha gṛhyatām brahman kāmam kanyā svayaṃvare
sa vicintya apriyam strīṇām jaraṭhaḥ hama sat mataḥ
valīpalite ejatkaḥ iti aham pratyudāhṛtaḥ
sādhayiṣye tathā ātmānam sura strīṇām abhīpsitam
kim punar manuja indrāṇām iti vyavasitaḥ prabhuḥ
muniḥ praveśitaḥ kṣatrā kanyā antaḥpuram ṛddhimat

original: BhP_09.06.043/2 vṛtaḥ sa rājakanyābhirekaṃ pañcāśatā varaḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ sa rāja kanyābhiḥ ekam pañcāśatā varaḥ
tāsām kaliḥ abhūt bhūyān tad arthe pohya sauhṛdam

original: BhP_09.06.044/2 mamānurūpo nāyaṃ va iti tadgatacetasām
analyzed: mama anurūpaḥ na ayam vaḥ iti tad gata cetasām
sa bahvṛcaḥ tābhiḥ apa araṇīya tapaḥ śriyā an arghya paricchadeṣu
gṛheṣu nānā upavana amala ambhaḥ saraḥsu saugandhika kānaneṣu
mahārha śayyā āsana vastra bhūṣaṇa snāna anulepa abhyavahāra mālyakaiḥ
su alaṅkṛta strī puruṣeṣu nityadā reme nu gāyat dvija bhṛṅga vandiṣu
yat gārhasthyam tu saṃvīkṣya sapta dvīpavatī patiḥ
vismitaḥ stambham ajahāt sārvabhauma śriyā anvitam

original: BhP_09.06.048/1 evaṃ gṛheṣv abhirato viṣayān vividhaiḥ sukhaiḥ
analyzed: evam gṛheṣu abhirataḥ viṣayān vividhaiḥ sukhaiḥ
sevamānaḥ na cātuṣyat ājya stokaiḥ iva analaḥ
sa kadācid upāsīnaḥ ātma apahnavam ātmanaḥ
dadarśa bahvṛca ācāryaḥ mīna saṅga samutthitam

original: BhP_09.06.050/1 aho imaṃ paśyata me vināśaṃ tapasvinaḥ saccaritavratasya
analyzed: aho imam paśyata me vināśam tapasvinaḥ sat carita vratasya

original: BhP_09.06.050/2 antarjale vāricaraprasaṅgāt pracyāvitaṃ brahma ciraṃ dhṛtaṃ yat
analyzed: antar jale vāricara prasaṅgāt pracyāvitam brahma ciram dhṛtam yat
saṅgam tyajeta mithuna vratīnām mumukṣuḥ
sarva ātmanā na visṛjet bahis indriyāṇi
ekaḥ caran rahasi cittam anantaḥ īśe

original: BhP_09.06.051/4 yuñjīta tadvratiṣu sādhuṣu cet prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: yuñjīta tad vratiṣu sādhuṣu ced prasaṅgaḥ
ekaḥ tapasvī aham atha ambhasi matsya saṅgāt
pañcāśat āsam uta pañca sahasra sargaḥ
na antam vrajāmi ubhaya kṛtya manorathānām
māyā guṇaiḥ hṛta matiḥ viṣaye rtha bhāvaḥ

original: BhP_09.06.053/1 evaṃ vasan gṛhe kālaṃ virakto nyāsamāsthitaḥ
analyzed: evam vasan gṛhe kālam viraktaḥ nyāsam āsthitaḥ
vanam jagāma anuyayuḥ tad patnyaḥ pati devatāḥ
tatra taptvā tapaḥ tīkṣṇam ātma darśanam ātmavān
saha eva agnibhiḥ ātmānam yuyoja paramātmani
tāḥ su apatyuḥ mahā rāja nirīkṣya ādhyātmikīm gatim
anvīyuḥ tad prabhāveṇa agnim śāntam iva arciṣaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
māndhātuḥ putra pravaraḥ yaḥ mbarīṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
pitāmahena pravṛtaḥ yauvanāśvaḥ tu tad sutaḥ
hārītaḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt māndhātṛ pravarāḥ ime
narmadā bhrātṛbhiḥ dattā purukutsāya yā uragaiḥ
tayā rasātalam nītaḥ bhujaga indra prayuktayā

original: BhP_09.07.003/1 gandharvān avadhīt tatra vadhyān vai viṣṇuśaktidhṛk
analyzed: gandharvān avadhīt tatra vadhyān vai viṣṇuśaktidhṛk
nāgāt labdha varaḥ sarpāt abhayam smaratām idam
trasat dasyuḥ paurukutsaḥ yaḥ na araṇyasya dehakṛt
haryaśvaḥ tad sutaḥ tasmāt tribandhanaḥ
tasya satyavrataḥ putraḥ triśaṅkuḥ iti viśrutaḥ
prāptaḥ cāṇḍāla tām śāpāt guroḥ kauśika tejasā

original: BhP_09.07.006/1 saśarīro gataḥ svargamadyāpi divi dṛśyate
analyzed: sa śarīraḥ gataḥ svargam adyā api divi dṛśyate
pātitaḥ vākśirāḥ devaiḥ tena eva stambhitaḥ balāt
traiśaṅkavaḥ hariścandraḥ viśvāmitra vasiṣṭhayoḥ
yad nimittam abhūt yuddham pakṣiṇoḥ bahu vārṣikam
saḥ napatyaḥ viṣaṇṇa ātmā nāradasya upadeśataḥ

original: BhP_09.07.008/2 varuṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yātaḥ putro me jāyatāṃ prabho
analyzed: varuṇam śaraṇam yātaḥ putraḥ me jāyatām prabho

original: BhP_09.07.009/1 yadi vīro mahārāja tenaiva tvāṃ yaje iti
analyzed: yadi vīraḥ mahā rāja tena eva tvām yaje iti

original: BhP_09.07.009/2 tatheti varuṇenāsya putro jātastu rohitaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti varuṇena asya putraḥ jātaḥ tu rohitaḥ

original: BhP_09.07.010/1 jātaḥ suto hyanenāṅga māṃ yajasveti so 'bravīt
analyzed: jātaḥ sutaḥ hi anena aṅga mām yajasva iti saḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.07.010/2 yadā paśurnirdaśaḥ syādatha medhyo bhavediti
analyzed: yadā paśuḥ nirdaśaḥ syāt atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti

original: BhP_09.07.011/1 nirdaśe ca sa āgatya yajasvetyāha so 'bravīt
analyzed: nirdaśe ca saḥ āgatya yajasva iti āha saḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.07.011/2 dantāḥ paśoryaj jāyerannatha medhyo bhavediti
analyzed: dantāḥ paśoḥ yat jāyeran atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti

original: BhP_09.07.012/1 dantā jātā yajasveti sa pratyāhātha so 'bravīt
analyzed: dantāḥ jātāḥ yajasva iti sa pratyāha atha saḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.07.012/2 yadā patantyasya dantā atha medhyo bhavediti
analyzed: yadā patanti asya dantāḥ atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
paśoḥ nipatitāḥ dantāḥ yajasva iti āha saḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.07.013/2 yadā paśoḥ punardantā jāyante 'tha paśuḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: yadā paśoḥ punardantāḥ jāyante paśuḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_09.07.014/1 punarjātā yajasveti sa pratyāhātha so 'bravīt
analyzed: punar jātā yajasva iti sa pratyāha atha saḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.07.014/2 sānnāhiko yadā rājan rājanyo 'tha paśuḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: sānnāhikaḥ yadā rājan paśuḥ śuciḥ
iti putra anurāgeṇa sneha yantrita cetasā

original: BhP_09.07.015/2 kālaṃ vañcayatā taṃ tamukto devastamaikṣata
analyzed: kālam vañcayatā tam tam uktaḥ devaḥ tam aikṣata
rohitaḥ tat abhijñāya pituḥ karma cikīrṣitam
prāṇa prepsuḥ dhanuṣpāṇiḥ araṇyam pratyapadyata
pitaram varuṇa grastam śrutvā jāta mahodaram
rohitaḥ grāmam eyāya tam indraḥ pratyaṣedhata
bhūmeḥ paryaṭanam puṇyam tīrtha kṣetra niṣevaṇaiḥ
rohitāya ādiśat śakraḥ saḥ pi araṇye vasat samām

original: BhP_09.07.019/1 evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame tathā
analyzed: evam dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame tathā

original: BhP_09.07.019/2 abhyetyābhyetya sthaviro vipro bhūtvāha vṛtrahā
analyzed: abhyetya abhyetya sthaviraḥ vipraḥ bhūtvā āha vṛtrahā

original: BhP_09.07.020/1 ṣaṣṭhaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tatra caritvā rohitaḥ purīm
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham saṃvatsaram tatra caritvā rohitaḥ purīm
upavrajan ajīgartāt akrīṇāt madhyamam sutam

original: BhP_09.07.021/1 śunaḥśephaṃ paśuṃ pitre pradāya samavandata
analyzed: śunaḥśepham paśum pitre pradāya samavandata
tatas puruṣa medhena hariścandraḥ mahā yaśāḥ
mukta udaraḥ yajat devān varuṇa ādīn mahat kathaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ bhavat tasmin hotā ca adhvaryuḥ ātmavān
jamadagniḥ abhūt brahmā vasiṣṭhaḥ yāsyaḥ sāmagaḥ

original: BhP_09.07.023/2 tasmai tuṣṭo dadāv indraḥ śātakaumbhamayaṃ ratham
analyzed: tasmai tuṣṭaḥ dadau indraḥ śātakaumbha mayam ratham
śunaḥśephasya māhātmyam upariṣṭāt pracakṣyate

original: BhP_09.07.024/2 satyaṃ sāraṃ dhṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā sabhāryasya ca bhūpateḥ
analyzed: satyam sāram dhṛtim dṛṣṭvā sa bhāryasya ca bhūpateḥ

original: BhP_09.07.025/1 viśvāmitro bhṛśaṃ prīto dadāv avihatāṃ gatim
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ bhṛśam prītaḥ dadau avihatām gatim
manaḥ pṛthivyām tām adbhiḥ tejasā apaḥ nilena tat

original: BhP_09.07.026/1 khe vāyuṃ dhārayaṃstac ca bhūtādau taṃ mahātmani
analyzed: khe vāyum dhārayan tat ca bhūtādau tam mahātmani

original: BhP_09.07.026/2 tasmin jñānakalāṃ dhyātvā tayājñānaṃ vinirdahan
analyzed: tasmin jñānakalām dhyātvā tayā ajñānam vinirdahan

original: BhP_09.07.027/1 hitvā tāṃ svena bhāvena nirvāṇasukhasaṃvidā
analyzed: hitvā tām svena bhāvena nirvāṇa sukha saṃvidā
anirdeśya apratarkyeṇa tasthau vidhvasta bandhanaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
haritaḥ rohita sutaḥ campaḥ tasmāt vinirmitā

original: BhP_09.08.001/2 campāpurī sudevo 'to vijayo yasya cātmajaḥ
analyzed: campā purī vijayaḥ yasya ca ātmajaḥ
bharukaḥ tad sutaḥ tasmāt vṛkaḥ tasya api bāhukaḥ
saḥ rājā sa bhāryaḥ vanam āviśat

original: BhP_09.08.003/1 vṛddhaṃ taṃ pañcatāṃ prāptaṃ mahiṣyanumariṣyatī
analyzed: vṛddham tam pañcatām prāptam mahiṣī anumariṣyatī
aurveṇa jānatā ātmānam prajāvantam nivāritā
ājñāya asyai sapatnībhiḥ garaḥ dattaḥ ndhasā saha

original: BhP_09.08.004/2 saha tenaiva sañjātaḥ sagarākhyo mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: saha tena eva sañjātaḥ sagara ākhyaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
sagaraḥ cakravartī āsīt sāgaraḥ yad sutaiḥ kṛtaḥ
yaḥ tālajaṅghān yavanām śakān haihaya barbarān
na avadhīt guru vākyena cakre vikṛta veṣiṇaḥ
muṇḍān śmaśru dharān kāṃścid muktakeśa ardha muṇḍitān
an antarvāsasaḥ kāṃścid abahirvāsasaḥ parān
sā u śvamedhaiḥ ayajata sarva veda sura ātmakam
aurva upadiṣṭa yogena harim ātmānam īśvaram

original: BhP_09.08.008/2 tasyotsṛṣṭaṃ paśuṃ yajñe jahārāśvaṃ purandaraḥ
analyzed: tasya utsṛṣṭam paśum yajñe jahāra aśvam purandaraḥ
sumatyāḥ tanayāḥ dṛptāḥ pituḥ ādeśa kāriṇaḥ
hayam anveṣamāṇāḥ te samantāt nyakhanan mahīm

original: BhP_09.08.010/1 prāgudīcyāṃ diśi hayaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapilāntike
analyzed: prāc udīcyām diśi hayam dadṛśuḥ kapila antike
eṣa vāji haraḥ cauraḥ āste mīlita locanaḥ

original: BhP_09.08.011/1 hanyatāṃ hanyatāṃ pāpa iti ṣaṣṭisahasriṇaḥ
analyzed: hanyatām hanyatām pāpaḥ iti ṣaṣṭi sahasriṇaḥ
udāyudhāḥ abhiyayuḥ unmimeṣa tadā muniḥ
sva śarīra agninā tāvat mahā indra hṛta cetasaḥ
mahat vyatikrama hatāḥ bhasmasāt abhavan kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_09.08.013/1 na sādhuvādo munikopabharjitā nṛpendraputrā iti sattvadhāmani
analyzed: na sādhuvādaḥ muni kopa bharjitāḥ nṛpa indra putrāḥ iti sattva dhāmani

original: BhP_09.08.013/2 kathaṃ tamo roṣamayaṃ vibhāvyate jagatpavitrātmani khe rajo bhuvaḥ
analyzed: katham tamaḥ roṣa mayam vibhāvyate jagat pavitra ātmani khe rajaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_09.08.014/1 yasyeritā sāṅkhyamayī dṛḍheha naur yayā mumukṣustarate duratyayam
analyzed: yasya īritā sāṅkhya mayī dṛḍhā iha nauḥ yayā mumukṣuḥ tarate duratyayam

original: BhP_09.08.014/2 bhavārṇavaṃ mṛtyupathaṃ vipaścitaḥ parātmabhūtasya kathaṃ pṛthaṅmatiḥ
analyzed: bhava arṇavam mṛtyu patham vipaścitaḥ parātma bhūtasya katham pṛthak matiḥ

original: BhP_09.08.015/1 yo 'samañjasa ityuktaḥ sa keśinyā nṛpātmajaḥ
analyzed: samañjasaḥ iti uktaḥ sa keśinyā nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_09.08.015/2 tasya putro 'ṃśumān nāma pitāmahahite rataḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ u ṃśumān nāma pitāmaha hite rataḥ
asamañjase ātmānam darśayan asamañjasam
jātismaraḥ purā saṅgāt yogī yogāt vicālitaḥ

original: BhP_09.08.017/1 ācaran garhitaṃ loke jñātīnāṃ karma vipriyam
analyzed: ācaran garhitam loke jñātīnām karma vipriyam

original: BhP_09.08.017/2 sarayvāṃ krīḍato bālān prāsyadudvejayan janam
analyzed: sarayvām krīḍataḥ bālān prāsyat udvejayan janam

original: BhP_09.08.018/1 evaṃ vṛttaḥ parityaktaḥ pitrā snehamapohya vai
analyzed: evam vṛttaḥ parityaktaḥ pitrā sneham apohya vai

original: BhP_09.08.018/2 yogaiśvaryeṇa bālāṃstān darśayitvā tato yayau
analyzed: yoga aiśvaryeṇa bālān tān darśayitvā tatas yayau
ayodhyā vāsinaḥ sarve bālakān punar āgatān

original: BhP_09.08.019/2 dṛṣṭvā visismire rājan rājā cāpyanvatapyata
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā visismire rājan rājā ca api anvatapyata
aṃśumān coditaḥ rājñā turaga anveṣaṇe yayau
pitṛvya khāta anupatham bhasma anti dadṛśe hayam
tatra āsīnam munim vīkṣya kapila ākhyam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_09.08.021/2 astaut samāhitamanāḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇato mahān
analyzed: astaut samāhita manāḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ mahān
aṃśumān uvāca

original: BhP_09.08.022/1 na paśyati tvāṃ paramātmano 'jano na budhyate 'dyāpi samādhiyuktibhiḥ
analyzed: na paśyati tvām paramātmanaḥ janaḥ na budhyate samādhi yuktibhiḥ

original: BhP_09.08.022/2 kuto 'pare tasya manaḥśarīradhī visargasṛṣṭā vayamaprakāśāḥ
analyzed: kutas pare tasya manaḥ śarīra dhī visarga sṛṣṭāḥ vayam aprakāśāḥ

original: BhP_09.08.023/1 ye dehabhājastriguṇapradhānā guṇān vipaśyantyuta vā tamaśca
analyzed: ye dehabhājaḥ triguṇa pradhānāḥ guṇān vipaśyanti uta vā tamaḥ ca

original: BhP_09.08.023/2 yanmāyayā mohitacetasastvāṃ viduḥ svasaṃsthaṃ na bahiḥprakāśāḥ
analyzed: yad māyayā mohita cetasaḥ tvām viduḥ sva saṃstham na bahis prakāśāḥ

original: BhP_09.08.024/1 taṃ tvāṃ ahaṃ jñānaghanaṃ svabhāva pradhvastamāyāguṇabhedamohaiḥ
analyzed: tam tvām aham jñāna ghanam svabhāva pradhvasta māyā guṇa bheda mohaiḥ
sanandana ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ vibhāvyam katham vimūḍhaḥ paribhāvayāmi
māyā guṇa karma liṅgam a nāma rūpam sat asat vimuktam

original: BhP_09.08.025/2 jñānopadeśāya gṛhītadehaṃ namāmahe tvāṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam
analyzed: jñāna upadeśāya gṛhīta deham namāmahe tvām puruṣam purāṇam
tvad māyā racite loke vastu buddhyā gṛha ādiṣu
bhramanti kāma lobha īrṣyāḥ moha vibhrānta cetasaḥ
adya naḥ sarva bhūta ātman kāma karma indriya āśayaḥ
moha pāśaḥ dṛḍhaḥ chinnaḥ bhagavan tava darśanāt
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.08.028/1 itthaṃ gītānubhāvastaṃ bhagavān kapilo muniḥ
analyzed: ittham gīta anubhāvaḥ tam bhagavān kapilaḥ muniḥ
aṃśumantam uvāca idam anugrāhya dhiyā nṛpa
śrī bhagavān uvāca
aśvaḥ yam nīyatām vatsa pitāmaha paśuḥ tava

original: BhP_09.08.029/2 ime ca pitaro dagdhā gaṅgāmbho 'rhanti netarat
analyzed: ime ca pitaraḥ dagdhāḥ gaṅgā ambhaḥ rhanti na itarat

original: BhP_09.08.030/1 taṃ parikramya śirasā prasādya hayamānayat
analyzed: tam parikramya śirasā prasādya hayam ānayat
sagaraḥ tena paśunā yajña śeṣam samāpayat
rājyam aṃśumate nyasya niḥspṛhaḥ mukta bandhanaḥ
aurva upadiṣṭa mārgeṇa lebhe gatim anuttamām
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
aṃśumān ca tapaḥ tepe gaṅgā nayana kāmyayā

original: BhP_09.09.001/2 kālaṃ mahāntaṃ nāśaknot tataḥ kālena saṃsthitaḥ
analyzed: kālam mahāntam na aśaknot tatas kālena saṃsthitaḥ
dilīpaḥ tad sutaḥ tadvat aśaktaḥ kālam eyivān

original: BhP_09.09.002/2 bhagīrathastasya sutastepe sa sumahat tapaḥ
analyzed: bhagīrathaḥ tasya sutaḥ tepe sa su mahat tapaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.003/1 darśayāmāsa taṃ devī prasannā varadāsmi te
analyzed: darśayāmāsa tam devī prasannā vara dā asmi te
iti uktaḥ svam abhiprāyam śaśaṃsa avanataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.004/1 ko 'pi dhārayitā vegaṃ patantyā me mahītale
analyzed: kaḥ pi dhārayitā vegam patantyāḥ me mahī tale

original: BhP_09.09.004/2 anyathā bhūtalaṃ bhittvā nṛpa yāsye rasātalam
analyzed: anyathā bhū talam bhittvā nṛpa yāsye rasātalam

original: BhP_09.09.005/1 kiṃ cāhaṃ na bhuvaṃ yāsye narā mayyāmṛjantyagham
analyzed: kim ca aham na bhuvam yāsye narāḥ mayi āmṛjanti agham

original: BhP_09.09.005/2 mṛjāmi tadaghaṃ kvāhaṃ rājaṃstatra vicintyatām
analyzed: mṛjāmi tat agham kva aham rājan tatra vicintyatām
śrī bhagīrathaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.09.006/1 sādhavo nyāsinaḥ śāntā brahmiṣṭhā lokapāvanāḥ
analyzed: sādhavaḥ nyāsinaḥ śāntāḥ brahmiṣṭhāḥ loka pāvanāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.006/2 harantyaghaṃ te 'ṅgasaṅgāt teṣv āste hyaghabhiddhariḥ
analyzed: haranti agham te ṅgasaṅgāt teṣu āste hi agha bhid hariḥ

original: BhP_09.09.007/1 dhārayiṣyati te vegaṃ rudrastv ātmā śarīriṇām
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati te vegam rudraḥ tu ātmā śarīriṇām

original: BhP_09.09.007/2 yasminnotamidaṃ protaṃ viśvaṃ śāṭīva tantuṣu
analyzed: yasmin na ūtam idam protam viśvam śāṭī iva tantuṣu

original: BhP_09.09.008/1 ityuktvā sa nṛpo devaṃ tapasātoṣayac chivam
analyzed: iti uktvā sa nṛpaḥ devam tapasā atoṣayat śivam
kālena alpīyasā rājan tasya īśaḥ ca āśu atuṣyata
tathā iti rājñā abhihitam sarva loka hitaḥ śivaḥ
dadhāra avahitaḥ gaṅgām pāda pūta jalām hareḥ
bhagīrathaḥ sa rājarṣiḥ ninye bhuvana pāvanīm

original: BhP_09.09.010/2 yatra svapit-ṇāṃ dehā bhasmībhūtāḥ sma śerate
analyzed: yatra sva pitṇām dehāḥ bhasmībhūtāḥ sma śerate
rathena vāyu vegena prayāntam anudhāvatī

original: BhP_09.09.011/2 deśān punantī nirdagdhān āsiñcat sagarātmajān
analyzed: deśān punantī nirdagdhān āsiñcat sagara ātmajān
yad jala sparśa mātreṇa brahmadaṇḍa hatāḥ api

original: BhP_09.09.012/2 sagarātmajā divaṃ jagmuḥ kevalaṃ dehabhasmabhiḥ
analyzed: sagara ātmajāḥ divam jagmuḥ kevalam deha bhasmabhiḥ
bhasmībhūta aṅga saṅgena svaryātāḥ sagara ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.013/2 kiṃ punaḥ śraddhayā devīṃ sevante ye dhṛtavratāḥ
analyzed: kim punar śraddhayā devīm sevante ye dhṛta vratāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.014/1 na hyetat paramāścaryaṃ svardhunyā yadihoditam
analyzed: na hi etat parama āścaryam svardhunyā yat iha uditam
ananta caraṇa ambhoja prasūtāyāḥ bhavat chidaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.015/1 sanniveśya mano yasmiñ chraddhayā munayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: sanniveśya manaḥ yasmin śraddhayā munayaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.015/2 traiguṇyaṃ dustyajaṃ hitvā sadyo yātāstadātmatām
analyzed: traiguṇyam dustyajam hitvā sadyas yātāḥ tad ātma tām

original: BhP_09.09.016/1 śruto bhagīrathāj jajñe tasya nābho 'paro 'bhavat
analyzed: śrutaḥ bhagīrathāt jajñe tasya nābho paraḥ bhavat
sindhudvīpaḥ tatas tasmāt ayutāyūḥ tatas bhavat
ṛtūparṇaḥ nalasakhaḥ śvavidyāmayāt nalāt
dattvā akṣa hṛdayam ca asmai sarva kāmaḥ tu tad sutam
tatas sudāsaḥ tad putraḥ damayantī patiḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.018/2 āhurmitrasahaṃ yaṃ vai kalmāṣāṅghrimuta kvacit
analyzed: āhuḥ mitrasaham yam vai kalmāṣāṅghrim uta kvacid
vasiṣṭha śāpāt rakṣaḥ bhūt anapatyaḥ sva karmaṇā
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_09.09.019/1 kiṃ nimitto guroḥ śāpaḥ saudāsasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kim nimittaḥ guroḥ śāpaḥ saudāsasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.019/2 etadveditumicchāmaḥ kathyatāṃ na raho yadi
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmaḥ kathyatām na rahaḥ yadi
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.09.020/1 saudāso mṛgayāṃ kiñcic caran rakṣo jaghāna ha
analyzed: saudāsaḥ mṛgayām kiñcid caran rakṣaḥ jaghāna ha

original: BhP_09.09.020/2 mumoca bhrātaraṃ so 'tha gataḥ praticikīrṣayā
analyzed: mumoca bhrātaram saḥ tha gataḥ praticikīrṣayā
sañcintayan agham rājñaḥ sūda rūpa dharaḥ gṛhe

original: BhP_09.09.021/2 gurave bhoktukāmāya paktvā ninye narāmiṣam
analyzed: gurave bhoktu kāmāya paktvā ninye nara āmiṣam
parivekṣyamāṇam bhagavān vilokya abhakṣyam añjasā

original: BhP_09.09.022/2 rājānamaśapat kruddho rakṣo hyevaṃ bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: rājānam aśapat kruddhaḥ rakṣaḥ hi evam bhaviṣyasi
rakṣaḥ kṛtam tat viditvā cakre dvādaśa vārṣikam
saḥ pi apaḥ ñjalim ādāya gurum śaptum samudyataḥ
vāritaḥ madayanti āpaḥ ruśatīḥ pādayoḥ jahau

original: BhP_09.09.024/2 diśaḥ khamavanīṃ sarvaṃ paśyan jīvamayaṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ kham avanīm sarvam paśyan jīva mayam nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.025/1 rākṣasaṃ bhāvamāpannaḥ pāde kalmāṣatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: rākṣasam bhāvam āpannaḥ pāde kalmāṣa tām gataḥ
vyavāya kāle dadṛśe vana oka dampatī dvijau
kṣudhā ārtaḥ jagṛhe vipram tad patnī āha akṛtārtha vat

original: BhP_09.09.026/2 na bhavān rākṣasaḥ sākṣādikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: na bhavān rākṣasaḥ sākṣāt ikṣvākūṇām mahā rathaḥ
madayantyāḥ patiḥ vīra na adharmam kartum arhasi

original: BhP_09.09.027/2 dehi me 'patyakāmāyā akṛtārthaṃ patiṃ dvijam
analyzed: dehi me patya kāmāyāḥ akṛtārtham patim dvijam
dehaḥ yam mānuṣaḥ rājan puruṣasya akhila artha daḥ

original: BhP_09.09.028/2 tasmādasya vadho vīra sarvārthavadha ucyate
analyzed: tasmāt asya vadhaḥ vīra sarva artha vadhaḥ ucyate
eṣa hi brāhmaṇaḥ vidvān tapaḥ śīla guṇa anvitaḥ
ārirādhayiṣuḥ brahma mahāpuruṣa saṃjñitam
sarva bhūta ātma bhāvena bhūteṣu antarhitam guṇaiḥ
saḥ yam brahmarṣi varyaḥ te rājarṣi pravarāt vibho
katham arhati dharma jña vadham pituḥ iva ātmajaḥ
tasya sādhoḥ apāpasya bhrūṇasya brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.031/2 kathaṃ vadhaṃ yathā babhrormanyate sanmato bhavān
analyzed: katham vadham yathā babhroḥ manyate sat mataḥ bhavān

original: BhP_09.09.032/1 yadyayaṃ kriyate bhakṣyastarhi māṃ khāda pūrvataḥ
analyzed: yadi ayam kriyate bhakṣyaḥ tarhi mām khāda pūrvatas

original: BhP_09.09.032/2 na jīviṣye vinā yena kṣaṇaṃ ca mṛtakaṃ yathā
analyzed: na jīviṣye vinā yena kṣaṇam ca mṛtakam yathā
evam karuṇa bhāṣiṇyā vilapantyā anātha vat
vyāghraḥ paśum iva akhādat saudāsaḥ śāpa mohitaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.034/1 brāhmaṇī vīkṣya didhiṣuṃ puruṣādena bhakṣitam
analyzed: brāhmaṇī vīkṣya didhiṣum puruṣādena bhakṣitam
śocantī ātmānam urvī īśam aśapat kupitā satī

original: BhP_09.09.035/1 yasmān me bhakṣitaḥ pāpa kāmārtāyāḥ patistvayā
analyzed: yasmāt me bhakṣitaḥ pāpa kāma ārtāyāḥ patiḥ tvayā
tava api mṛtyuḥ ādhānāt akṛta prajña darśitaḥ
evam mitrasaham śaptvā pati loka parāyaṇā

original: BhP_09.09.036/2 tadasthīni samiddhe 'gnau prāsya bharturgatiṃ gatā
analyzed: tad asthīni samiddhe gnau prāsya bhartuḥ gatim gatā
viśāpaḥ dvādaśa abda ante maithunāya samudyataḥ

original: BhP_09.09.037/2 vijñāpya brāhmaṇīśāpaṃ mahiṣyā sa nivāritaḥ
analyzed: vijñāpya brāhmaṇī śāpam mahiṣyā sa nivāritaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.038/1 ata ūrdhvaṃ sa tatyāja strīsukhaṃ karmaṇāprajāḥ
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam sa tatyāja strī sukham karmaṇā aprajāḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ tad anujñātaḥ madayantyām prajām adhāt

original: BhP_09.09.039/1 sā vai sapta samā garbhamabibhran na vyajāyata
analyzed: sā vai sapta samāḥ garbham abibhrat na vyajāyata
jaghne śmanā udaram tasyāḥ saḥ śmakaḥ tena kathyate

original: BhP_09.09.040/1 aśmakādbāliko jajñe yaḥ strībhiḥ parirakṣitaḥ
analyzed: aśmakāt bālikaḥ jajñe yaḥ strībhiḥ parirakṣitaḥ
nārīkavacaḥ iti uktaḥ niḥkṣatre mūlakaḥ
tatas daśarathaḥ tasmāt putraḥ aiḍaviḍiḥ tatas
rājā viśvasahaḥ yasya khaṭvāṅgaḥ cakravartī abhūt

original: BhP_09.09.042/1 yo devairarthito daityān avadhīdyudhi durjayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ devaiḥ arthitaḥ daityān avadhīt yudhi durjayaḥ
muhūrtam āyuḥ jñātvā etya sva puram sandadhe manaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.043/1 na me brahmakulāt prāṇāḥ kuladaivān na cātmajāḥ
analyzed: na me brahma kulāt prāṇāḥ kula daivāt na ca ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.043/2 na śriyo na mahī rājyaṃ na dārāścātivallabhāḥ
analyzed: na śriyaḥ na mahī rājyam na dārāḥ ca ati vallabhāḥ

original: BhP_09.09.044/1 na bālye 'pi matirmahyamadharme ramate kvacit
analyzed: na bālye matiḥ mahyam adharme ramate kvacid
na apaśyam uttamaślokāt anyat kiñcana vastu aham

original: BhP_09.09.045/1 devaiḥ kāmavaro datto mahyaṃ tribhuvaneśvaraiḥ
analyzed: devaiḥ kāma varaḥ dattaḥ mahyam tribhuvana īśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_09.09.045/2 na vṛṇe tamahaṃ kāmaṃ bhūtabhāvanabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: na vṛṇe tam aham kāmam bhūta bhāvana bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_09.09.046/1 ye vikṣiptendriyadhiyo devāste svahṛdi sthitam
analyzed: ye vikṣipta indriya dhiyaḥ devāḥ te sva hṛdi sthitam

original: BhP_09.09.046/2 na vindanti priyaṃ śaśvadātmānaṃ kimutāpare
analyzed: na vindanti priyam śaśvat ātmānam kim uta apare
atha īśa māyā raciteṣu saṅgam guṇeṣu gandharva pura upameṣu

analyzed: dhyāyantī rāma caraṇau vivaram praviveśa ha

original: BhP_09.11.016/1 tac chrutvā bhagavān rāmo rundhannapi dhiyā śucaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhagavān rāmaḥ rundhan api dhiyā śucaḥ
smaran tasyāḥ guṇān tān tān na aśaknot roddhum īśvaraḥ
strī pum prasaṅgaḥ etādṛś sarvatra trāsam āvahaḥ
api īśvarāṇām kim uta grāmyasya gṛha cetasaḥ

original: BhP_09.11.018/1 tata ūrdhvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dhāryannajuhot prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam brahmacaryam dhāryan ajuhot prabhuḥ
trayodaśa abda sāhasram agnihotram akhaṇḍitam

original: BhP_09.11.019/1 smaratāṃ hṛdi vinyasya viddhaṃ daṇḍakakaṇṭakaiḥ
analyzed: smaratām hṛdi vinyasya viddham daṇḍaka kaṇṭakaiḥ
sva pāda pallavam rāmaḥ ātma jyotiḥ agāt tatas
na idam yaśaḥ raghu pateḥ sura yācñayā ātta
rakṣaḥ vadhaḥ jaladhi bandhanam astra pūgaiḥ

original: BhP_09.10.020/4 kiṃ tasya śatruhanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ
analyzed: kim tasya śatru hanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ
yasya amalam nṛpa sadaḥsu yaśaḥ dhunā api
gāyanti agha ghnam ṛṣayaḥ digibha indra paṭṭam
tam nākapāla vasupāla kirīṭa juṣṭa
pāda ambujam raghu patim śaraṇam prapadye

original: BhP_09.11.022/1 sa yaiḥ spṛṣṭo 'bhidṛṣṭo vā saṃviṣṭo 'nugato 'pi vā
analyzed: sa yaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ bhidṛṣṭaḥ vā saṃviṣṭaḥ vā

original: BhP_09.11.022/2 kosalāste yayuḥ sthānaṃ yatra gacchanti yoginaḥ
analyzed: kosalāḥ te yayuḥ sthānam yatra gacchanti yoginaḥ
puruṣaḥ rāma caritam śravaṇaiḥ upadhārayan
ānṛśaṃsya paraḥ rājan karma bandhaiḥ vimucyate
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_09.11.024/1 kathaṃ sa bhagavān rāmo bhrāt-n vā svayamātmanaḥ
analyzed: katham sa bhagavān rāmaḥ vā svayam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.11.024/2 tasmin vā te 'nvavartanta prajāḥ paurāśca īśvare
analyzed: tasmin vā te nu avartanta prajāḥ paurāḥ ca īśvare
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca
athā ādiśat digvijaye bhrātṝn tribhuvana īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_09.11.025/2 ātmānaṃ darśayan svānāṃ purīmaikṣata sānugaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam darśayan svānām purīm aikṣata sa anugaḥ
āsikta mārgām gandhodaiḥ kariṇām mada śīkaraiḥ

original: BhP_09.11.026/2 svāminaṃ prāptamālokya mattāṃ vā sutarāmiva
analyzed: svāminam prāptam ālokya mat tām vā sutarām iva
prāsāda gopura sabhā caitya devagṛha ādiṣu
vinyasta hema kalaśaiḥ patākābhiḥ ca maṇḍitām

original: BhP_09.11.028/1 pūgaiḥ savṛntai rambhābhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ suvāsasām
analyzed: pūgaiḥ sa vṛntaiḥ rambhābhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ su vāsasām
ādarśaiḥ aṃśukaiḥ sragbhiḥ kṛta kautuka toraṇām
tam upeyuḥ tatra tatra paurāḥ arhaṇa pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_09.11.029/2 āśiṣo yuyujurdeva pāhīmāṃ prāk tvayoddhṛtām
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ yuyujuḥ deva pāhi imām prāk tvayā uddhṛtām

original: BhP_09.11.030/1 tataḥ prajā vīkṣya patiṃ cirāgataṃ didṛkṣayotsṛṣṭagṛhāḥ striyo narāḥ
analyzed: tatas prajāḥ vīkṣya patim cira āgatam didṛkṣayā utsṛṣṭa gṛhāḥ striyaḥ narāḥ
āruhya harmyāṇi aravinda locanam atṛpta netrāḥ kusumaiḥ avākiran

original: BhP_09.11.031/1 atha praviṣṭaḥ svagṛhaṃ juṣṭaṃ svaiḥ pūrvarājabhiḥ
analyzed: atha praviṣṭaḥ sva gṛham juṣṭam svaiḥ pūrva rājabhiḥ
ananta akhila koṣa āḍhyam anarghya ūru paricchadam
vidruma udumbara dvāraiḥ vaidūrya stambha paṅktibhiḥ
sthalaiḥ mārakataiḥ svacchaiḥ bhrājat sphaṭika bhittibhiḥ
citra sragbhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ vāsaḥ maṇi gaṇa aṃśukaiḥ
dhūpa dīpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ maṇḍitam puṣpa maṇḍanaiḥ
strī pumbhiḥ sura saṅkāśaiḥ juṣṭam bhūṣaṇa bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_09.11.035/1 tasmin sa bhagavān rāmaḥ snigdhayā priyayeṣṭayā
analyzed: tasmin sa bhagavān rāmaḥ snigdhayā priyayā iṣṭayā
reme sva ārāma dhīrāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sītayā kila

original: BhP_09.11.036/1 bubhuje ca yathākālaṃ kāmān dharmamapīḍayan
analyzed: bubhuje ca yathākālam kāmān dharmam apīḍayan
varṣa pūgān bahūn nṝṇām abhidhyāta aṅghri pallavaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
kuśasya ca atithiḥ tasmāt niṣadhaḥ tad sutaḥ nabhaḥ
tha tad putraḥ kṣemadhanvā bhavat tatas
devānīkaḥ tatas nīhaḥ pāriyātraḥ tha tad sutaḥ
tatas balasthalaḥ tasmāt vajranābhaḥ rka sambhavaḥ
sagaṇaḥ tad sutaḥ tasmāt vidhṛtiḥ ca abhavat sutaḥ
tatas hiraṇyanābhaḥ bhūt yoga ācāryaḥ tu jaimineḥ
śiṣyaḥ kauśalyaḥ ādhyātmam yājñavalkyaḥ
yogam mahā udayam ṛṣiḥ hṛdaya granthi bhedakam
puṣpaḥ hiraṇyanābhasya dhruvasandhiḥ tatas bhavat
sudarśanaḥ thā agnivarṇaḥ śīghraḥ tasya maruḥ sutaḥ
saḥ sau āste yoga siddhaḥ kalāpa grāmam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_09.12.006/2 kalerante sūryavaṃśaṃ naṣṭaṃ bhāvayitā punaḥ
analyzed: kaleḥ ante sūrya vaṃśam naṣṭam bhāvayitā punar
tasmāt prasuśrutaḥ tasya sandhiḥ tasya api amarṣaṇaḥ
mahasvān tad sutaḥ tasmāt viśvabāhuḥ ajāyata

original: BhP_09.12.008/1 tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt takṣako bhavitā punaḥ
analyzed: tatas prasenajit tasmāt takṣakaḥ bhavitā punar

original: BhP_09.12.008/2 tato bṛhadbalo yastu pitrā te samare hataḥ
analyzed: tatas bṛhadbalaḥ yaḥ tu pitrā te samare hataḥ

original: BhP_09.12.009/1 ete hīkṣvākubhūpālā atītāḥ śṛṇv anāgatān
analyzed: ete hi ikṣvāku bhūpālāḥ atītāḥ śṛṇu anāgatān

original: BhP_09.12.009/2 bṛhadbalasya bhavitā putro nāmnā bṛhadraṇaḥ
analyzed: bṛhadbalasya bhavitā putraḥ nāmnā bṛhadraṇaḥ
ūrukriyaḥ sutaḥ tasya vatsa vṛddhaḥ bhaviṣyati
prativyomaḥ tatas bhānuḥ divākaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ
sahadevaḥ tatas vīraḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ bhānumān
pratīkāśvaḥ bhānumataḥ supratīkaḥ tha tad sutaḥ
bhavitā marudevaḥ tha sunakṣatraḥ tha puṣkaraḥ
tasya āntarikṣaḥ tad putraḥ sutapāḥ tad amitra jit
bṛhadrājaḥ tu tasya api barhiḥ tasmāt kṛtañjayaḥ

original: BhP_09.12.013/2 raṇañjayastasya sutaḥ sañjayo bhavitā tataḥ
analyzed: raṇañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ sañjayaḥ bhavitā tatas

original: BhP_09.12.014/1 tasmāc chākyo 'tha śuddhodo lāṅgalastatsutaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt śuddhodaḥ lāṅgalaḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.12.014/2 tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt kṣudrako bhavitā tataḥ
analyzed: tatas prasenajit tasmāt kṣudrakaḥ bhavitā tatas
raṇakaḥ bhavitā tasmāt surathaḥ tanayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.12.015/2 sumitro nāma niṣṭhānta ete bārhadbalānvayāḥ
analyzed: sumitraḥ nāma niṣṭhā antaḥ ete bārhadbala anvayāḥ
ikṣvākūṇām ayam vaṃśaḥ sumitrā antaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_09.12.016/2 yatastaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau
analyzed: yatas tam prāpya rājānam saṃsthām prāpsyati vai kalau
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
nimiḥ ikṣvāku tanayaḥ vasiṣṭham avṛta ṛtvijam

original: BhP_09.13.001/2 ārabhya satraṃ so 'pyāha śakreṇa prāg vṛto 'smi bhoḥ
analyzed: ārabhya satram saḥ pi āha śakreṇa prāk vṛtaḥ smi bhoḥ

original: BhP_09.13.002/1 taṃ nirvartyāgamiṣyāmi tāvan māṃ pratipālaya
analyzed: tam nirvartya āgamiṣyāmi tāvat mām pratipālaya
tūṣṇīm āsīt gṛhapatiḥ saḥ u pi indrasya akarot makham
nimittaḥ calam idam vidvān satram ārabhatām ātmavān
ṛtvigbhiḥ aparaiḥ tāvat na agamat yāvatā guruḥ

original: BhP_09.13.004/1 śiṣyavyatikramaṃ vīkṣya taṃ nirvartyāgato guruḥ
analyzed: śiṣya vyatikramam vīkṣya tam nirvartya āgataḥ guruḥ
aśapat patatāt dehaḥ nimeḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ
nimiḥ pratidadau śāpam gurave dharma vartine
tava api patatāt dehaḥ lobhāt dharmam a jānataḥ
iti utsasarja svam deham nimiḥ adhyātma kovidaḥ
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ jajñe urvaśyām prapitāmahaḥ
gandha vastuṣu tad deham nidhāya muni sattamāḥ

original: BhP_09.13.007/2 samāpte satrayāge ca devān ūcuḥ samāgatān
analyzed: samāpte satra yāge ca devān ūcuḥ samāgatān

original: BhP_09.13.008/1 rājño jīvatu deho 'yaṃ prasannāḥ prabhavo yadi
analyzed: rājñaḥ jīvatu dehaḥ yam prasannāḥ prabhavaḥ yadi

original: BhP_09.13.008/2 tathetyukte nimiḥ prāha mā bhūn me dehabandhanam
analyzed: tathā iti ukte nimiḥ prāha mā bhūt me deha bandhanam

original: BhP_09.13.009/1 yasya yogaṃ na vāñchanti viyogabhayakātarāḥ
analyzed: yasya yogam na vāñchanti viyoga bhaya kātarāḥ
bhajanti caraṇa ambhojam munayaḥ harimedhasaḥ
deham na avarurutse haṃ duḥkha śoka bhaya āvaham
sarvatra asya yatas mṛtyuḥ matsyānām udake yathā
devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_09.13.011/1 videha uṣyatāṃ kāmaṃ locaneṣu śarīriṇām
analyzed: videhaḥ uṣyatām kāmam locaneṣu śarīriṇām
unmeṣaṇa nimeṣābhyām lakṣitaḥ dhyā ātma saṃsthitaḥ
arājaka bhayam manyamānāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_09.13.012/2 dehaṃ mamanthuḥ sma nimeḥ kumāraḥ samajāyata
analyzed: deham mamanthuḥ sma nimeḥ kumāraḥ samajāyata
janmanā janakaḥ saḥ bhūt vaidehaḥ tu videha jaḥ

original: BhP_09.13.013/2 mithilo mathanāj jāto mithilā yena nirmitā
analyzed: mithilaḥ mathanāt jātaḥ mithilā yena nirmitā
tasmāt udāvasuḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt nandivardhanaḥ
tatas suketuḥ tasya api devarātaḥ mahīpate
tasmāt bṛhadrathaḥ tasya mahā vīryaḥ sudhṛt pitā
sudhṛteḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ vai haryaśvaḥ maruḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.13.016/1 maroḥ pratīpakastasmāj jātaḥ kṛtaratho yataḥ
analyzed: maroḥ pratīpakaḥ tasmāt jātaḥ kṛtarathaḥ yatas
devamīḍhaḥ tasya putraḥ mahādhṛtiḥ
kṛtirātaḥ tatas tasmāt mahāromā ca tad sutaḥ
svarṇaromā sutaḥ tasya hrasvaromā vyajāyata

original: BhP_09.13.018/1 tataḥ śīradhvajo jajñe yajñārthaṃ karṣato mahīm
analyzed: tatas śīradhvajaḥ jajñe yajña artham karṣataḥ mahīm

original: BhP_09.13.018/2 sītā śīrāgrato jātā tasmāt śīradhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: sītā śīra agratas jātā tasmāt śīradhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ
kuśadhvajaḥ tasya putraḥ tatas dharmadhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ
dharmadhvajasya dvau putrau kṛtadhvaja mitadhvajau
kṛtadhvajāt keśidhvajaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ tu mitadhvajāt
kṛtadhvaja sutaḥ rājan ātma vidyā viśāradaḥ
bhānumān tasya putraḥ bhūt śatadyumnaḥ tu tad sutaḥ
śuciḥ tu tanayaḥ tasmāt sanadvājaḥ sutaḥ bhavat
ūrjaketuḥ sanadvāja āt ajaḥ purujit sutaḥ
ariṣṭanemiḥ tasya api śrutāyuḥ tat supārśvakaḥ
tatas citrarathaḥ yasya kṣemādhiḥ mithilā adhipaḥ
tasmāt samarathaḥ tasya sutaḥ satyarathaḥ tatas
āsīt upaguruḥ tasmāt upaguptaḥ gni sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_09.13.025/1 vasvananto 'tha tatputro yuyudho yat subhāṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vasvanantaḥ tha tad putraḥ yuyudhaḥ yat subhāṣaṇaḥ
