śrutaḥ tatas jayaḥ tasmāt vijayaḥ smāt ṛtaḥ sutaḥ
śunakaḥ tad sutaḥ jajñe vītahavyaḥ dhṛtiḥ tatas
bahulāśvaḥ dhṛteḥ tasya kṛtirasya mahā vaśī
ete vai maithilāḥ rājan ātma vidyā viśāradāḥ
yogeśvara prasādena dvandvaiḥ muktāḥ gṛheṣu api
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.14.001/1 athātaḥ śrūyatāṃ rājan vaṃśaḥ somasya pāvanaḥ
analyzed: atha atas śrūyatām rājan vaṃśaḥ somasya pāvanaḥ
yasmin aila ādayaḥ bhūpāḥ kīrtyante puṇya kīrtayaḥ
sahasra śirasaḥ puṃsaḥ nābhi hrada saroruhāt

original: BhP_09.14.002/2 jātasyāsīt suto dhāturatriḥ pitṛsamo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: jātasya āsīt sutaḥ dhātuḥ atriḥ pitṛ samaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_09.14.003/1 tasya dṛgbhyo 'bhavat putraḥ somo 'mṛtamayaḥ kila
analyzed: tasya dṛgbhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ somaḥ mṛta mayaḥ kila
vipra oṣadhi uḍu gaṇānām brahmaṇā kalpitaḥ patiḥ
saḥ yajat rājasūyena vijitya bhuvanatrayam
patnīm bṛhaspateḥ darpāt tārām nāma aharat balāt

original: BhP_09.14.005/1 yadā sa devaguruṇā yācito 'bhīkṣṇaśo madāt
analyzed: yadā sa devaguruṇā yācitaḥ bhīkṣṇaśas madāt
na atyajat tad kṛte jajñe sura dānava vigrahaḥ
śukraḥ bṛhaspateḥ dveṣāt agrahīt sa asura uḍupam
haraḥ guru sutam snehāt sarva bhūta gaṇa āvṛtaḥ
sarva deva gaṇa upetaḥ mahā indraḥ gurum anvayāt
sura asura vināśaḥ bhūt samaraḥ tārakā mayaḥ
niveditaḥ tha aṅgirasā somam nirbhartsya viśvakṛt
tārām sva bhartre prāyacchat antarvatnīm avait patiḥ

original: BhP_09.14.009/1 tyaja tyajāśu duṣprajñe matkṣetrādāhitaṃ paraiḥ
analyzed: tyaja tyaja āśu duṣprajñe mad kṣetrāt āhitam paraiḥ

original: BhP_09.14.009/2 nāhaṃ tvāṃ bhasmasāt kuryāṃ striyaṃ sāntānike 'sati
analyzed: na aham tvām bhasmasāt kuryām striyam sāntānike sati

original: BhP_09.14.010/1 tatyāja vrīḍitā tārā kumāraṃ kanakaprabham
analyzed: tatyāja vrīḍitā tārā kumāram kanaka prabham

original: BhP_09.14.010/2 spṛhāmāṅgirasaścakre kumāre soma eva ca
analyzed: spṛhām āṅgirasaḥ cakre kumāre some eva ca
mama ayam na tava iti uccais tasmin vivadamānayoḥ

original: BhP_09.14.011/2 papracchurṛṣayo devā naivoce vrīḍitā tu sā
analyzed: papracchuḥ ṛṣayaḥ devāḥ na evā ūce vrīḍitā tu sā
kumāraḥ mātaram prāha kupitaḥ līka lajjayā

original: BhP_09.14.012/2 kiṃ na vacasyasadvṛtte ātmāvadyaṃ vadāśu me
analyzed: kim na vacasi asat vṛtte ātma avadyam vada āśu me

original: BhP_09.14.013/1 brahmā tāṃ raha āhūya samaprākṣīc ca sāntvayan
analyzed: brahmā tām rahaḥ āhūya samaprākṣīt ca sāntvayan
somasya iti āha śanakais somaḥ tam tāvat agrahīt
tasya ātmayoniḥ akṛta budhaḥ iti abhidhām nṛpa

original: BhP_09.14.014/2 buddhyā gambhīrayā yena putreṇāpoḍurāṇ mudam
analyzed: buddhyā gambhīrayā yena putreṇa apoḍurāj mudam

original: BhP_09.14.015/1 tataḥ purūravā jajñe ilāyāṃ ya udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas purūravāḥ jajñe ilāyām yaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
tasya rūpa guṇa audārya śīla draviṇa vikramān
śrutvā urvaśī indra bhavane gīyamānān sura ṛṣiṇā
tad antikam upeyāya devī smara śara arditā
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ śāpāt āpannāḥ nara loka tām
niśamya puruṣa śreṣṭham kandarpam iva rūpiṇam

original: BhP_09.14.017/3 dhṛtiṃ viṣṭabhya lalanā upatasthe tadantike
analyzed: dhṛtim viṣṭabhya lalanā upatasthe tad antike
sa tām vilokya nṛpatiḥ harṣeṇa utphulla locanaḥ

original: BhP_09.14.018/2 uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā devīṃ hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
analyzed: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā devīm hṛṣṭa tanūruhaḥ
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_09.14.019/1 svāgataṃ te varārohe āsyatāṃ karavāma kim
analyzed: svāgatam te varārohe āsyatām karavāma kim

original: BhP_09.14.019/2 saṃramasva mayā sākaṃ ratirnau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
analyzed: saṃramasva mayā sākam ratiḥ nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
urvaśī uvāca

original: BhP_09.14.020/1 kasyāstvayi na sajjeta mano dṛṣṭiśca sundara
analyzed: kasyāḥ tvayi na sajjeta manaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ ca sundara
yat aṅga antaram āsādya cyavate ha riraṃsayā

original: BhP_09.14.021/1 etāv uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada
analyzed: etau uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada

original: BhP_09.14.021/2 saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākaṃ ślāghyaḥ strīṇāṃ varaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākam ślāghyaḥ strīṇām varaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.14.022/1 ghṛtaṃ me vīra bhakṣyaṃ syān nekṣe tvānyatra maithunāt
analyzed: ghṛtam me vīra bhakṣyam syāt na īkṣe tvā anyatra maithunāt

original: BhP_09.14.022/2 vivāsasaṃ tat tatheti pratipede mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: vivāsasam tat tathā iti pratipede mahā manāḥ
aho rūpam aho bhāvaḥ nara loka vimohanam

original: BhP_09.14.023/2 ko na seveta manujo devīṃ tvāṃ svayamāgatām
analyzed: kaḥ na seveta manujaḥ devīm tvām svayam āgatām

original: BhP_09.14.024/1 tayā sa puruṣaśreṣṭho ramayantyā yathārhataḥ
analyzed: tayā sa puruṣa śreṣṭhaḥ ramayantyā yathārhataḥ
reme sura vihāreṣu kāmam caitraratha ādiṣu
ramamāṇaḥ tayā devyā padma kiñjalka gandhayā
tad mukha āmoda muṣitaḥ mumude hargaṇān bahūn
apaśyan urvaśīm indraḥ gandharvān samacodayat
urvaśī rahitam mahyam āsthānam na atiśobhate

original: BhP_09.14.027/1 te upetya mahārātre tamasi pratyupasthite
analyzed: te upetya mahārātre tamasi pratyupasthite

original: BhP_09.14.027/2 urvaśyā uraṇau jahrurnyastau rājani jāyayā
analyzed: urvaśyāḥ uraṇau jahruḥ nyastau rājani jāyayā
niśamya ākranditam devī putrayoḥ nīyamānayoḥ
hatā asmi aham ku nāthena napuṃsā vīra māninā

original: BhP_09.14.029/1 yadviśrambhādahaṃ naṣṭā hṛtāpatyā ca dasyubhiḥ
analyzed: yad viśrambhāt aham naṣṭā hṛta apatyā ca dasyubhiḥ

original: BhP_09.14.029/2 yaḥ śete niśi santrasto yathā nārī divā pumān
analyzed: yaḥ śete niśi santrastaḥ yathā nārī divā pumān
iti vāc sāyakaiḥ biddhaḥ pratottraiḥ iva kuñjaraḥ
niśi nistriṃśam ādāya vivastraḥ bhyadravat ruṣā

original: BhP_09.14.031/1 te visṛjyoraṇau tatra vyadyotanta sma vidyutaḥ
analyzed: te visṛjya uraṇau tatra vyadyotanta sma vidyutaḥ

original: BhP_09.14.031/2 ādāya meṣāv āyāntaṃ nagnamaikṣata sā patim
analyzed: ādāya meṣau āyāntam nagnam aikṣata sā patim

original: BhP_09.14.032/1 ailo 'pi śayane jāyāmapaśyan vimanā iva
analyzed: ailaḥ pi śayane jāyām apaśyan vimanāḥ iva

original: BhP_09.14.032/2 taccitto vihvalaḥ śocan babhrāmonmattavan mahīm
analyzed: tad cittaḥ vihvalaḥ śocan babhrāma unmatta vat mahīm

original: BhP_09.14.033/1 sa tāṃ vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyāṃ ca tatsakhīḥ
analyzed: sa tām vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyām ca tad sakhīḥ

original: BhP_09.14.033/2 pañca prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ prāha sūktaṃ purūravāḥ
analyzed: pañca prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ prāha sūktam purūravāḥ

original: BhP_09.14.034/1 aho jāye tiṣṭha tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktumarhasi
analyzed: aho jāye tiṣṭha tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktum arhasi
mām tvam adya api a nirvṛtya vacāṃsi kṛṇavāvahai

original: BhP_09.14.035/1 sudeho 'yaṃ patatyatra devi dūraṃ hṛtastvayā
analyzed: sudehaḥ yam patati atra devi dūram hṛtaḥ tvayā
khādanti enam vṛkāḥ gṛdhrāḥ tvad prasādasya na āspadam
urvaśī uvāca

original: BhP_09.14.036/1 mā mṛthāḥ puruṣo 'si tvaṃ mā sma tvādyurvṛkā ime
analyzed: mā mṛthāḥ puruṣaḥ si tvam mā sma tvā adyuḥ vṛkāḥ ime

original: BhP_09.14.036/2 kvāpi sakhyaṃ na vai strīṇāṃ vṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ yathā
analyzed: kvāpi sakhyam na vai strīṇām vṛkāṇām hṛdayam yathā

original: BhP_09.14.037/1 striyo hyakaruṇāḥ krūrā durmarṣāḥ priyasāhasāḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ hi akaruṇāḥ krūrāḥ durmarṣāḥ priya sāhasāḥ
ghnanti alpa arthe viśrabdham patim bhrātaram api uta
vidhāya alīka viśrambham ajñeṣu tyakta sauhṛdāḥ
navam navam abhīpsantyaḥ puṃścalyaḥ svaira vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_09.14.039/1 saṃvatsarānte hi bhavān ekarātraṃ mayeśvaraḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsara ante hi bhavān eka rātram mayā īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_09.14.039/2 raṃsyatyapatyāni ca te bhaviṣyantyaparāṇi bhoḥ
analyzed: raṃsyati apatyāni ca te bhaviṣyanti aparāṇi bhoḥ

original: BhP_09.14.040/1 antarvatnīmupālakṣya devīṃ sa prayayau purīm
analyzed: antarvatnīm upālakṣya devīm sa prayayau purīm
punar tatra gataḥ bda ante urvaśīm vīra mātaram

original: BhP_09.14.041/1 upalabhya mudā yuktaḥ samuvāsa tayā niśām
analyzed: upalabhya mudā yuktaḥ samuvāsa tayā niśām
athā enam urvaśī prāha kṛpaṇam viraha āturam
gandharvān upadhāva imān tubhyam dāsyanti mām iti
tasya saṃstuvataḥ tuṣṭāḥ agni sthālīm daduḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_09.14.042/3 urvaśīṃ manyamānastāṃ so 'budhyata caran vane
analyzed: urvaśīm manyamānaḥ tām saḥ budhyata caran vane

original: BhP_09.14.043/1 sthālīṃ nyasya vane gatvā gṛhān ādhyāyato niśi
analyzed: sthālīm nyasya vane gatvā gṛhān ādhyāyataḥ niśi
tretāyām sampravṛttāyām manasi trayi avartata

original: BhP_09.14.044/1 sthālīsthānaṃ gato 'śvatthaṃ śamīgarbhaṃ vilakṣya saḥ
analyzed: sthālī sthānam śvattham śamīgarbham vilakṣya saḥ

original: BhP_09.14.044/2 tena dve araṇī kṛtvā urvaśīlokakāmyayā
analyzed: tena dve araṇī kṛtvā urvaśī loka kāmyayā
urvaśīm mantrataḥ dhyāyan adharāraṇim uttarām

original: BhP_09.14.045/2 ātmānamubhayormadhye yat tat prajananaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: ātmānam ubhayoḥ madhye yat tat prajananam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_09.14.046/1 tasya nirmanthanāj jāto jātavedā vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: tasya nirmanthanāt jātaḥ jātavedāḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: BhP_09.14.046/2 trayyā sa vidyayā rājñā putratve kalpitastrivṛt
analyzed: trayyā sa vidyayā rājñā putra tve kalpitaḥ trivṛt
tena ayajata yajñeśam bhagavantam adhokṣajam
urvaśī lokam anvicchan sarva deva mayam harim

original: BhP_09.14.048/1 eka eva purā vedaḥ praṇavaḥ sarvavāṅmayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva purā vedaḥ praṇavaḥ sarva vāc mayaḥ

original: BhP_09.14.048/2 devo nārāyaṇo nānya eko 'gnirvarṇa eva ca
analyzed: devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ na anyaḥ ekaḥ gniḥ varṇaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_09.14.049/1 purūravasa evāsīt trayī tretāmukhe nṛpa
analyzed: purūravasaḥ eva āsīt trayī tretā mukhe nṛpa

original: BhP_09.14.049/2 agninā prajayā rājā lokaṃ gāndharvameyivān
analyzed: agninā prajayā rājā lokam gāndharvam eyivān
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.15.001/1 ailasya corvaśīgarbhāt ṣaḍ āsannātmajā nṛpa
analyzed: ailasya ca urvaśī garbhāt ṣaṭ āsanna ātmajāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_09.15.001/2 āyuḥ śrutāyuḥ satyāyū rayo 'tha vijayo jayaḥ
analyzed: āyuḥ śrutāyuḥ satyāyuḥ vijayaḥ jayaḥ
śrutāyoḥ vasumān putraḥ satyāyoḥ ca śrutañjayaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.002/2 rayasya suta ekaśca jayasya tanayo 'mitaḥ
analyzed: rayasya sutaḥ ekaḥ ca jayasya tanayaḥ mitaḥ
bhīmaḥ tu vijayasya atha kāñcanaḥ hotrakaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.15.003/2 tasya jahnuḥ suto gaṅgāṃ gaṇḍūṣīkṛtya yo 'pibat
analyzed: tasya jahnuḥ sutaḥ gaṅgām gaṇḍūṣīkṛtya pibat
jahnoḥ tu puruḥ tasya atha balākaḥ ca ātmajaḥ jakaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.004/1 tataḥ kuśaḥ kuśasyāpi kuśāmbustanayo vasuḥ
analyzed: tatas kuśaḥ kuśasya api kuśāmbuḥ tanayaḥ vasuḥ
kuśanābhaḥ ca catvāraḥ gādhiḥ āsīt kuśāmbujaḥ
tasya satyavatīm kanyām ṛcīkaḥ yācata dvijaḥ
varam visadṛśam matvā gādhiḥ bhārgavam abravīt
ekatas śyāma karṇānām hayānām candra varcasām

original: BhP_09.15.006/2 sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ śulkaṃ kanyāyāḥ kuśikā vayam
analyzed: sahasram dīyatām śulkam kanyāyāḥ kuśikāḥ vayam

original: BhP_09.15.007/1 ityuktastanmataṃ jñātvā gataḥ sa varuṇāntikam
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tad matam jñātvā gataḥ sa varuṇa antikam

original: BhP_09.15.007/2 ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām
analyzed: ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām

original: BhP_09.15.008/1 sa ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā śvaśrvā cāpatyakāmyayā
analyzed: saḥ ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā śvaśrvā ca apatya kāmyayā
śrapayitvā ubhayaiḥ mantraiḥ carum snātum gataḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_09.15.009/1 tāvat satyavatī mātrā svacaruṃ yācitā satī
analyzed: tāvat satyavatī mātrā sva carum yācitā satī

original: BhP_09.15.009/2 śreṣṭhaṃ matvā tayāyacchan mātre māturadat svayam
analyzed: śreṣṭham matvā tayā ayacchat mātre mātuḥ adat svayam

original: BhP_09.15.010/1 tadviditvā muniḥ prāha patnīṃ kaṣṭamakāraṣīḥ
analyzed: tat viditvā muniḥ prāha patnīm kaṣṭam akāraṣīḥ

original: BhP_09.15.010/2 ghoro daṇḍadharaḥ putro bhrātā te brahmavittamaḥ
analyzed: ghoraḥ daṇḍa dharaḥ putraḥ bhrātā te brahma vittamaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.011/1 prasāditaḥ satyavatyā maivaṃ bhūriti bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: prasāditaḥ satyavatyā mā evam bhūḥ iti bhārgavaḥ
atha tarhi bhavet pautraḥ jamadagniḥ tatas bhavat

original: BhP_09.15.012/1 sā cābhūt sumahatpuṇyā kauśikī lokapāvanī
analyzed: sā ca abhūt su mahā puṇyā kauśikī loka pāvanī

original: BhP_09.15.012/2 reṇoḥ sutāṃ reṇukāṃ vai jamadagniruvāha yām
analyzed: reṇoḥ sutām reṇukām vai jamadagniḥ uvāha yām

original: BhP_09.15.013/1 tasyāṃ vai bhārgavaṛṣeḥ sutā vasumadādayaḥ
analyzed: tasyām vai bhārgava ṛṣeḥ sutāḥ vasumat ādayaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.013/2 yavīyān jajña eteṣāṃ rāma ityabhiviśrutaḥ
analyzed: yavīyān jajñe eteṣām rāmaḥ iti abhiviśrutaḥ
yam āhuḥ vāsudeva aṃśam haihayānām kula antakam

original: BhP_09.15.014/2 triḥsaptakṛtvo ya imāṃ cakre niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīm
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas yaḥ imām cakre niḥkṣatriyām mahīm
dṛptam kṣatram bhuvaḥ bhāram abrahmaṇyam anīnaśat
rajaḥ tamaḥ vṛta mahan phalgunī api kṛte ṃhasi
śrī rājā uvāca
kim tat aṃhaḥ bhagavataḥ rājanyaiḥ ajitātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_09.15.016/2 kṛtaṃ yena kulaṃ naṣṭaṃ kṣatriyāṇāmabhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam yena kulam naṣṭam kṣatriyāṇām abhīkṣṇaśas
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca
haihayānām adhipatiḥ arjunaḥ kṣatriya ṛṣabhaḥ
dattam nārāyaṇa aṃśāṃśam ārādhya parikarmabhiḥ
bāhūn daśa śatam lebhe durdharṣa tvam arātiṣu
yoga īśvara tvam aiśvaryam guṇāḥ yatra aṇima ādayaḥ
cacāra avyāhata gatiḥ lokeṣu pavanaḥ yathā
strī ratnaiḥ āvṛtaḥ krīḍan revā ambhasi mada utkaṭaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.020/2 vaijayantīṃ srajaṃ bibhradrurodha saritaṃ bhujaiḥ
analyzed: vaijayantīm srajam bibhrat rurodha saritam bhujaiḥ
viplāvitam sva śibiram pratisrotas sarit jalaiḥ

original: BhP_09.15.021/2 nāmṛṣyat tasya tadvīryaṃ vīramānī daśānanaḥ
analyzed: na amṛṣyat tasya tat vīryam vīra mānī daśānanaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.022/1 gṛhīto līlayā strīṇāṃ samakṣaṃ kṛtakilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ līlayā strīṇām samakṣam kṛta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.022/2 māhiṣmatyāṃ sanniruddho mukto yena kapiryathā
analyzed: māhiṣmatyām san niruddhaḥ muktaḥ yena kapiḥ yathā

original: BhP_09.15.023/1 sa ekadā tu mṛgayāṃ vicaran vijane vane
analyzed: saḥ ekadā tu mṛgayām vicaran vijane vane
yadṛcchayā āśrama padam jamadagneḥ upāviśat
tasmai sa naradevāya muniḥ arhaṇam āharat
sa sainya amātya vāhāya haviṣmatyā tapodhanaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.025/1 sa vai ratnaṃ tu taddṛṣṭvā ātmaiśvaryātiśāyanam
analyzed: sa vai ratnam tu tat dṛṣṭvā ātma aiśvarya atiśāyanam
tat na adriyata agnihotryām sa abhilāṣaḥ sa haihayaḥ
havirdhānīm ṛṣeḥ darpāt narān hartum acodayat

original: BhP_09.15.026/2 te ca māhiṣmatīṃ ninyuḥ savatsāṃ krandatīṃ balāt
analyzed: te ca māhiṣmatīm ninyuḥ sa vatsām krandatīm balāt

original: BhP_09.15.027/1 atha rājani niryāte rāma āśrama āgataḥ
analyzed: atha rājani niryāte rāmaḥ āśrame āgataḥ

original: BhP_09.15.027/2 śrutvā tat tasya daurātmyaṃ cukrodhāhirivāhataḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tat tasya daurātmyam cukrodha ahiḥ iva āhataḥ

original: BhP_09.15.028/1 ghoramādāya paraśuṃ satūṇaṃ varma kārmukam
analyzed: ghoram ādāya paraśum sa tūṇam varma kārmukam

original: BhP_09.15.028/2 anvadhāvata durmarṣo mṛgendra iva yūthapam
analyzed: anvadhāvata durmarṣaḥ mṛgendraḥ iva yūthapam
tam āpatantam bhṛgu varyam ojasā dhanuḥ dharam bāṇa paraśvadha āyudham

original: BhP_09.15.029/2 aiṇeyacarmāmbaramarkadhāmabhir yutaṃ jaṭābhirdadṛśe purīṃ viśan
analyzed: aiṇeya carma ambaram arka dhāmabhiḥ yutam jaṭābhiḥ dadṛśe purīm viśan
acodayat hasti ratha aśva pattibhiḥ gadā asi bāṇa ṛṣṭi śataghnī śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_09.15.030/2 akṣauhiṇīḥ saptadaśātibhīṣaṇās tā rāma eko bhagavān asūdayat
analyzed: akṣauhiṇīḥ saptadaśa ati bhīṣaṇāḥ tāḥ rāmaḥ ekaḥ bhagavān asūdayat

original: BhP_09.15.031/1 yato yato 'sau praharatparaśvadho mano 'nilaujāḥ paracakrasūdanaḥ
analyzed: yatas yatas sau praharat paraśvadhaḥ manaḥ nilaujāḥ para cakra sūdanaḥ

original: BhP_09.15.031/2 tataś tatas chinnabhujorukandharā nipetururvyāṃ hatasūtavāhanāḥ
analyzed: tatas tatas chinna bhuja ūru kandharāḥ nipetuḥ urvyām hata sūta vāhanāḥ

original: BhP_09.15.032/1 dṛṣṭvā svasainyaṃ rudhiraughakardame raṇājire rāmakuṭhārasāyakaiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sva sainyam rudhira ogha kardame raṇa ajire rāma kuṭhāra sāyakaiḥ
vivṛkṇa varma dhvaja cāpa vigraham nipātitam haihayaḥ āpatat ruṣā

original: BhP_09.15.033/1 athārjunaḥ pañcaśateṣu bāhubhir dhanuḥṣu bāṇān yugapat sa sandadhe
analyzed: atha arjunaḥ pañcaśateṣu bāhubhiḥ dhanuḥṣu bāṇān yugapad sa sandadhe

original: BhP_09.15.033/2 rāmāya rāmo 'strabhṛtāṃ samagraṇīs tānyekadhanveṣubhirācchinat samam
analyzed: rāmāya tāni eka dhanva iṣubhiḥ ācchinat samam

original: BhP_09.15.034/1 punaḥ svahastairacalān mṛdhe 'ṅghripān utkṣipya vegādabhidhāvato yudhi
analyzed: punar sva hastaiḥ acalān mṛdhe ṅghripān utkṣipya vegāt abhidhāvataḥ yudhi

original: BhP_09.15.034/2 bhujān kuṭhāreṇa kaṭhoraneminā ciccheda rāmaḥ prasabhaṃ tv aheriva
analyzed: bhujān kuṭhāreṇa kaṭhora neminā ciccheda rāmaḥ prasabham tu aheḥ iva
kṛtta bāhoḥ śiraḥ tasya gireḥ śṛṅgam iva aharat

original: BhP_09.15.035/2 hate pitari tatputrā ayutaṃ dudruvurbhayāt
analyzed: hate pitari tad putrāḥ ayutam dudruvuḥ bhayāt
agnihotrīm upāvartya sa vatsām para vīra hā
samupetya āśramam pitre parikliṣṭām samarpayat

original: BhP_09.15.037/1 svakarma tat kṛtaṃ rāmaḥ pitre bhrātṛbhya eva ca
analyzed: sva karma tat kṛtam rāmaḥ pitre bhrātṛbhyaḥ eva ca
varṇayāmāsa tat śrutvā jamadagniḥ abhāṣata

original: BhP_09.15.038/1 rāma rāma mahābāho bhavān pāpamakāraṣīt
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho bhavān pāpam akāraṣīt

original: BhP_09.15.038/2 avadhīn naradevaṃ yat sarvadevamayaṃ vṛthā
analyzed: avadhīt naradevam yat sarva deva mayam vṛthā

original: BhP_09.15.039/1 vayaṃ hi brāhmaṇāstāta kṣamayārhaṇatāṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: vayam hi brāhmaṇāḥ tāta kṣamayā arhaṇa tām gatāḥ
yayā loka guruḥ devaḥ pārameṣṭhyam agāt padam

original: BhP_09.15.040/1 kṣamayā rocate lakṣmīrbrāhmī saurī yathā prabhā
analyzed: kṣamayā rocate lakṣmīḥ brāhmī saurī yathā prabhā
kṣamiṇām āśu bhagavān tuṣyate hariḥ īśvaraḥ
rājñaḥ mūrdhābhiṣiktasya vadhaḥ brahma vadhāt guruḥ
tīrtha saṃsevayā ca aṃhaḥ jahi aṅga acyuta cetanaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
pitrā upaśikṣitaḥ rāmaḥ tathā iti kuru nandana
saṃvatsaram tīrthayātrām caritvā āśramam āvrajat
kadācid reṇukā yātā gaṅgāyām padma mālinam
gandharva rājam krīḍantam apsarobhiḥ apaśyata
vilokayantī krīḍantam udaka artham nadīm gatā

original: BhP_09.16.003/2 homavelāṃ na sasmāra kiñcic citrarathaspṛhā
analyzed: homa velām na sasmāra kiñcid citraratha spṛhā

original: BhP_09.16.004/1 kālātyayaṃ taṃ vilokya muneḥ śāpaviśaṅkitā
analyzed: kāla atyayam tam vilokya muneḥ śāpa viśaṅkitā

original: BhP_09.16.004/2 āgatya kalaśaṃ tasthau purodhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: āgatya kalaśam tasthau purodhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
vyabhicāram muniḥ jñātvā patnyāḥ prakupitaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_09.16.005/2 ghnataināṃ putrakāḥ pāpāmityuktāste na cakrire
analyzed: ghnata enām putrakāḥ pāpām iti uktāḥ te na cakrire

original: BhP_09.16.006/1 rāmaḥ sañcoditaḥ pitrā bhrāt-n mātrā sahāvadhīt
analyzed: rāmaḥ sañcoditaḥ pitrā bhrātn mātrā saha avadhīt

original: BhP_09.16.006/2 prabhāvajño muneḥ samyak samādhestapasaśca saḥ
analyzed: prabhāva jñaḥ muneḥ samyak samādheḥ tapasaḥ ca saḥ
vareṇa chandayāmāsa prītaḥ satyavatī sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.007/2 vavre hatānāṃ rāmo 'pi jīvitaṃ cāsmṛtiṃ vadhe
analyzed: vavre hatānām jīvitam ca asmṛtim vadhe
uttasthuḥ te kuśalinaḥ nidrā apāye iva añjasā
pituḥ vidvān tapaḥ vīryam rāmaḥ cakre suhṛd vadham

original: BhP_09.16.009/1 ye 'rjunasya sutā rājan smarantaḥ svapiturvadham
analyzed: ye rjunasya sutāḥ rājan smarantaḥ sva pituḥ vadham

original: BhP_09.16.009/2 rāmavīryaparābhūtā lebhire śarma na kvacit
analyzed: rāma vīrya parābhūtāḥ lebhire śarma na kvacid

original: BhP_09.16.010/1 ekadāśramato rāme sabhrātari vanaṃ gate
analyzed: ekadā āśramataḥ rāme sa bhrātari vanam gate
vairam siṣādhayiṣavaḥ labdha chidrāḥ upāgaman
dṛṣṭvā agnyāgāre āsīnam āveśita dhiyam munim
bhagavati uttamaśloke jaghnuḥ te pāpa niścayāḥ
yācyamānāḥ kṛpaṇayā rāma mātrā ati dāruṇāḥ

original: BhP_09.16.012/2 prasahya śira utkṛtya ninyuste kṣatrabandhavaḥ
analyzed: prasahya śiraḥ utkṛtya ninyuḥ te kṣatrabandhavaḥ
reṇukāḥ duḥkha śoka ārtāḥ nighnanti ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_09.16.013/2 rāma rāmeti tāteti vicukrośoccakaiḥ satī
analyzed: rāma rāma iti tāta iti vicukrośa uccakais satī

original: BhP_09.16.014/1 tadupaśrutya dūrasthā hā rāmetyārtavat svanam
analyzed: tat upaśrutya dūra sthāḥ hā rāma iti ārta vat svanam
tvarayā āśramam āsādya dadṛśuḥ pitaram hatam
te duḥkha roṣa amarṣa ārti śoka vega vimohitāḥ

original: BhP_09.16.015/2 hā tāta sādho dharmiṣṭha tyaktvāsmān svargato bhavān
analyzed: hā tāta sādho dharmiṣṭha tyaktvā asmān svargataḥ bhavān

original: BhP_09.16.016/1 vilapyaivaṃ piturdehaṃ nidhāya bhrātṛṣu svayam
analyzed: vilapya evam pituḥ deham nidhāya bhrātṛṣu svayam

original: BhP_09.16.016/2 pragṛhya paraśuṃ rāmaḥ kṣatrāntāya mano dadhe
analyzed: pragṛhya paraśum rāmaḥ kṣatra antāya manaḥ dadhe
gatvā māhiṣmatīm rāmaḥ brahma ghna vihata śriyam

original: BhP_09.16.017/2 teṣāṃ sa śīrṣabhī rājan madhye cakre mahāgirim
analyzed: teṣām sa śīrṣabhiḥ rājan madhye cakre mahā girim
tad raktena nadīm ghorām abrahmaṇya bhaya āvahām
hetum kṛtvā pitṛ vadham kṣatre maṅgala kāriṇi

original: BhP_09.16.019/1 triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas pṛthivīm kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyām prabhuḥ

original: BhP_09.16.019/2 samantapañcake cakre śoṇitodān hradān nava
analyzed: samantapañcake cakre śoṇita udān hradān nava

original: BhP_09.16.020/1 pituḥ kāyena sandhāya śira ādāya barhiṣi
analyzed: pituḥ kāyena sandhāya śiraḥ ādāya barhiṣi
sarva deva mayam devam ātmānam ayajat makhaiḥ

original: BhP_09.16.021/1 dadau prācīṃ diśaṃ hotre brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: dadau prācīm diśam hotre brahmaṇe dakṣiṇām diśam

original: BhP_09.16.021/2 adhvaryave pratīcīṃ vai udgātre uttarāṃ diśam
analyzed: adhvaryave pratīcīm vai udgātre uttarām diśam
anyebhyaḥ vā antara diśaḥ kaśyapāya ca madhyatas
āryāvartam upadraṣṭre sadasyebhyaḥ tatas param
tatas ca avabhṛtha snāna vidhūta aśeṣa kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.023/2 sarasvatyāṃ mahānadyāṃ reje vyabbhra ivāṃśumān
analyzed: sarasvatyām mahā nadyām reje vyabbhraḥ iva aṃśumān
sva deham jamadagniḥ tu labdhvā saṃjñāna lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_09.16.024/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ maṇḍale so 'bhūt saptamo rāmapūjitaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām maṇḍale saḥ bhūt saptamaḥ rāma pūjitaḥ
bhagavān rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.025/2 āgāminyantare rājan vartayiṣyati vai bṛhat
analyzed: āgāmini antare rājan vartayiṣyati vai bṛhat
āste mahendra adrau nyasta daṇḍaḥ praśānta dhīḥ
upagīyamāna caritaḥ siddha gandharva cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_09.16.027/1 evaṃ bhṛguṣu viśvātmā bhagavān harirīśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam bhṛguṣu viśvātmā bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_09.16.027/2 avatīrya paraṃ bhāraṃ bhuvo 'han bahuśo nṛpān
analyzed: avatīrya param bhāram bhuvaḥ han bahuśas nṛpān

original: BhP_09.16.028/1 gādherabhūn mahātejāḥ samiddha iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: gādheḥ abhūt mahā tejāḥ samiddhaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.028/2 tapasā kṣātramutsṛjya yo lebhe brahmavarcasam
analyzed: tapasā kṣātram utsṛjya yaḥ lebhe brahmavarcasam

original: BhP_09.16.029/1 viśvāmitrasya caivāsan putrā ekaśataṃ nṛpa
analyzed: viśvāmitrasya ca eva āsan putrāḥ eka śatam nṛpa

original: BhP_09.16.029/2 madhyamastu madhucchandā madhucchandasa eva te
analyzed: madhyamaḥ tu madhucchandāḥ madhucchandasaḥ eva te

original: BhP_09.16.030/1 putraṃ kṛtvā śunaḥśephaṃ devarātaṃ ca bhārgavam
analyzed: putram kṛtvā śunaḥśepham devarātam ca bhārgavam

original: BhP_09.16.030/2 ājīgartaṃ sutān āha jyeṣṭha eṣa prakalpyatām
analyzed: ājīgartam sutān āha jyeṣṭhaḥ eṣa prakalpyatām

original: BhP_09.16.031/1 yo vai hariścandramakhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai hariścandra makhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ

original: BhP_09.16.031/2 stutvā devān prajeśādīn mumuce pāśabandhanāt
analyzed: stutvā devān prajā īśa ādīn mumuce pāśa bandhanāt

original: BhP_09.16.032/1 yo rāto devayajane devairgādhiṣu tāpasaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ rātaḥ devayajane devaiḥ gādhiṣu tāpasaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.032/2 devarāta iti khyātaḥ śunaḥśephastu bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: devarātaḥ iti khyātaḥ śunaḥśephaḥ tu bhārgavaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.033/1 ye madhucchandaso jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalaṃ menire na tat
analyzed: ye madhucchandasaḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalam menire na tat

original: BhP_09.16.033/2 aśapat tān muniḥ kruddho mlecchā bhavata durjanāḥ
analyzed: aśapat tān muniḥ kruddhaḥ mlecchāḥ bhavata durjanāḥ

original: BhP_09.16.034/1 sa hovāca madhucchandāḥ sārdhaṃ pañcāśatā tataḥ
analyzed: sa ha uvāca madhucchandāḥ sārdham pañcāśatā tatas

original: BhP_09.16.034/2 yan no bhavān sañjānīte tasmiṃstiṣṭhāmahe vayam
analyzed: yat naḥ bhavān sañjānīte tasmin tiṣṭhāmahe vayam

original: BhP_09.16.035/1 jyeṣṭhaṃ mantradṛśaṃ cakrustvāmanvañco vayaṃ sma hi
analyzed: jyeṣṭham mantra dṛśam cakruḥ tvām anvañcaḥ vayam sma hi

original: BhP_09.16.035/2 viśvāmitraḥ sutān āha vīravanto bhaviṣyatha
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ sutān āha vīravantaḥ bhaviṣyatha

original: BhP_09.16.035/3 ye mānaṃ me 'nugṛhṇanto vīravantamakarta mām
analyzed: ye mānam me nugṛhṇantaḥ vīravantam akarta mām

original: BhP_09.16.036/1 eṣa vaḥ kuśikā vīro devarātastamanvita
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ kuśikāḥ vīraḥ devarātaḥ tam anvita
anye ca aṣṭaka hārīta jaya kratumat ādayaḥ

original: BhP_09.16.037/1 evaṃ kauśikagotraṃ tu viśvāmitraiḥ pṛthagvidham
analyzed: evam kauśika gotram tu viśvāmitraiḥ pṛthagvidham
pravara antaram āpannam tat hi ca evam prakalpitam
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.17.001/1 yaḥ purūravasaḥ putra āyustasyābhavan sutāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ purūravasaḥ putraḥ āyuḥ tasya abhavan sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.17.001/2 nahuṣaḥ kṣatravṛddhaśca rajī rābhaśca vīryavān
analyzed: nahuṣaḥ kṣatra vṛddhaḥ ca rajī rābhaḥ ca vīryavān

original: BhP_09.17.002/1 anenā iti rājendra śṛṇu kṣatravṛdho 'nvayam
analyzed: anenāḥ iti rāja indra śṛṇu kṣatravṛdhaḥ nu ayam
kṣatravṛddha sutasya āsan suhotrasya ātmajāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.003/1 kāśyaḥ kuśo gṛtsamada iti gṛtsamadādabhūt
analyzed: kāśyaḥ kuśaḥ gṛtsamadaḥ iti gṛtsamadāt abhūt

original: BhP_09.17.003/2 śunakaḥ śaunako yasya bahvṛcapravaro muniḥ
analyzed: śunakaḥ śaunakaḥ yasya bahvṛca pravaraḥ muniḥ
kāśyasya kāśiḥ tad putraḥ rāṣṭraḥ dīrghatamaḥ pitā

original: BhP_09.17.005/2 tatputraḥ ketumān asya jajñe bhīmarathastataḥ
analyzed: tad putraḥ ketumān asya jajñe bhīmarathaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.17.006/1 divodāso dyumāṃstasmāt pratardana iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: divodāsaḥ dyumān tasmāt pratardanaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.006/2 sa eva śatrujidvatsa ṛtadhvaja itīritaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva śatrujit vatsaḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ iti īritaḥ
tathā kuvalayāśva iti proktaḥ larka ādayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.17.007/1 ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāni ca
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim varṣa sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim varṣa śatāni ca

original: BhP_09.17.007/2 nālarkādaparo rājan bubhuje medinīṃ yuvā
analyzed: na alarkāt aparaḥ rājan bubhuje medinīm yuvā
alarkāt santatiḥ tasmāt niketanaḥ
dharmaketuḥ sutaḥ tasmāt satyaketuḥ ajāyata
dhṛṣṭaketuḥ tatas tasmāt su kumāraḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ
vītihotraḥ sya bhargaḥ bhārgabhūmiḥ abhūt nṛpa
iti ime kāśayaḥ bhūpāḥ kṣatra vṛddha anvayāyinaḥ
rābhasya rabhasaḥ putraḥ gambhīraḥ ca akriyaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.17.011/1 tadgotraṃ brahmavij jajñe śṛṇu vaṃśamanenasaḥ
analyzed: tad gotram brahma vid jajñe śṛṇu vaṃśam anenasaḥ
śuddhaḥ tatas śuciḥ tasmāt citrakṛt dharmasārathiḥ

original: BhP_09.17.012/1 tataḥ śāntarajo jajñe kṛtakṛtyaḥ sa ātmavān
analyzed: tatas śānta rajaḥ jajñe kṛtakṛtyaḥ saḥ ātmavān
rajeḥ pañca śatāni āsan putrāṇām amita ojasām
devaiḥ abhyarthitaḥ daityān hatvā indrāya adadāt divam

original: BhP_09.17.013/2 indrastasmai punardattvā gṛhītvā caraṇau rajeḥ
analyzed: indraḥ tasmai punar dattvā gṛhītvā caraṇau rajeḥ
ātmānam arpayāmāsa prahrāda ādi ari śaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.014/2 pitaryuparate putrā yācamānāya no daduḥ
analyzed: pitari uparate putrāḥ yācamānāya naḥ daduḥ
triviṣṭapam mahā indrāya yajña bhāgān samādaduḥ

original: BhP_09.17.015/2 guruṇā hūyamāne 'gnau balabhit tanayān rajeḥ
analyzed: guruṇā hūyamāne gnau balabhid tanayān rajeḥ
avadhīt bhraṃśitān mārgān na kaścid avaśeṣitaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.016/2 kuśāt pratiḥ kṣātravṛddhāt sañjayastatsuto jayaḥ
analyzed: kuśāt pratiḥ kṣātravṛddhāt sañjayaḥ tad sutaḥ jayaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.017/1 tataḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtasyāpi jajñe haryabalo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tatas kṛtaḥ kṛtasya api jajñe haryabalaḥ nṛpaḥ
sahadevaḥ tatas hīnaḥ jayasenaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.018/1 saṅkṛtistasya ca jayaḥ kṣatradharmā mahārathaḥ
analyzed: saṅkṛtiḥ tasya ca jayaḥ kṣatradharmā mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_09.17.018/2 kṣatravṛddhānvayā bhūpā ime śṛṇv atha nāhuṣān
analyzed: kṣatra vṛddha anvayāḥ bhūpāḥ ime śṛṇu atha nāhuṣān
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
yatiḥ yayātiḥ saṃyātiḥ āyatiḥ viyatiḥ kṛtiḥ
ṣaṭ ime nahuṣasya āsan indriyāṇi iva dehinaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.002/1 rājyaṃ naicchadyatiḥ pitrā dattaṃ tatpariṇāmavit
analyzed: rājyam na aicchat yatiḥ pitrā dattam tad pariṇāma vid

original: BhP_09.18.002/2 yatra praviṣṭaḥ puruṣa ātmānaṃ nāvabudhyate
analyzed: yatra praviṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmānam na avabudhyate
pitari bhraṃśite sthānāt indrāṇyāḥ dharṣaṇāt dvijaiḥ
prāpite jagara tvam vai yayātiḥ abhavat nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.004/1 catasṛṣv ādiśaddikṣu bhrāt-n bhrātā yavīyasaḥ
analyzed: catasṛṣu ādiśat dikṣu bhrātn bhrātā yavīyasaḥ
kṛtadāraḥ jugopa urvīm kāvyasya vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ
śrī rājā uvāca
brahmarṣiḥ bhagavān kāvyaḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ ca nāhuṣaḥ
rājanya viprayoḥ kasmāt vivāhaḥ pratilomakaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.18.006/1 ekadā dānavendrasya śarmiṣṭhā nāma kanyakā
analyzed: ekadā dānava indrasya śarmiṣṭhā nāma kanyakā
sakhī sahasra saṃyuktā guru putryā ca bhāminī
devayānyā pura udyāne puṣpita druma saṅkule
vyacarat kala gīta ali nalinī puline balā
tāḥ jalāśayam āsādya kanyāḥ kamala locanāḥ

original: BhP_09.18.008/2 tīre nyasya dukūlāni vijahruḥ siñcatīrmithaḥ
analyzed: tīre nyasya dukūlāni vijahruḥ siñcatīḥ mithas

original: BhP_09.18.009/1 vīkṣya vrajantaṃ giriśaṃ saha devyā vṛṣasthitam
analyzed: vīkṣya vrajantam giriśam saha devyā vṛṣa sthitam
sahasā uttīrya vāsāṃsi paryadhuḥ vrīḍitāḥ striyaḥ
śarmiṣṭhā a jānatī vāsaḥ guru putryāḥ samavyayat
svīyam matvā prakupitā devayānī idam abravīt

original: BhP_09.18.011/1 aho nirīkṣyatāmasyā dāsyāḥ karma hyasāmpratam
analyzed: aho nirīkṣyatām asyāḥ dāsyāḥ karma hi asāmpratam
asmad dhāryam dhṛtavatī śunī iva haviḥ adhvare

original: BhP_09.18.012/1 yairidaṃ tapasā sṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ puṃsaḥ parasya ye
analyzed: yaiḥ idam tapasā sṛṣṭam mukham puṃsaḥ parasya ye

original: BhP_09.18.012/2 dhāryate yairiha jyotiḥ śivaḥ panthāḥ pradarśitaḥ
analyzed: dhāryate yaiḥ iha jyotiḥ śivaḥ panthāḥ pradarśitaḥ
yān vandanti upatiṣṭhante loka nāthāḥ sura īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_09.18.013/2 bhagavān api viśvātmā pāvanaḥ śrīniketanaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api viśvātmā pāvanaḥ śrīniketanaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.014/1 vayaṃ tatrāpi bhṛgavaḥ śiṣyo 'syā naḥ pitāsuraḥ
analyzed: vayam tatra api bhṛgavaḥ śiṣyaḥ syāḥ naḥ pitā asuraḥ
asmad dhāryam dhṛtavatī śūdraḥ vedam iva asatī
evam kṣipantīm śarmiṣṭhā guru putrīm abhāṣata
ruṣā śvasantī uraṅgī iva dharṣitā daṣṭa dacchadā
ātma vṛttam a vijñāya katthase bahu bhikṣuki

original: BhP_09.18.016/2 kiṃ na pratīkṣase 'smākaṃ gṛhān balibhujo yathā
analyzed: kim na pratīkṣase smākam gṛhān balibhujaḥ yathā
evaṃvidhaiḥ su paruṣaiḥ kṣiptvā ācārya sutām satīm

original: BhP_09.18.017/2 śarmiṣṭhā prākṣipat kūpe vāsaścādāya manyunā
analyzed: śarmiṣṭhā prākṣipat kūpe vāsaḥ ca ādāya manyunā

original: BhP_09.18.018/1 tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ svagṛhaṃ yayātirmṛgayāṃ caran
analyzed: tasyām gatāyām sva gṛham yayātiḥ mṛgayām caran

original: BhP_09.18.018/2 prāpto yadṛcchayā kūpe jalārthī tāṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: prāptaḥ yadṛcchayā kūpe jala arthī tām dadarśa ha

original: BhP_09.18.019/1 dattvā svamuttaraṃ vāsastasyai rājā vivāsase
analyzed: dattvā svam uttaram vāsaḥ tasyai rājā vivāsase
gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim ujjahāra dayā paraḥ
tam vīram āha auśanasī prema nirbharayā girā

original: BhP_09.18.020/2 rājaṃstvayā gṛhīto me pāṇiḥ parapurañjaya
analyzed: rājan tvayā gṛhītaḥ me pāṇiḥ parapurañjaya

original: BhP_09.18.021/1 hastagrāho 'paro mā bhūdgṛhītāyāstvayā hi me
analyzed: hasta grāho paraḥ mā bhūt gṛhītāyāḥ tvayā hi me

original: BhP_09.18.021/2 eṣa īśakṛto vīra sambandho nau na pauruṣaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ īśa kṛtaḥ vīra sambandhaḥ nau na pauruṣaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.021/3 yadidaṃ kūpamagnāyā bhavato darśanaṃ mama
analyzed: yat idam kūpa magnāyāḥ bhavataḥ darśanam mama

original: BhP_09.18.022/1 na brāhmaṇo me bhavitā hastagrāho mahābhuja
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ me bhavitā hasta grāhaḥ mahā bhuja
kacasya bārhaspatyasya śāpāt yam aśapam purā
yayātiḥ anabhipretam daiva upahṛtam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.023/2 manastu tadgataṃ buddhvā pratijagrāha tadvacaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ tu tad gatam buddhvā pratijagrāha tat vacaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.024/1 gate rājani sā dhīre tatra sma rudatī pituḥ
analyzed: gate rājani sā dhīre tatra sma rudatī pituḥ

original: BhP_09.18.024/2 nyavedayat tataḥ sarvamuktaṃ śarmiṣṭhayā kṛtam
analyzed: nyavedayat tatas sarvam uktam śarmiṣṭhayā kṛtam

original: BhP_09.18.025/1 durmanā bhagavān kāvyaḥ paurohityaṃ vigarhayan
analyzed: durmanāḥ bhagavān kāvyaḥ paurohityam vigarhayan

original: BhP_09.18.025/2 stuvan vṛttiṃ ca kāpotīṃ duhitrā sa yayau purāt
analyzed: stuvan vṛttim ca kāpotīm duhitrā sa yayau purāt
vṛṣaparvā tam ājñāya pratyanīka vivakṣitam

original: BhP_09.18.026/2 guruṃ prasādayan mūrdhnā pādayoḥ patitaḥ pathi
analyzed: gurum prasādayan mūrdhnā pādayoḥ patitaḥ pathi
kṣaṇa ardha manyuḥ bhagavān śiṣyam vyācaṣṭa bhārgavaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.027/2 kāmo 'syāḥ kriyatāṃ rājan naināṃ tyaktumihotsahe
analyzed: syāḥ kriyatām rājan na enām tyaktum iha utsahe
tathā iti avasthite prāha devayānī manogatam

original: BhP_09.18.028/2 pitrā dattā yato yāsye sānugā yātu māmanu
analyzed: pitrā dattā yatas yāsye sa anugā yātu mām anu

original: BhP_09.18.029/1 pitrā dattā devayānyai śarmiṣṭhā sānugā tadā
analyzed: pitrā dattā devayānyai śarmiṣṭhā sa anugā tadā

original: BhP_09.18.029/2 svānāṃ tat saṅkaṭaṃ vīkṣya tadarthasya ca gauravam
analyzed: svānām tat saṅkaṭam vīkṣya tad arthasya ca gauravam
devayānīm paryacarat strī sahasreṇa dāsa vat

original: BhP_09.18.030/1 nāhuṣāya sutāṃ dattvā saha śarmiṣṭhayośanā
analyzed: nāhuṣāya sutām dattvā saha śarmiṣṭhayā uśanā

original: BhP_09.18.030/2 tamāha rājan charmiṣṭhāmādhāstalpe na karhicit
analyzed: tam āha rājan śarmiṣṭhām ādhāḥ talpe na karhicit

original: BhP_09.18.031/1 vilokyauśanasīṃ rājañ charmiṣṭhā suprajāṃ kvacit
analyzed: vilokya auśanasīm rājam śarmiṣṭhā su prajām kvacid

original: BhP_09.18.031/2 tameva vavre rahasi sakhyāḥ patimṛtau satī
analyzed: tam eva vavre rahasi sakhyāḥ pati mṛtau satī
rāja putryā arthitaḥ patye dharmam ca avekṣya dharma vid
smaran śukra vacaḥ kāle diṣṭam eva abhyapadyata

original: BhP_09.18.033/1 yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata
analyzed: yadum ca turvasum ca eva devayānī vyajāyata

original: BhP_09.18.033/2 druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī
analyzed: druhyum ca anum ca pūrum ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī
garbha sambhavam āsuḥ yāḥ bhartuḥ vijñāya māninī
devayānī pituḥ geham yayau krodha vimūrchitā
priyām anugataḥ kāmī vacobhiḥ upamantrayan
na prasādayitum śeke pāda saṃvāhana ādibhiḥ
śukraḥ tam āha kupitaḥ strī kāma anṛta pūruṣa

original: BhP_09.18.036/2 tvāṃ jarā viśatāṃ manda virūpakaraṇī nṛṇām
analyzed: tvām jarā viśatām manda virūpa karaṇī nṛṇām
śrī yayātiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.18.037/1 atṛpto 'smyadya kāmānāṃ brahman duhitari sma te
analyzed: atṛptaḥ smi adya kāmānām brahman duhitari sma te
vyatyasyatām yathākāmam vayasā yaḥ abhidhāsyati
iti labdha vyavasthānaḥ putram jyeṣṭham avocata

original: BhP_09.18.038/2 yado tāta pratīcchemāṃ jarāṃ dehi nijaṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: yado tāta pratīccha imām jarām dehi nijam vayaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.039/1 mātāmahakṛtāṃ vatsa na tṛpto viṣayeṣv aham
analyzed: mātāmaha kṛtām vatsa na tṛptaḥ viṣayeṣu aham

original: BhP_09.18.039/2 vayasā bhavadīyena raṃsye katipayāḥ samāḥ
analyzed: vayasā bhavadīyena raṃsye katipayāḥ samāḥ
śrī yaduḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.18.040/1 notsahe jarasā sthātumantarā prāptayā tava
analyzed: na utsahe jarasā sthātum antarā prāptayā tava

original: BhP_09.18.040/2 aviditvā sukhaṃ grāmyaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ naiti pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: a viditvā sukham grāmyam vaitṛṣṇyam na eti pūruṣaḥ
turvasuḥ coditaḥ pitrā druhyuḥ ca anuḥ ca bhārata
pratyācakhyuḥ adharma jñāḥ hi anitye nitya buddhayaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.042/1 apṛcchat tanayaṃ pūruṃ vayasonaṃ guṇādhikam
analyzed: apṛcchat tanayam pūrum vayasā ūnam guṇa adhikam
na tvam agraja vadvat sa mām pratyākhyātum arhasi
śrī pūruḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.18.043/1 ko nu loke manuṣyendra piturātmakṛtaḥ pumān
analyzed: kaḥ nu loke manuṣya indra pituḥ ātma kṛtaḥ pumān

original: BhP_09.18.043/2 pratikartuṃ kṣamo yasya prasādādvindate param
analyzed: pratikartum kṣamaḥ yasya prasādāt vindate param

original: BhP_09.18.044/1 uttamaścintitaṃ kuryāt proktakārī tu madhyamaḥ
analyzed: uttamaḥ cintitam kuryāt prokta kārī tu madhyamaḥ
śraddhayā kuryāt akartā uccaritam pituḥ

original: BhP_09.18.045/1 iti pramuditaḥ pūruḥ pratyagṛhṇāj jarāṃ pituḥ
analyzed: iti pramuditaḥ pūruḥ pratyagṛhṇāt jarām pituḥ

original: BhP_09.18.045/2 so 'pi tadvayasā kāmān yathāvaj jujuṣe nṛpa
analyzed: saḥ pi tad vayasā kāmān yathāvat jujuṣe nṛpa

original: BhP_09.18.046/1 saptadvīpapatiḥ saṃyak pitṛvat pālayan prajāḥ
analyzed: sapta dvīpa patiḥ saṃyak pitṛ vat pālayan prajāḥ
yathopajoṣam viṣayām jujuṣe vyāhata indriyaḥ
devayānī api anudinam manaḥ vāc deha vastubhiḥ

original: BhP_09.18.047/2 preyasaḥ paramāṃ prītimuvāha preyasī rahaḥ
analyzed: preyasaḥ paramām prītim uvāha preyasī rahaḥ
ayajat yajñapuruṣam kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ
sarva deva mayam devam sarva veda mayam harim
yasmin idam viracitam vyomni iva jalada āvaliḥ
nānā iva bhāti nā ābhāti svapna māyā manorathaḥ

original: BhP_09.18.050/1 tameva hṛdi vinyasya vāsudevaṃ guhāśayam
analyzed: tam eva hṛdi vinyasya vāsudevam guhā āśayam
nārāyaṇam aṇīyāṃsam nirāśīḥ ayajat prabhum
evam varṣa sahasrāṇi manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaiḥ manaḥ sukham
vidadhānaḥ pi na atṛpyat sārvabhaumaḥ kad indriyaiḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
saḥ ittham ācaran kāmān pahnavam ātmanaḥ
buddhvā priyāyai nirviṇṇaḥ gāthām etām agāyata

original: BhP_09.19.002/1 śṛṇu bhārgavyamūṃ gāthāṃ madvidhācaritāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: śṛṇu bhārgavi amūm gāthām madvidha ācaritām bhuvi
dhīrāḥ yasya anuśocanti vane grāma nivāsinaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.003/1 basta eko vane kaścidvicinvan priyamātmanaḥ
analyzed: bastaḥ ekaḥ vane kaścid vicinvan priyam ātmanaḥ
dadarśa kūpe patitām sva karma vaśa gām ajām

original: BhP_09.19.004/1 tasyā uddharaṇopāyaṃ bastaḥ kāmī vicintayan
analyzed: tasyāḥ uddharaṇa upāyam bastaḥ kāmī vicintayan
vyadhatta tīrtham uddhṛtya viṣāṇa agreṇa rodhasī

original: BhP_09.19.005/1 sottīrya kūpāt suśroṇī tameva cakame kila
analyzed: sā uttīrya kūpāt suśroṇī tam eva cakame kila

original: BhP_09.19.005/2 tayā vṛtaṃ samudvīkṣya bahvyo 'jāḥ kāntakāminīḥ
analyzed: tayā vṛtam samudvīkṣya bahvyaḥ jāḥ kānta kāminīḥ

original: BhP_09.19.006/1 pīvānaṃ śmaśrulaṃ preṣṭhaṃ mīḍhvāṃsaṃ yābhakovidam
analyzed: pīvānam śmaśrulam preṣṭham mīḍhvāṃsam yābha kovidam
saḥ ekaḥ javṛṣaḥ tāsām bahvīnām rati vardhanaḥ
reme kāma graha grastaḥ ātmānam na avabudhyata
tam eva preṣṭhatamayā ramamāṇam ajā anyayā
vilokya kūpa saṃvignā na amṛṣyat basta karma tat

original: BhP_09.19.008/1 taṃ durhṛdaṃ suhṛdrūpaṃ kāminaṃ kṣaṇasauhṛdam
analyzed: tam durhṛdam suhṛd rūpam kāminam kṣaṇa sauhṛdam
indriya ārāmam utsṛjya svāminam duḥkhitā yayau

original: BhP_09.19.009/1 so 'pi cānugataḥ straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇastāṃ prasāditum
analyzed: saḥ pi ca anugataḥ straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ tām prasāditum
kurvan niḍa viṣa ākāram na aśaknot pathi sandhitum
tasya tatra dvijaḥ kaścid ajā svāmī acchinat ruṣā

original: BhP_09.19.010/2 lambantaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bhūyaḥ sandadhe 'rthāya yogavit
analyzed: lambantam vṛṣaṇam bhūyas sandadhe rthāya yoga vid
sambaddha vṛṣaṇaḥ saḥ u pi hi ajayā kūpa labdhayā

original: BhP_09.19.011/2 kālaṃ bahutithaṃ bhadre kāmairnādyāpi tuṣyati
analyzed: kālam bahutitham bhadre kāmaiḥ na adya api tuṣyati

original: BhP_09.19.012/1 tathāhaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ subhru bhavatyāḥ premayantritaḥ
analyzed: tathā aham kṛpaṇaḥ subhru bhavatyāḥ prema yantritaḥ
ātmānam na abhijānāmi mohitaḥ tava māyayā

original: BhP_09.19.013/1 yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: yat pṛthivyām vrīhi yavam hiraṇyam paśavaḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.013/2 na duhyanti manaḥprītiṃ puṃsaḥ kāmahatasya te
analyzed: na duhyanti manaḥ prītim puṃsaḥ kāma hatasya te

original: BhP_09.19.014/1 na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāṃyati
analyzed: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāṃyati
haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmā iva bhūyas eva abhivardhate

original: BhP_09.19.015/1 yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣv amaṅgalam
analyzed: yadā na kurute bhāvam sarva bhūteṣu amaṅgalam

original: BhP_09.19.015/2 samadṛṣṭestadā puṃsaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ
analyzed: sama dṛṣṭeḥ tadā puṃsaḥ sarvāḥ sukha mayāḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.016/1 yā dustyajā durmatibhirjīryato yā na jīryate
analyzed: yā dustyajā durmatibhiḥ jīryataḥ yā na jīryate

original: BhP_09.19.016/2 tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ duḥkhanivahāṃ śarmakāmo drutaṃ tyajet
analyzed: tām tṛṣṇām duḥkha nivahām śarma kāmaḥ drutam tyajet

original: BhP_09.19.017/1 mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā nāviviktāsano bhavet
analyzed: mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā na a vivikta āsanaḥ bhavet
balavān indriya grāmaḥ vidvāṃsam api karṣati

original: BhP_09.19.018/1 pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ me viṣayān sevato 'sakṛt
analyzed: pūrṇam varṣa sahasram me viṣayān sakṛt
tathā api ca anusavanam tṛṣṇā teṣu upajāyate
tasmāt etām aham tyaktvā brahmaṇi adhyāya mānasam
nirdvandvaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha

original: BhP_09.19.020/1 dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamasadbuddhvā nānudhyāyen na sandiśet
analyzed: dṛṣṭam śrutam asat buddhvā na anudhyāyet na sandiśet

original: BhP_09.19.020/2 saṃsṛtiṃ cātmanāśaṃ ca tatra vidvān sa ātmadṛk
analyzed: saṃsṛtim ca ātma nāśam ca tatra vidvān saḥ ātma dṛś

original: BhP_09.19.021/1 ityuktvā nāhuṣo jāyāṃ tadīyaṃ pūrave vayaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā nāhuṣaḥ jāyām tadīyam pūrave vayaḥ
dattvā sva jarasam tasmāt ādade vigata spṛhaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.022/1 diśi dakṣiṇapūrvasyāṃ druhyuṃ dakṣiṇato yadum
analyzed: diśi dakṣiṇa pūrvasyām druhyum dakṣiṇatas yadum
pratīcyām turvasum cakre udīcyām anum īśvaram
bhū maṇḍalasya sarvasya pūrum arhattamam viśām

original: BhP_09.19.023/2 abhiṣicyāgrajāṃstasya vaśe sthāpya vanaṃ yayau
analyzed: abhiṣicya agrajān tasya vaśe sthāpya vanam yayau

original: BhP_09.19.024/1 āsevitaṃ varṣapūgān ṣaḍvargaṃ viṣayeṣu saḥ
analyzed: āsevitam varṣa pūgān ṣaḍvargam viṣayeṣu saḥ

original: BhP_09.19.024/2 kṣaṇena mumuce nīḍaṃ jātapakṣa iva dvijaḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇena mumuce nīḍam jāta pakṣaḥ iva dvijaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.025/1 sa tatra nirmuktasamastasaṅga ātmānubhūtyā vidhutatriliṅgaḥ
analyzed: sa tatra nirmukta samasta saṅgaḥ ātma anubhūtyā vidhuta tri liṅgaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.025/2 pare 'male brahmaṇi vāsudeve lebhe gatiṃ bhāgavatīṃ pratītaḥ
analyzed: pare male brahmaṇi vāsudeve lebhe gatim bhāgavatīm pratītaḥ

original: BhP_09.19.026/1 śrutvā gāthāṃ devayānī mene prastobhamātmanaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā gāthām devayānī mene prastobham ātmanaḥ
strī puṃsoḥ sneha vaiklavyāt parihāsam iva īritam

original: BhP_09.19.027/1 sā sannivāsaṃ suhṛdāṃ prapāyāmiva gacchatām
analyzed: sā sat nivāsam suhṛdām prapāyām iva gacchatām
vijñāya īśvara tantrāṇām māyā viracitam prabhoḥ
sarvatra saṅgam utsṛjya svapna aupamyena bhārgavī

original: BhP_09.19.028/2 kṛṣṇe manaḥ samāveśya vyadhunol liṅgamātmanaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe manaḥ samāveśya vyadhunot liṅgam ātmanaḥ
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase
sarva bhūta adhivāsāya śāntāya bṛhate namaḥ
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.20.001/1 pūrorvaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatra jāto 'si bhārata
analyzed: pūroḥ vaṃśam pravakṣyāmi yatra jātaḥ si bhārata

original: BhP_09.20.001/2 yatra rājarṣayo vaṃśyā brahmavaṃśyāśca jajñire
analyzed: yatra rājarṣayaḥ vaṃśyāḥ brahma vaṃśyāḥ ca jajñire
janamejayaḥ hi abhūt pūroḥ pracinvān tad sutaḥ tatas
tasmāt cārupadaḥ bhavat
tasya sudyuḥ abhūt putraḥ tasmāt bahugavaḥ tatas
saṃyātiḥ tasya ahaṃyātī raudrāśvaḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
ṛteyustasya kakṣeyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuḥ kṛteyukaḥ
jaleyuḥ sannateyuḥ ca dharma satya vrateyavaḥ
daśā ete psarasaḥ putrāḥ vaneyuḥ ca avamaḥ smṛtaḥ
ghṛtācyām indriyāṇi iva mukhyasya jagadātmanaḥ
ṛteyaḥ rantināvaḥ bhūt trayaḥ tasya ātmajāḥ nṛpa
sumatiḥ dhruvaḥ pratirathaḥ kaṇvo pratiratha ātmajaḥ
tasya medhātithiḥ tasmāt praskanna ādyāḥ dvijātayaḥ
putraḥ bhūt sumateḥ rebhiḥ duṣmantaḥ tad sutaḥ mataḥ

original: BhP_09.20.008/1 duṣmanto mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ kaṇvāśramapadaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: duṣmantaḥ mṛgayām yātaḥ kaṇva āśrama padam gataḥ
tatra āsīnām sva prabhayā maṇḍayantīm ramām iva

original: BhP_09.20.009/1 vilokya sadyo mumuhe devamāyāmiva striyam
analyzed: vilokya sadyas mumuhe deva māyām iva striyam

original: BhP_09.20.009/2 babhāṣe tāṃ varārohāṃ bhaṭaiḥ katipayairvṛtaḥ
analyzed: babhāṣe tām varārohām bhaṭaiḥ katipayaiḥ vṛtaḥ
tad darśana pramuditaḥ san nivṛtta pariśramaḥ

original: BhP_09.20.010/2 papraccha kāmasantaptaḥ prahasañ ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: papraccha kāma santaptaḥ prahasam ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_09.20.011/1 kā tvaṃ kamalapatrākṣi kasyāsi hṛdayaṅgame
analyzed: kā tvam kamala patra akṣi kasya asi hṛdayaṅgame

original: BhP_09.20.011/2 kiṃ svic cikīrṣitaṃ tatra bhavatyā nirjane vane
analyzed: kim svid cikīrṣitam tatra bhavatyā nirjane vane

original: BhP_09.20.012/1 vyaktaṃ rājanyatanayāṃ vedmyahaṃ tvāṃ sumadhyame
analyzed: vyaktam rājanya tanayām vedmi aham tvām sumadhyame

original: BhP_09.20.012/2 na hi cetaḥ pauravāṇāmadharme ramate kvacit
analyzed: na hi cetaḥ pauravāṇām adharme ramate kvacid
śrī śakuntalā uvāca
viśvāmitra ātmajā eva aham tyaktā menakayā vane

original: BhP_09.20.013/2 vedaitadbhagavān kaṇvo vīra kiṃ karavāma te
analyzed: veda etat bhagavān kaṇvaḥ vīra kim karavāma te

original: BhP_09.20.014/1 āsyatāṃ hyaravindākṣa gṛhyatāmarhaṇaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: āsyatām hi aravinda akṣa gṛhyatām arhaṇam ca naḥ

original: BhP_09.20.014/2 bhujyatāṃ santi nīvārā uṣyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: bhujyatām santi nīvārāḥ uṣyatām yadi rocate
śrī duṣmantaḥ uvāca
upapannam idam subhru jātāyāḥ kuśika anvaye

original: BhP_09.20.015/2 svayaṃ hi vṛṇute rājñāṃ kanyakāḥ sadṛśaṃ varam
analyzed: svayam hi vṛṇute rājñām kanyakāḥ sadṛśam varam
om iti ukte yathādharmam upayeme śakuntalām
gāndharva vidhinā rājā deśa kāla vidhāna vid
amogha vīryaḥ rājarṣiḥ mahiṣyām vīryam ādadhe

original: BhP_09.20.017/2 śvobhūte svapuraṃ yātaḥ kālenāsūta sā sutam
analyzed: śvobhūte sva puram yātaḥ kālena asūta sā sutam

original: BhP_09.20.018/1 kaṇvaḥ kumārasya vane cakre samucitāḥ kriyāḥ
analyzed: kaṇvaḥ kumārasya vane cakre samucitāḥ kriyāḥ

original: BhP_09.20.018/2 baddhvā mṛgendraṃ tarasā krīḍati sma sa bālakaḥ
analyzed: baddhvā mṛgendram tarasā krīḍati sma sa bālakaḥ
tam duratyaya vikrāntam ādāya pramadā uttamā
hareḥ aṃśa aṃśa sambhūtam bhartuḥ antikam āgamat

original: BhP_09.20.020/1 yadā na jagṛhe rājā bhāryāputrāv aninditau
analyzed: yadā na jagṛhe rājā bhāryā putrau aninditau

original: BhP_09.20.020/2 śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ khe vāg āhāśarīriṇī
analyzed: śṛṇvatām sarva bhūtānām khe vāc āha aśarīriṇī

original: BhP_09.20.021/1 mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ
analyzed: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putraḥ yena jātaḥ saḥ eva saḥ

original: BhP_09.20.021/2 bharasva putraṃ duṣmanta māvamaṃsthāḥ śakuntalām
analyzed: bharasva putram duṣmanta mā avamaṃsthāḥ śakuntalām

original: BhP_09.20.022/1 retodhāḥ putro nayati naradeva yamakṣayāt
analyzed: retodhāḥ putraḥ nayati naradeva yama kṣayāt

original: BhP_09.20.022/2 tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyamāha śakuntalā
analyzed: tvam ca asya dhātā garbhasya satyam āha śakuntalā
pitari uparate saḥ pi cakravartī mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_09.20.023/2 mahimā gīyate tasya hareraṃśabhuvo bhuvi
analyzed: mahimā gīyate tasya hareḥ aṃśa bhuvaḥ bhuvi
cakram dakṣiṇa haste sya padma kośaḥ sya pādayoḥ
īje mahābhiṣekeṇa saḥ bhiṣiktaḥ dhirāj vibhuḥ
pañcapañcāśatā medhyaiḥ gaṅgāyām anu vājibhiḥ

original: BhP_09.20.025/2 māmateyaṃ purodhāya yamunāmanu ca prabhuḥ
analyzed: māmateyam purodhāya yamunām anu ca prabhuḥ
aṣṭasaptati medhya aśvān babandha pradadat vasu

original: BhP_09.20.026/2 bharatasya hi dauṣmanteragniḥ sācīguṇe citaḥ
analyzed: bharatasya hi dauṣmanteḥ agniḥ sācīguṇe citaḥ

original: BhP_09.20.026/3 sahasraṃ badvaśo yasmin brāhmaṇā gā vibhejire
analyzed: sahasram badvaśas yasmin brāhmaṇāḥ gāḥ vibhejire

original: BhP_09.20.027/1 trayastriṃśacchataṃ hyaśvān baddhvā vismāpayan nṛpān
analyzed: trayastriṃśat śatam hi aśvān baddhvā vismāpayan nṛpān
dauṣmantiḥ atyagāt māyām devānām gurum āyayau

original: BhP_09.20.028/1 mṛgān chukladataḥ kṛṣṇān hiraṇyena parīvṛtān
analyzed: mṛgān śukladataḥ kṛṣṇān hiraṇyena parīvṛtān

original: BhP_09.20.028/2 adāt karmaṇi maṣṇāre niyutāni caturdaśa
analyzed: adāt karmaṇi maṣṇāre niyutāni caturdaśa

original: BhP_09.20.029/1 bharatasya mahat karma na pūrve nāpare nṛpāḥ
analyzed: bharatasya mahat karma na pūrve na apare nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_09.20.029/2 naivāpurnaiva prāpsyanti bāhubhyāṃ tridivaṃ yathā
analyzed: na eva āpuḥ na eva prāpsyanti bāhubhyām tridivam yathā

original: BhP_09.20.030/1 kirātahūṇān yavanān pauṇḍrān kaṅkān khaśān chakān
analyzed: kirātahūṇān yavanān pauṇḍrān kaṅkān khaśān śakān
a brahmaṇya nṛpān ca ahan mlecchān digvijaye khilān

original: BhP_09.20.031/1 jitvā purāsurā devān ye rasaukāṃsi bhejire
analyzed: jitvā purā asurāḥ devān ye rasaukāṃsi bhejire

original: BhP_09.20.031/2 devastriyo rasāṃ nītāḥ prāṇibhiḥ punarāharat
analyzed: deva striyaḥ rasām nītāḥ prāṇibhiḥ punar āharat

original: BhP_09.20.032/1 sarvān kāmān duduhatuḥ prajānāṃ tasya rodasī
analyzed: sarvān kāmān duduhatuḥ prajānām tasya rodasī
samāḥ triṇava sāhasrīḥ dikṣu cakram avartayat
sa saṃrāj lokapāla ākhyam aiśvaryam adhirāj śriyam

original: BhP_09.20.033/2 cakraṃ cāskhalitaṃ prāṇān mṛṣetyupararāma ha
analyzed: cakram ca a skhalitam prāṇān mṛṣā iti upararāma ha

original: BhP_09.20.034/1 tasyāsan nṛpa vaidarbhyaḥ patnyastisraḥ susammatāḥ
analyzed: tasya āsan nṛpa vaidarbhyaḥ patnyaḥ tisraḥ su sammatāḥ
jaghnuḥ tyāga bhayāt putrān na anurūpāḥ iti īrite

original: BhP_09.20.035/1 tasyaivaṃ vitathe vaṃśe tadarthaṃ yajataḥ sutam
analyzed: tasya evam vitathe vaṃśe tad artham yajataḥ sutam
marutstomena marutaḥ bharadvājam upādaduḥ
antarvatnyām bhrātṛ patnyām maithunāya bṛhaspatiḥ

original: BhP_09.20.036/2 pravṛtto vārito garbhaṃ śaptvā vīryamupāsṛjat
analyzed: pravṛttaḥ vāritaḥ garbham śaptvā vīryam upāsṛjat
tam tyaktu kāmām mamatām bhartuḥ tyāga viśaṅkitām

original: BhP_09.20.037/2 nāmanirvācanaṃ tasya ślokamenaṃ surā jaguḥ
analyzed: nāma nirvācanam tasya ślokam enam surāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_09.20.038/1 mūḍhe bhara dvājamimaṃ bhara dvājaṃ bṛhaspate
analyzed: mūḍhe bhara dvājam imam bhara dvājam bṛhaspate

original: BhP_09.20.038/2 yātau yaduktvā pitarau bharadvājastatastv ayam
analyzed: yātau yat uktvā pitarau bharadvājaḥ tatas tu ayam
codyamānā suraiḥ evam matvā vitatham ātmajam
vyasṛjat marutaḥ bibhran dattaḥ yam vitathe nvaye
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
vitathasya sutān manyoḥ bṛhatkṣatraḥ jayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.21.001/2 mahāvīryo naro gargaḥ saṅkṛtistu narātmajaḥ
analyzed: mahā vīryaḥ naraḥ gargaḥ saṅkṛtiḥ tu nara ātmajaḥ
guruḥ ca rantidevaḥ ca saṅkṛteḥ pāṇḍu nandana

original: BhP_09.21.002/2 rantidevasya mahimā ihāmutra ca gīyate
analyzed: rantidevasya mahimā iha amutra ca gīyate

original: BhP_09.21.003/1 viyadvittasya dadato labdhaṃ labdhaṃ bubhukṣataḥ
analyzed: viyat vittasya dadataḥ labdham labdham bubhukṣataḥ
niṣkiñcanasya dhīrasya sa kuṭumbasya sīdataḥ
vyatīyuḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśat ahāni apibataḥ kila
ghṛta pāyasa saṃyāvam toyam prātar upasthitam
kṛcchra prāpta kuṭumbasya kṣudh tṛḍbhyām jāta vepathoḥ
atithiḥ brāhmaṇaḥ kāle bhoktu kāmasya ca agamat
tasmai saṃvyabhajat saḥ nnam ādṛtya śraddhayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.006/2 hariṃ sarvatra sampaśyan sa bhuktvā prayayau dvijaḥ
analyzed: harim sarvatra sampaśyan sa bhuktvā prayayau dvijaḥ
atha anyaḥ bhokṣyamāṇasya vibhaktasya mahīpateḥ

original: BhP_09.21.007/2 vibhaktaṃ vyabhajat tasmai vṛṣalāya hariṃ smaran
analyzed: vibhaktam vyabhajat tasmai vṛṣalāya harim smaran
yāte śūdre tam anyaḥ gāt atithiḥ śvabhiḥ āvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.008/2 rājan me dīyatāmannaṃ sagaṇāya bubhukṣate
analyzed: rājan me dīyatām annam sa gaṇāya bubhukṣate
saḥ ādṛtya avaśiṣṭam yat bahu māna puraskṛtam

original: BhP_09.21.009/2 tac ca dattvā namaścakre śvabhyaḥ śvapataye vibhuḥ
analyzed: tat ca dattvā namaścakre śvabhyaḥ śva pataye vibhuḥ
pānīya mātram uccheṣam tat ca eka paritarpaṇam
pāsyataḥ pulkasaḥ bhyāgāt apaḥ dehi aśubhāya me

original: BhP_09.21.011/1 tasya tāṃ karuṇāṃ vācaṃ niśamya vipulaśramām
analyzed: tasya tām karuṇām vācam niśamya vipula śramām
kṛpayā bhṛśa santaptaḥ idam āha amṛtam vacaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.012/1 na kāmaye 'haṃ gatimīśvarāt parām aṣṭarddhiyuktāmapunarbhavaṃ vā
analyzed: na kāmaye ham gatim īśvarāt parām aṣṭa ṛddhi yuktām apunarbhavam vā

original: BhP_09.21.012/2 ārtiṃ prapadye 'khiladehabhājām antaḥsthito yena bhavantyaduḥkhāḥ
analyzed: ārtim prapadye khila dehabhājām antar sthitaḥ yena bhavanti aduḥkhāḥ

original: BhP_09.21.013/1 kṣuttṛṭśramo gātraparibhramaśca dainyaṃ klamaḥ śokaviṣādamohāḥ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ śramaḥ gātra paribhramaḥ ca dainyam klamaḥ śoka viṣāda mohāḥ

original: BhP_09.21.013/2 sarve nivṛttāḥ kṛpaṇasya jantor jijīviṣorjīvajalārpaṇān me
analyzed: sarve nivṛttāḥ kṛpaṇasya jantoḥ jijīviṣoḥ jīva jala arpaṇāt me

original: BhP_09.21.014/1 iti prabhāṣya pānīyaṃ mriyamāṇaḥ pipāsayā
analyzed: iti prabhāṣya pānīyam mriyamāṇaḥ pipāsayā
pulkasāya ādadāt dhīraḥ nisarga karuṇaḥ nṛpaḥ
tasya tribhuvana adhīśāḥ phala dāḥ phalam icchatām
ātmānam cakruḥ māyāḥ viṣṇu vinirmitāḥ

original: BhP_09.21.016/1 sa vai tebhyo namaskṛtya niḥsaṅgo vigataspṛhaḥ
analyzed: sa vai tebhyaḥ namaskṛtya niḥsaṅgaḥ vigata spṛhaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.016/2 vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktyā cakre manaḥ param
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktyā cakre manaḥ param
īśvara ālambanam cittam kurvataḥ na anya rādhasaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.017/2 māyā guṇamayī rājan svapnavat pratyalīyata
analyzed: māyā guṇa mayī rājan svapna vat pratyalīyata
tad prasaṅga anubhāvena rantideva anuvartinaḥ
abhavan yoginaḥ sarve nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_09.21.019/1 gargāc chinistato gārgyaḥ kṣatrādbrahma hyavartata
analyzed: gargāt śiniḥ tatas gārgyaḥ kṣatrāt brahma hi avartata

original: BhP_09.21.019/2 duritakṣayo mahāvīryāt tasya trayyāruṇiḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: durita kṣayaḥ mahā vīryāt tasya trayyāruṇiḥ kaviḥ
puṣkarāruṇiḥ iti atra ye brāhmaṇa gatim gatāḥ
bṛhatkṣatrasya putraḥ bhūt hastī yat hastināpuram
ajamīḍhaḥ dvimīḍhaḥ ca purumīḍhaḥ ca hastinaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.021/2 ajamīḍhasya vaṃśyāḥ syuḥ priyamedhādayo dvijāḥ
analyzed: ajamīḍhasya vaṃśyāḥ syuḥ priyamedha ādayaḥ dvijāḥ
ajamīḍhāt bṛhadiṣuḥ tasya putraḥ bṛhaddhanuḥ
bṛhatkāyaḥ tatas tasya putraḥ āsīt jayadrathaḥ
tad sutaḥ viśadaḥ tasya syenajit samajāyata

original: BhP_09.21.023/2 rucirāśvo dṛḍhahanuḥ kāśyo vatsaśca tatsutāḥ
analyzed: rucirāśvaḥ dṛḍhahanuḥ kāśyaḥ vatsaḥ ca tad sutāḥ
rucirāśva sutaḥ pāraḥ pṛthusenaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.024/2 pārasya tanayo nīpastasya putraśataṃ tv abhūt
analyzed: pārasya tanayaḥ nīpaḥ tasya putra śatam tu abhūt
sa kṛtvyām śuka kanyāyām brahmadattam ajījanat

original: BhP_09.21.025/2 yogī sa gavi bhāryāyāṃ viṣvaksenamadhāt sutam
analyzed: yogī sa gavi bhāryāyām viṣvaksenam adhāt sutam
jaigīṣavya upadeśena yoga tantram cakāra ha
udaksenaḥ tatas tasmāt bhallāṭaḥ bārhadīṣavāḥ
yavīnaraḥ dvimīḍhasya kṛtimān tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
nāmnā satyadhṛtiḥ tasya dṛḍhanemiḥ supārśvakṛt
supārśvāt sumatiḥ tasya putraḥ sannatimān tatas

original: BhP_09.21.028/2 kṛtī hiraṇyanābhādyo yogaṃ prāpya jagau sma ṣaṭ
analyzed: kṛtī hiraṇyanābha ādyaḥ yogam prāpya jagau sma ṣaṭ

original: BhP_09.21.029/1 saṃhitāḥ prācyasāmnāṃ vai nīpo hyudgrāyudhastataḥ
analyzed: saṃhitāḥ prācyasāmnām vai nīpaḥ hi udgrāyudhaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.21.029/2 tasya kṣemyaḥ suvīro 'tha suvīrasya ripuñjayaḥ
analyzed: tasya kṣemyaḥ suvīraḥ suvīrasya ripuñjayaḥ
tatas bahurathaḥ nāma purumīḍhaḥ prajaḥ bhavat
nalinyām ajamīḍhasya nīlaḥ śāntiḥ tu tad sutaḥ
śānteḥ suśāntiḥ tad putraḥ purujaḥ rkaḥ tatas bhavat
bharmyāśvaḥ tanayaḥ tasya pañca āsan mudgala ādayaḥ

original: BhP_09.21.032/1 yavīnaro bṛhadviśvaḥ kāmpillaḥ sañjayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: yavīnaraḥ bṛhadviśvaḥ kāmpillaḥ sañjayaḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.21.032/2 bharmyāśvaḥ prāha putrā me pañcānāṃ rakṣaṇāya hi
analyzed: bharmyāśvaḥ prāha putrāḥ me pañcānām rakṣaṇāya hi
viṣayāṇām alam ime iti pañcāla saṃjñitāḥ
mudgalāt brahma nirvṛttam gotram maudgalya saṃjñitam
mithunam mudgalāt bhārmyāt divodāsaḥ pumān abhūt

original: BhP_09.21.034/2 ahalyā kanyakā yasyāṃ śatānandastu gautamāt
analyzed: ahalyā kanyakā yasyām śatānandaḥ tu gautamāt
tasya satyadhṛtiḥ putraḥ dhanurveda viśāradaḥ
śaradvān tad sutaḥ yasmāt urvaśī darśanāt kila
śara stambe patat retaḥ mithunam tat abhūt śubham
tat dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā agṛhṇāt śāntanuḥ mṛgayām caran

original: BhP_09.21.036/3 kṛpaḥ kumāraḥ kanyā ca droṇapatnyabhavat kṛpī
analyzed: kṛpaḥ kumāraḥ kanyā ca droṇa patnī abhavat kṛpī
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
mitrāyuḥ ca divodāsāt cyavanaḥ tad sutaḥ nṛpa
sudāsaḥ sahadevaḥ tha somakaḥ jantujanmakṛt

original: BhP_09.22.002/1 tasya putraśataṃ teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣataḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: tasya putra śatam teṣām yavīyān pṛṣataḥ sutaḥ
sa tasmāt drupadaḥ jajñe sarva sampad samanvitaḥ
drupadāt draupadī tasya dhṛṣṭadyumna ādayaḥ sutāḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumnāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ bhārmyāḥ pāñcālakāḥ ime
yaḥ jamīḍha sutaḥ hi anyaḥ ṛkṣaḥ saṃvaraṇaḥ tatas
tapatyām sūrya kanyāyām kurukṣetra patiḥ kuruḥ
parīkṣiḥ sudhanuḥ jahnuḥ niṣadhaḥ ca kuroḥ sutāḥ
suhotraḥ bhūt sudhanuṣaḥ cyavanaḥ tha tatas kṛtī
vasuḥ tasya uparicaraḥ bṛhadratha mukhāḥ tatas
kuśāmba matsya pratyagra cedipa ādyāḥ ca cedipāḥ
bṛhadrathāt kuśāgraḥ bhūt ṛṣabhaḥ tasya tad sutaḥ
jajñe satyahito patyam puṣpavān tad sutaḥ jahuḥ

original: BhP_09.22.007/2 anyasyāmapi bhāryāyāṃ śakale dve bṛhadrathāt
analyzed: anyasyām api bhāryāyām śakale dve bṛhadrathāt

original: BhP_09.22.008/1 ye mātrā bahirutsṛṣṭe jarayā cābhisandhite
analyzed: ye mātrā bahis utsṛṣṭe jarayā ca abhisandhite

original: BhP_09.22.008/2 jīva jīveti krīḍantyā jarāsandho 'bhavat sutaḥ
analyzed: jīva jīva iti krīḍantyā jarāsandhaḥ bhavat sutaḥ
tatas ca sahadevaḥ bhūt somāpiḥ yat śrutaśravāḥ
parīkṣiḥ anapatyaḥ bhūt surathaḥ nāma jāhnavaḥ
tatas vidūrathaḥ tasmāt sārvabhaumaḥ tatas bhavat
jayasenaḥ tad tanayaḥ abhūt
tatas ca akrodhanaḥ tasmāt devātithiḥ amuṣya ca
ṛkṣaḥ tasya dilīpaḥ bhūt pratīpaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.012/1 devāpiḥ śāntanustasya bāhlīka iti cātmajāḥ
analyzed: devāpiḥ śāntanuḥ tasya vāhlīkaḥ iti ca ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_09.22.012/2 pitṛrājyaṃ parityajya devāpistu vanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: pitṛ rājyam parityajya devāpiḥ tu vanam gataḥ

original: BhP_09.22.013/1 abhavac chāntanū rājā prāṅ mahābhiṣasaṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: abhavat śāntanuḥ rājā prāk mahābhiṣa saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.013/2 yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ yauvanameti saḥ
analyzed: yam yam karābhyām spṛśati jīrṇam yauvanam eti saḥ

original: BhP_09.22.014/1 śāntimāpnoti caivāgryāṃ karmaṇā tena śāntanuḥ
analyzed: śāntim āpnoti ca eva agryām karmaṇā tena śāntanuḥ

original: BhP_09.22.014/2 samā dvādaśa tadrājye na vavarṣa yadā vibhuḥ
analyzed: samāḥ dvādaśa tad rājye na vavarṣa yadā vibhuḥ
śāntanuḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ uktaḥ parivettā ayam agra bhuj
rājyam dehi agrajāya āśu pura rāṣṭra vivṛddhaye
evam uktaḥ dvijaiḥ jyeṣṭham chandayāmāsa saḥ bravīt
tad mantri prahitaiḥ vipraiḥ vedāt vibhraṃśitaḥ girā

original: BhP_09.22.017/1 vedavādātivādān vai tadā devo vavarṣa ha
analyzed: veda vāda ativādān vai tadā devaḥ vavarṣa ha
devāpiḥ yogam āsthāya kalāpa grāmam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.018/1 somavaṃśe kalau naṣṭe kṛtādau sthāpayiṣyati
analyzed: soma vaṃśe kalau naṣṭe kṛta ādau sthāpayiṣyati
vāhlīkāt somadattaḥ bhūt bhūriḥ bhūriśravāḥ tatas
śalaḥ ca śāntanoḥ āsīt gaṅgāyām bhīṣmaḥ ātmavān
sarva dharma vidām śreṣṭhaḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ kaviḥ
vīra yūtha agraṇīḥ yena yudhi toṣitaḥ
śāntanoḥ dāsa kanyāyām jajñe citrāṅgadaḥ sutaḥ
vicitravīryaḥ ca avarajaḥ nāmnā citrāṅgadaḥ hataḥ

original: BhP_09.22.021/2 yasyāṃ parāśarāt sākṣādavatīrṇo hareḥ kalā
analyzed: yasyām parāśarāt sākṣāt avatīrṇaḥ hareḥ kalā
veda guptaḥ muniḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yatas ham idam adhyagām

original: BhP_09.22.022/2 hitvā svaśiṣyān pailādīn bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: hitvā sva śiṣyān paila ādīn bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.023/1 mahyaṃ putrāya śāntāya paraṃ guhyamidaṃ jagau
analyzed: mahyam putrāya śāntāya param guhyam idam jagau
vicitravīryaḥ kāśī rāja sute balāt
svayaṃvarāt upānīte ambikā ambālike ubhe
tayoḥ āsakta hṛdayaḥ gṛhītaḥ yakṣmaṇā mṛtaḥ
kṣetre prajasya vai bhrātuḥ mātrā uktaḥ bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.025/2 dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpyajījanat
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭram ca pāṇḍum ca viduram ca api ajījanat

original: BhP_09.22.026/1 gāndhāryāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya jajñe putraśataṃ nṛpa
analyzed: gāndhāryām dhṛtarāṣṭrasya jajñe putra śatam nṛpa

original: BhP_09.22.026/2 tatra duryodhano jyeṣṭho duḥśalā cāpi kanyakā
analyzed: tatra duryodhanaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ duḥśalā ca api kanyakā

original: BhP_09.22.027/1 śāpān maithunaruddhasya pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāṃ mahārathāḥ
analyzed: śāpāt maithuna ruddhasya pāṇḍoḥ kuntyām mahā rathāḥ
jātāḥ dharma anila indrebhyaḥ yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ trayaḥ
nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca mādryām nāsatya dasrayoḥ

original: BhP_09.22.028/2 draupadyāṃ pañca pañcabhyaḥ putrāste pitaro 'bhavan
analyzed: draupadyām pañca pañcabhyaḥ putrāḥ te pitaraḥ bhavan
yudhiṣṭhirāt prativindhyaḥ śrutasenaḥ vṛkodarāt
arjunāt śrutakīrtiḥ tu śatānīkaḥ tu nākuliḥ
sahadeva sutaḥ rājan śrutakarmā tathā apare

original: BhP_09.22.030/2 yudhiṣṭhirāt tu pauravyāṃ devako 'tha ghaṭotkacaḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirāt tu pauravyām ghaṭotkacaḥ
bhīmasenāt hiḍimbāyām kālyām sarva gataḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.22.031/2 sahadevāt suhotraṃ tu vijayāsūta pārvatī
analyzed: sahadevāt suhotram tu vijayā asūta pārvatī
kareṇumatyām nakulaḥ nara mitram tathā arjunaḥ
irāvantam ulupyām vai sutāyām babhruvāhanam
maṇipura pateḥ saḥ pi tad putraḥ putrikā sutaḥ
tava tātaḥ subhadrāyām abhimanyuḥ ajāyata
sarvātirathajit vīraḥ uttarāyām tatas bhavān
parikṣīṇeṣu kuruṣu drauṇeḥ brahmāstra tejasā

original: BhP_09.22.034/2 tvaṃ ca kṛṣṇānubhāvena sajīvo mocito 'ntakāt
analyzed: tvam ca kṛṣṇa anubhāvena sa jīvaḥ mocitaḥ ntakāt
tava ime tanayāḥ tāta janamejaya pūrvakāḥ
śrutasenaḥ bhīmasenaḥ ugrasenaḥ ca vīryavān

original: BhP_09.22.036/1 janamejayastvāṃ viditvā takṣakān nidhanaṃ gatam
analyzed: janamejayaḥ tvām viditvā takṣakān nidhanam gatam

original: BhP_09.22.036/2 sarpān vai sarpayāgāgnau sa hoṣyati ruṣānvitaḥ
analyzed: sarpān vai sarpa yāga agnau sa hoṣyati ruṣā anvitaḥ
kālaṣeyam purodhāya turam turaga medha sāh

original: BhP_09.22.037/2 samantāt pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ jitvā yakṣyati cādhvaraiḥ
analyzed: samantāt pṛthivīm sarvām jitvā yakṣyati ca adhvaraiḥ

original: BhP_09.22.038/1 tasya putraḥ śatānīko yājñavalkyāt trayīṃ paṭhan
analyzed: tasya putraḥ śatānīkaḥ yājñavalkyāt trayīm paṭhan
astra jñānam kriyā jñānam śaunakāt
sahasrānīkaḥ tad putraḥ tatas ca eva aśvamedha jaḥ
asīmakṛṣṇaḥ tasya api nemicakraḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.040/1 gajāhvaye hṛte nadyā kauśāmbyāṃ sādhu vatsyati
analyzed: gajāhvaye hṛte nadyā kauśāmbyām sādhu vatsyati
uktaḥ tatas citrarathaḥ tasmāt śucirathaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.041/1 tasmāc ca vṛṣṭimāṃstasya suṣeṇo 'tha mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ca vṛṣṭimān tasya suṣeṇaḥ mahīpatiḥ
sunīthaḥ tasya bhavitā nṛcakṣuḥ yat sukhīnalaḥ
pariplavaḥ sutaḥ tasmāt medhāvī sunaya ātmajaḥ
nṛpañjayaḥ tatas dūrvaḥ timiḥ tasmāt janiṣyati
timeḥ bṛhadrathaḥ tasmāt śatānīkaḥ sudāsa jaḥ
śatānīkāt durdamanaḥ tasya apatyam mahīnaraḥ
daṇḍapāṇiḥ nimiḥ tasya kṣemakaḥ bhavitā yatas
brahma kṣatrasya vai yoniḥ vaṃśaḥ deva ṛṣi satkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.22.045/1 kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau
analyzed: kṣemakam prāpya rājānam saṃsthām prāpsyati vai kalau

original: BhP_09.22.045/2 atha māgadharājāno bhāvino ye vadāmi te
analyzed: atha māgadha rājānaḥ bhāvinaḥ ye vadāmi te
bhavitā sahadevasya mārjāriḥ yat śrutaśravāḥ
tatas yuta āyūḥ tasya api niramitraḥ tha tad sutaḥ
sunakṣatraḥ sunakṣatrāt bṛhatsenaḥ tha karmajit
tatas sutañjayāt vipraḥ śuciḥ tasya bhaviṣyati
suvrataḥ tasmāt dharmasūtraḥ samaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.22.048/2 dyumatseno 'tha sumatiḥ subalo janitā tataḥ
analyzed: dyumatsenaḥ tha sumatiḥ subalaḥ janitā tatas
sunīthaḥ satyajit atha viśvajit yad ripuñjayaḥ
bārhadrathāḥ ca bhūpālāḥ bhāvyāḥ sāhasra vatsaram
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.23.001/1 anoḥ sabhānaraścakṣuḥ pareṣṇuśca trayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: anoḥ sabhānaraḥ cakṣuḥ pareṣṇuḥ ca trayaḥ sutāḥ
sabhānarāt kālanaraḥ sṛñjayaḥ tad sutaḥ tatas
janamejayaḥ tasya putraḥ mahāśālaḥ mahāmanāḥ
uśīnaraḥ titikṣuḥ ca mahāmanasaḥ ātmajau
śibiḥ varaḥ kṛmiḥ dakṣaḥ catvāraḥ uśīnara ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_09.23.003/2 vṛṣādarbhaḥ sudhīraśca madraḥ kekaya ātmavān
analyzed: vṛṣādarbhaḥ su dhīraḥ ca madraḥ kekayaḥ ātmavān
śibeḥ catvāraḥ eva āsan titikṣoḥ ca ruṣadrathaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.004/2 tato homo 'tha sutapā baliḥ sutapaso 'bhavat
analyzed: tatas sutapāḥ baliḥ sutapasaḥ bhavat
aṅga vaṅga kaliṅga ādyāḥ suhma puṇḍra oḍra saṃjñitāḥ

original: BhP_09.23.005/2 jajñire dīrghatamaso baleḥ kṣetre mahīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: jajñire dīrghatamasaḥ baleḥ kṣetre mahīkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.006/1 cakruḥ svanāmnā viṣayān ṣaḍ imān prācyakāṃśca te
analyzed: cakruḥ sva nāmnā viṣayān ṣaṭ imān prācyakān ca te
khalapānaḥ ṅgataḥ jajñe tasmāt divirathaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.23.007/1 suto dharmaratho yasya jajñe citraratho 'prajāḥ
analyzed: sutaḥ dharmarathaḥ yasya jajñe citraratho prajāḥ

original: BhP_09.23.007/2 romapāda iti khyātastasmai daśarathaḥ sakhā
analyzed: romapādaḥ iti khyātaḥ tasmai daśarathaḥ sakhā

original: BhP_09.23.008/1 śāntāṃ svakanyāṃ prāyacchadṛṣyaśṛṅga uvāha yām
analyzed: śāntām sva kanyām prāyacchat ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ uvāha yām
deve varṣati yam rāmāḥ āninyuḥ hariṇī sutam
nāṭya saṅgīta vāditraiḥ vibhrama āliṅgana arhaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_09.23.009/2 sa tu rājño 'napatyasya nirūpyeṣṭiṃ marutvate
analyzed: sa tu rājñaḥ napatyasya nirūpya iṣṭim marutvate
prajām adāt daśarathaḥ yena lebhe prajāḥ prajāḥ
caturaṅgaḥ romapādāt pṛthulākṣaḥ tu tad sutaḥ
bṛhadrathaḥ bṛhatkarmā bṛhadbhānuḥ ca tad sutāḥ
ādyāt bṛhanmanāḥ tasmāt jayadrathaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
vijayaḥ tasya sambhūtyām tatas dhṛtiḥ ajāyata
tatas dhṛta vrataḥ tasya satkarmā adhirathaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.23.013/1 yo 'sau gaṅgātaṭe krīḍan mañjūṣāntargataṃ śiśum
analyzed: gaṅgā taṭe krīḍan mañjūṣā antargatam śiśum
kuntyā apaviddham kānīnam anapatyaḥ karot sutam
vṛṣasenaḥ sutaḥ tasya karṇasya jagatīpate
druhyoḥ ca tanayaḥ babhruḥ setuḥ tasya ātmajaḥ tatas
ārabdhaḥ tasya gāndhāraḥ tasya dharmaḥ tatas dhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.015/2 dhṛtasya durmadastasmāt pracetāḥ prācetasaḥ śatam
analyzed: dhṛtasya durmadaḥ tasmāt pracetāḥ prācetasaḥ śatam
mleccha adhipatayaḥ bhūvan udīcīm diśam āśritāḥ
turvasoḥ ca sutaḥ vahniḥ vahneḥ bhargo bhānumān
tribhānuḥ tad sutaḥ syā api karandhamaḥ udāra dhīḥ
putraḥ putram pauravam anvabhūt

original: BhP_09.23.018/1 duṣmantaḥ sa punarbheje svavaṃśaṃ rājyakāmukaḥ
analyzed: duṣmantaḥ sa punar bheje sva vaṃśam rājya kāmukaḥ
yayāteḥ jyeṣṭha putrasya yadoḥ vaṃśam nara ṛṣabha
varṇayāmi mahā puṇyam sarva pāpa haram nṛṇām

original: BhP_09.23.019/2 yadorvaṃśaṃ naraḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: yadoḥ vaṃśam naraḥ śrutvā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
yatra avatīrṇaḥ bhagavān paramātmā nara ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_09.23.020/2 yadoḥ sahasrajit kroṣṭā nalo ripuriti śrutāḥ
analyzed: yadoḥ sahasrajit kroṣṭā nalaḥ ripuḥ iti śrutāḥ
catvāraḥ sūnavaḥ tatra śatajit prathama ātmajaḥ
mahāhayaḥ reṇuhayaḥ haihayaḥ ca iti tad sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.23.022/1 dharmastu haihayasuto netraḥ kunteḥ pitā tataḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu haihaya sutaḥ netraḥ kunteḥ pitā tatas
saḥ hañjiḥ abhavat kunteḥ mahiṣmān bhadrasenakaḥ
durmadaḥ bhadrasenasya dhanakaḥ kṛtavīryasūḥ

original: BhP_09.23.023/2 kṛtāgniḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛtaujā dhanakātmajāḥ
analyzed: kṛtāgniḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛtaujāḥ dhanaka ātmajāḥ
arjunaḥ kṛtavīryasya saptadvīpā īśvaraḥ bhavat
dattātreyāt hareḥ aṃśāt prāpta yoga mahā guṇaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.025/1 na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ
analyzed: na nūnam kārtavīryasya gatim yāsyanti pārthivāḥ
yajña dāna tapaḥ yogaiḥ śruta vīrya dayā ādibhiḥ
pañca aśīti sahasrāṇi hi avyāhata balaḥ samāḥ
a naṣṭa vitta smaraṇaḥ bubhuje kṣayya ṣaḍvasu
tasya putra sahasreṣu pañca eva urvaritāḥ mṛdhe

original: BhP_09.23.028/1 jayadhvajāt tālajaṅghastasya putraśataṃ tv abhūt
analyzed: jayadhvajāt tālajaṅghaḥ tasya putra śatam tu abhūt
kṣatram yat tālajaṅgha ākhya maurva teja upasaṃhṛtam

original: BhP_09.23.029/1 teṣāṃ jyeṣṭho vītihotro vṛṣṇiḥ putro madhoḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: teṣām jyeṣṭhaḥ vītihotraḥ vṛṣṇiḥ putraḥ madhoḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.029/2 tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīdvṛṣṇijyeṣṭhaṃ yataḥ kulam
analyzed: tasya putra śatam tu āsīt vṛṣṇi jyeṣṭham yatas kulam

original: BhP_09.23.030/1 mādhavā vṛṣṇayo rājan yādavāśceti saṃjñitāḥ
analyzed: mādhavāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ rājan yādavāḥ ca iti saṃjñitāḥ

original: BhP_09.23.030/2 yaduputrasya ca kroṣṭoḥ putro vṛjinavāṃstataḥ
analyzed: yadu putrasya ca kroṣṭoḥ putraḥ vṛjinavān tatas
viṣadguḥ vai tasya citrarathaḥ tatas
śaśabinduḥ mahā yogī mahābhāgaḥ mahān abhūt
tasya patnī sahasrāṇām daśānām su mahā yaśāḥ
daśa lakṣa sahasrāṇi putrāṇām tāsu ajījanat

original: BhP_09.23.033/2 teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ pradhānānāṃ pṛthuśravasa ātmajaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu ṣaṣ pradhānānām pṛthuśravasaḥ ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_09.23.034/1 dharmo nāmośanā tasya hayamedhaśatasya yāṭ
analyzed: dharmaḥ nāma uśanā tasya hayamedha śatasya yāj
tad sutaḥ rucakaḥ tasya pañca āsan ātmajāḥ śṛṇu
purujit rukma rukmeṣu pṛthujyā magha saṃjñitāḥ
jyāmaghaḥ tu aprajaḥ pi anyām bhāryām śaibyā patiḥ bhayāt
na avindat śatru bhavanāt bhojyām kanyām ahāraṣīt

original: BhP_09.23.036/2 rathasthāṃ tāṃ nirīkṣyāha śaibyā patimamarṣitā
analyzed: ratha sthām tām nirīkṣya āha śaibyā patim amarṣitā

original: BhP_09.23.037/1 keyaṃ kuhaka matsthānaṃ rathamāropiteti vai
analyzed: kā iyam kuhaka mad sthānam ratham āropitā iti vai
snuṣā tava iti abhihite smayantī patim abravīt

original: BhP_09.23.038/1 ahaṃ bandhyāsapatnī ca snuṣā me yujyate katham
analyzed: aham bandhyā sapatnī ca snuṣā me yujyate katham
janayiṣyasi yam rājñi tasya iyam upayujyate

original: BhP_09.23.039/1 anvamodanta tadviśve devāḥ pitara eva ca
analyzed: anvamodanta tat viśve devāḥ pitaraḥ eva ca

original: BhP_09.23.039/2 śaibyā garbhamadhāt kāle kumāraṃ suṣuve śubham
analyzed: śaibyā garbham adhāt kāle kumāram suṣuve śubham

original: BhP_09.23.039/3 sa vidarbha iti prokta upayeme snuṣāṃ satīm
analyzed: sa vidarbhaḥ iti proktaḥ upayeme snuṣām satīm
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_09.24.001/1 tasyāṃ vidarbho 'janayat putrau nāmnā kuśakrathau
analyzed: tasyām vidarbhaḥ janayat putrau nāmnā kuśa krathau
tṛtīyam romapādam ca vidarbha kula nandanam
romapāda sutaḥ babhruḥ babhroḥ kṛtiḥ ajāyata
uśikaḥ tad sutaḥ tasmāt cediḥ caidya ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.003/1 krathasya kuntiḥ putro 'bhūd vṛṣṇistasyātha nirvṛtiḥ
analyzed: krathasya kuntiḥ putraḥ bhūt vṛṣṇiḥ tasya atha nirvṛtiḥ

original: BhP_09.24.003/2 tato daśārho nāmnābhūt tasya vyomaḥ sutastataḥ
analyzed: tatas daśārhaḥ nāmnā abhūt tasya vyomaḥ sutaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.24.004/1 jīmūto vikṛtistasya yasya bhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: jīmūtaḥ vikṛtiḥ tasya yasya bhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.004/2 tato navarathaḥ putro jāto daśarathastataḥ
analyzed: tatas navarathaḥ putraḥ jātaḥ daśarathaḥ tatas
karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putraḥ devarātaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
devakṣatraḥ tatas tasya madhuḥ kuru vaśādanuḥ
puruhotraḥ tu anoḥ putraḥ tasya āyuḥ sātvataḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.24.007/1 sātvatasya sutāḥ sapta mahābhojaśca māriṣa
analyzed: sātvatasya sutāḥ sapta mahābhojaḥ ca māriṣa

original: BhP_09.24.007/2 bhajamānasya nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇo dhṛṣṭireva ca
analyzed: bhajamānasya nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇaḥ dhṛṣṭiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_09.24.008/1 ekasyāmātmajāḥ patnyāmanyasyāṃ ca trayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: ekasyām ātmajāḥ patnyām anyasyām ca trayaḥ sutāḥ
śatājit ca sahasrājit ayutājit iti prabho
babhruḥ devāvṛdha sutaḥ tayoḥ ślokau paṭhanti amū
yathā eva śṛṇumaḥ dūrāt sampaśyāmaḥ tathā antikāt

original: BhP_09.24.010/1 babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devairdevāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ
analyzed: babhruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ manuṣyāṇām devaiḥ devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.010/2 puruṣāḥ pañcaṣaṣṭiśca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi cāṣṭa ca
analyzed: puruṣāḥ pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ ca ṣaṣ sahasrāṇi ca aṣṭa ca
ye mṛta tvam anuprāptāḥ babhroḥ devāvṛdhāt api
bhojāḥ āsan tad anvaye

original: BhP_09.24.012/1 vṛṣṇeḥ sumitraḥ putro 'bhūdyudhājic ca parantapa
analyzed: vṛṣṇeḥ sumitraḥ putraḥ bhūdyudhājit ca parantapa
śiniḥ tasya anamitraḥ ca nighnaḥ bhūt anamitrataḥ
satrājitaḥ prasenaḥ ca nighnasya atha āsatuḥ sutau

original: BhP_09.24.013/2 anamitrasuto yo 'nyaḥ śinistasya ca satyakaḥ
analyzed: anamitra sutaḥ yaḥ nyaḥ śiniḥ tasya ca satyakaḥ
yuyudhānaḥ sātyakiḥ vai jayaḥ tasya kuṇiḥ tatas
yugandharaḥ namitrasya vṛṣṇiḥ paraḥ tatas
śvaphalkaḥ citrarathaḥ ca gāndinyām ca śvaphalkataḥ

original: BhP_09.24.015/2 akrūrapramukhā āsan putrā dvādaśa viśrutāḥ
analyzed: akrūra pramukhāḥ āsan putrāḥ dvādaśa viśrutāḥ
āsaṅgaḥ sārameyaḥ ca mṛduraḥ mṛdu vid giriḥ
dharmavṛddhaḥ sukarmā ca kṣetropekṣaḥ rimardanaḥ
śatrughnaḥ gandhamādaḥ ca pratibāhuḥ ca dvādaśa

original: BhP_09.24.017/2 teṣāṃ svasā sucārākhyā dvāv akrūrasutāv api
analyzed: teṣām svasā sucāra ākhyā dvau akrūra sutau api
devavān upadevaḥ ca tathā citraratha ātmajāḥ
pṛthuḥ vidūratha ādyāḥ ca bahavaḥ vṛṣṇi nandanāḥ
kukuraḥ bhajamānaḥ ca śuciḥ kambalabarhiṣaḥ
kukurasya sutaḥ vahniḥ vilomā tanayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_09.24.020/1 kapotaromā tasyānuḥ sakhā yasya ca tumburuḥ
analyzed: kapotaromā tasya anuḥ sakhā yasya ca tumburuḥ
andhakāt dundubhiḥ tasmāt avidyotaḥ punarvasuḥ
tasya āhukaḥ ca āhukī ca kanyā ca eva āhuka ātmajau
devakaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca catvāraḥ devaka ātmajāḥ
devavān upadevaḥ ca sudevaḥ devavardhanaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.022/2 teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan dhṛtadevādayo nṛpa
analyzed: teṣām svasāraḥ sapta āsan dhṛtadeva ādayaḥ nṛpa
śāntidevā upadevā ca śrīdevā devarakṣitā

original: BhP_09.24.023/2 sahadevā devakī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ
analyzed: sahadevā devakī ca vasudevaḥ uvāha tāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.024/1 kaṃsaḥ sunāmā nyagrodhaḥ kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuḥ suhūstathā
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ sunāmā nyagrodhaḥ kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuḥ suhūḥ tathā
dhṛṣṭiḥ ca tuṣṭimān

original: BhP_09.24.025/1 kaṃsā kaṃsavatī kaṅkā śūrabhū rāṣṭrapālikā

analyzed: ugrasena duhitaraḥ vasudeva anuja striyaḥ
śūraḥ vidūrathā adāsīt bhajamānaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.026/2 śinistasmāt svayaṃ bhojo hṛdikastatsuto mataḥ
analyzed: śiniḥ tasmāt svayam bhojaḥ hṛdikaḥ tad sutaḥ mataḥ
devamīḍhaḥ śatadhanuḥ kṛtavarmā iti tad sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.027/2 devamīḍhasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patnyabhūt
analyzed: devamīḍhasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patnī abhūt

original: BhP_09.24.028/1 tasyāṃ sa janayāmāsa daśa putrān akalmaṣān
analyzed: tasyām sa janayāmāsa daśa putrān akalmaṣān
vasudevam devabhāgam devaśravasa mānakam

original: BhP_09.24.029/1 sṛñjayaṃ śyāmakaṃ kaṅkaṃ śamīkaṃ vatsakaṃ vṛkam
analyzed: sṛñjayam śyāmakam kaṅkam śamīkam vatsakam vṛkam
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ ānakāḥ yasya janmani
vasudevam hareḥ sthānam vadanti ānakadundubhim

original: BhP_09.24.030/2 pṛthā ca śrutadevā ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ
analyzed: pṛthā ca śrutadevā ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.031/1 rājādhidevī caiteṣāṃ bhaginyaḥ pañca kanyakāḥ
analyzed: rājādhidevī ca eteṣām bhaginyaḥ pañca kanyakāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.031/2 kunteḥ sakhyuḥ pitā śūro hyaputrasya pṛthāmadāt
analyzed: kunteḥ sakhyuḥ pitā śūraḥ hi aputrasya pṛthām adāt

original: BhP_09.24.032/1 sāpa durvāsaso vidyāṃ devahūtīṃ pratoṣitāt
analyzed: sā apa durvāsasaḥ vidyām devahūtīm pratoṣitāt
tasyāḥ vīrya parīkṣā artham ājuhāva ravim śuciḥ
tadā eva upāgatam devam vīkṣya vismita mānasā

original: BhP_09.24.033/2 pratyayārthaṃ prayuktā me yāhi deva kṣamasva me
analyzed: pratyaya artham prayuktā me yāhi deva kṣamasva me
amogham deva sandarśam ādadhe tvayi ca ātmajam

original: BhP_09.24.034/2 yoniryathā na duṣyeta kartāhaṃ te sumadhyame
analyzed: yoniḥ yathā na duṣyeta kartāham te sumadhyame

original: BhP_09.24.035/1 iti tasyāṃ sa ādhāya garbhaṃ sūryo divaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: iti tasyām saḥ ādhāya garbham sūryaḥ divam gataḥ

original: BhP_09.24.035/2 sadyaḥ kumāraḥ sañjajñe dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: sadyas kumāraḥ sañjajñe dvitīyaḥ iva bhāskaraḥ

original: BhP_09.24.036/1 taṃ sātyajan nadītoye kṛcchrāl lokasya bibhyatī
analyzed: tam sā atyajat nadī toye kṛcchrāt lokasya bibhyatī
prapitāmahaḥ tām uvāha pāṇḍuḥ vai satya vikramaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.037/1 śrutadevāṃ tu kārūṣo vṛddhaśarmā samagrahīt
analyzed: śrutadevām tu kārūṣaḥ vṛddhaśarmā samagrahīt
yasyām abhūt dantavakraḥ ṛṣi śaptaḥ diteḥ sutaḥ
kaikeyaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca śruta kīrtim avindata
santardana ādayaḥ tasyām pañca āsan kaikayāḥ sutāḥ
rājādhidevyām āvantyau jayasenaḥ janiṣṭa ha
damaghoṣaḥ cedi rājaḥ śrutaśravasam agrahīt
śiśupālaḥ sutaḥ tasyāḥ kathitaḥ tasya sambhavaḥ
devabhāgasya kaṃsāyām citraketu bṛhadbalau
kaṃsavatyām devaśravasaḥ suvīraḥ iṣumān tathā

original: BhP_09.24.041/2 bakaḥ kaṅkāt tu kaṅkāyāṃ satyajit purujit tathā
analyzed: bakaḥ kaṅkāt tu kaṅkāyām satyajit purujit tathā
sṛñjayaḥ rāṣṭrapālyām ca vṛṣa durmarṣaṇa ādikān
harikeśa hiraṇyākṣau śūra bhūmyām ca śyāmakaḥ
miśrakeśyām apsarasi vṛka ādīn vatsakaḥ tathā
takṣa puṣkara śālā ādīn durvā akṣyām vṛkaḥ ādadhe
sumitrā arjuna pāla ādīn samīkāt tu sudāmanī

original: BhP_09.24.044/2 ānakaḥ karṇikāyāṃ vai ṛtadhāmājayāv api
analyzed: ānakaḥ karṇikāyām vai ṛtadhāma ajayau api

original: BhP_09.24.045/1 pauravī rohiṇī bhadrā madirā rocanā ilā
analyzed: pauravī rohiṇī bhadrā madirā rocanā ilā
devakī pramukhāḥ ca āsan patnyaḥ ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_09.24.046/1 balaṃ gadaṃ sāraṇaṃ ca durmadaṃ vipulaṃ dhruvam
analyzed: balam gadam sāraṇam ca durmadam vipulam dhruvam
vasudevaḥ tu rohiṇyām kṛta ādīn udapādayat

original: BhP_09.24.047/1 subhadro bhadrabāhuśca durmado bhadra eva ca
analyzed: subhadraḥ bhadrabāhuḥ ca durmadaḥ bhadraḥ eva ca
pauravyāḥ tanayāḥ hi ete bhūta ādyāḥ dvādaśa abhavan
nanda upananda kṛtaka śūra ādyāḥ madirā ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.048/2 kauśalyā keśinaṃ tv ekamasūta kulanandanam
analyzed: kauśalyā keśinam tu ekam asūta kula nandanam
rocanāyām atas jātāḥ hasta hema aṅgada ādayaḥ
ilāyām uruvalka ādīn yadu mukhyān ajījanat
vipṛṣṭhaḥ dhṛtadevāyām ekaḥ ānakadundubheḥ
śāntideva ātmajāḥ rājan praśama prasita ādayaḥ
rājanya kalpa varṣa ādyāḥ upadevā sutāḥ daśa
vasu haṃsa suvaṃśa ādyāḥ śrīdevāyāḥ tu ṣaṭ sutāḥ

original: BhP_09.24.052/1 devarakṣitayā labdhā nava cātra gadādayaḥ
analyzed: deva rakṣitayā labdhāḥ nava ca atra gada ādayaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.052/2 vasudevaḥ sutān aṣṭāv ādadhe sahadevayā
analyzed: vasudevaḥ sutān aṣṭau ādadhe sahadevayā
pravara śruta mukhyān ca sākṣāt dharmaḥ vasūn iva
vasudevaḥ tu devakyām aṣṭa putrān ajījanat
kīrtimantam suṣeṇam ca bhadrasenam udāra dhīḥ
ṛjum sammardanam bhadram saṅkarṣaṇa mahīśvaram

original: BhP_09.24.055/1 aṣṭamastu tayorāsīt svayameva hariḥ kila
analyzed: aṣṭamaḥ tu tayoḥ āsīt svayam eva hariḥ kila

original: BhP_09.24.055/2 subhadrā ca mahābhāgā tava rājan pitāmahī
analyzed: subhadrā ca mahābhāgā tava rājan pitāmahī

original: BhP_09.24.056/1 yadā yadā hi dharmasya kṣayo vṛddhiśca pāpmanaḥ
analyzed: yadā yadā hi dharmasya kṣayaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca pāpmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.056/2 tadā tu bhagavān īśa ātmānaṃ sṛjate hariḥ
analyzed: tadā tu bhagavān īśaḥ ātmānam sṛjate hariḥ

original: BhP_09.24.057/1 na hyasya janmano hetuḥ karmaṇo vā mahīpate
analyzed: na hi asya janmanaḥ hetuḥ karmaṇaḥ vā mahīpate
ātma māyām vinā īśasya parasya draṣṭuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.058/1 yan māyāceṣṭitaṃ puṃsaḥ sthityutpattyapyayāya hi
analyzed: yat māyā ceṣṭitam puṃsaḥ sthiti utpatti apyayāya hi
anugrahaḥ tad nivṛtteḥ ātmalābhāya ca iṣyate
akṣauhiṇīnām patibhiḥ asuraiḥ nṛpa lāñchanaiḥ
bhuvaḥ ākramyamāṇāyāḥ abhārāya kṛta udyamaḥ
karmāṇi aparimeyāṇi manasā api sura īśvaraiḥ
saha saṅkarṣaṇaḥ cakre bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
kalau janiṣyamāṇānām duḥkha śoka tamonudam
anugrahāya bhaktānām su puṇyam vyatanot yaśaḥ
yasmin sat karṇa pīyuṣe yaśaḥ tīrtha vare sakṛt
śrotra añjaliḥ upaspṛśya dhunute karma vāsanām
bhoja vṛṣṇi andhaka madhu śūrasena daśārhakaiḥ
ślāghanīya īhitaḥ śaśvat kuru sṛñjaya pāṇḍubhiḥ
snigdha smita īkṣita udāraiḥ vākyaiḥ vikrama līlayā
nṛ lokam ramayāmāsa mūrtyā sarva aṅga ramyayā
yasya ānanam makara kuṇḍala cāru karṇa bhrājat kapola subhagam sa vilāsa hāsam

original: BhP_09.24.065/2 nityotsavaṃ na tatṛpurdṛśibhiḥ pibantyo nāryo narāśca muditāḥ kupitā nimeśca
analyzed: nitya utsavam na tatṛpuḥ dṛśibhiḥ pibantyaḥ nāryaḥ narāḥ ca muditāḥ kupitāḥ nimeḥ ca

original: BhP_09.24.066/1 jāto gataḥ pitṛgṛhādvrajamedhitārtho hatvā ripūn sutaśatāni kṛtorudāraḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ gataḥ pitṛ gṛhāt vrajam edhita arthaḥ hatvā ripūn suta śatāni kṛtoḥ udāraḥ

original: BhP_09.24.066/2 utpādya teṣu puruṣaḥ kratubhiḥ samīje ātmānamātmanigamaṃ prathayan janeṣu
analyzed: utpādya teṣu puruṣaḥ kratubhiḥ samīje ātmānam ātma nigamam prathayan janeṣu

original: BhP_09.24.067/1 pṛthvyāḥ sa vai gurubharaṃ kṣapayan kurūṇāmantaḥsamutthakalinā yudhi bhūpacamvaḥ
analyzed: pṛthvyāḥ sa vai guru bharam kṣapayan kurūṇām antar samuttha kalinā yudhi bhūpa camvaḥ

original: BhP_09.24.067/2 dṛṣṭyā vidhūya vijaye jayamudvighoṣya procyoddhavāya ca paraṃ samagāt svadhāma
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā vidhūya vijaye jayam udvighoṣya procya uddhavāya ca param samagāt sva dhāma
